40027026	Are Pilato meni senu Barabas besewa kei awenu nukare Yesu asi wo tata meni wai dirinare ami wezewa awa. Wezinomite dowa amire Pilato meni Yesu ni pasinaira dara betaise sero soldia nana wanera potinua awa.
40027027	Roma ema tuara soldia eni meni Yesu puro Roma ema tuara sora witiro sewa soldia dapikarago nuso nana auniwa awa.
40027028	Aunitinoise Yesura tama woi dutero soldiara tama woi izai wosuniwa pumunua. Awa ema tuara tama woi wosunago wewa pumunua.
40027029	Ago wero asi dirinare puro bubuna wero giti nusora wosuniwa awa. Ago wero bogi zo potiwa wana me meni puro dopenua awa. Ago wero nuso nana zora baro bawa diro nu isipitinoise ego sewa awa, “Waiko koko, Yuda emara ema tua.”
40027030	Ago wero pora pisinoise bogi soero pumuro nu gitine dewa awa.
40027031	Ago inoise nu isipitinomite soldiara tama woi dutuniro doro tama woi nuso awa noko wosuniwa pumunu ni pasinaira damu sero puro bamuwa awa.
40027032	Puro susaumite ebete ena ema zo tamuwa zazo nuso Simon, nu Sairini natara. Nukare nu tamuro awita sewa Yesura ni pasinai soremuro dimunu bamuwa awa.
40027033	Susaumite zebu zo zazo Goligata, ge nasokaira “Giti Kopira Wetu,” ago kei awewa.
40027034	Kei awero ou wainre ou dokaka yaya nuwenaira amire dai dawero potara naise potiwa niro giro donua awa.
40027035	Ago wero nu ni pasinaira dewa awa. Dero amire tama woi nuso itagi wero pumamu sero ozina laki wewa awa. Ago wero amire tama woi nuso kanowero pumuwa awa.
40027036	Ago wero nu dia inoise arumuro itiwa awa.
40027037	Are gitine ike ena susu nera nu deu amira ge ego ine gaero potiwa itinua awa, “Ei awa Yesu, Yuda emara ema tua.”
40027038	Are nukare bewana wai mai eto numore dai ni pasinaira dero zo enibara zo enibara ago potiwa dopewato awa.
40027039	Are masi amira erama izima-sauma inoise Yesu isimuro numore ego sewa awa,
40027040	“Ae, ibu bamu ziwero waiko be etorobara amire ibu seka wamu sisesa ami tama aiso niso gera waira ena soeyo. Ni Anutura mai me nowesa sia, are ni nitope ni pasinaira ena ose dopase.”
40027041	Are pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai emare simaire nukare da ago nu isipitinoise sewa awa,
40027042	“Nu gita ema eni soremuro kora inoisia, ata nu nutope soremai ine tepo awa. Nu Isreli emara ema tua nasokai nowita, awa ni pasinaira ena zeme osai nu Soyai Ema nasokai me asamunonakai.
40027043	Nune ‘Na Anutura Mai’ asinoise Anutu tuma didinowia, are Anutu meni nu yaba inoise giro nu soero pumaise ganekai.”
40027044	Ago sewa pasina ema eto dai nuto Yesu da ago isimuwato awa.
40027045	Ago numore inoiwa waiko diti 12 klok wenu mume bamu kei awero zebu te wero itinu 3 klok wenua awa.
40027046	Are 3 klok wenua amire Yesu meni arero ego senua awa, “Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani.” Ge nasokaira, “Anutu naso, Anutu naso, ni nogoro na dotinosi?”
40027047	Ago senu dopero itiwa amira eni meni niniro ego sewa awa, “Nu Elia zawa toya.”
40027048	Ota zo meni niniro eya sumuro baro ewara somisomi zo pumuro wain dokakara patiro utura gaero Yesu meni naise sero potinu witinua awa.
40027049	Ago wenu eni meni giro ego sewa awa, “Nima do. Elia meni muro nu dusuniro potai osamunoita, awa ganekai.”
40027050	Are Yesu nu noko zawa bamu gatenu ozana tepo wenu betenua awa.
40027051	Betenu ibu bamura mo bamu kimenai awa ike ena zaawero keero eto wenua awa. Duwi bamu sumunu omata babezinoma bebezeniwa.
40027052	Ago wenu bi diti be zaumunu ge ema gita betai eni meni seka ziwa awa.
40027053	Ago wewa ama Yesu nu nutope gita wero erinu amire nukare diti nusokarera ena eriro Yerusalem nata saramai amira baro ema witai amira nana kei awewa giwa awa.
40027054	Soldiara giti kopi ata ema nusore nukare Yesu dia dopewa ami duwire nena enire dai kei awenua awa giro azu wero sewa awa, “Ema ei awa me Anutura Mai awa.”
40027055	Bama witai Yesu Galilaya zebura ena ama ganinoise sou wewa ami aike dopero tani awa gosinoise itiwa awa.
40027056	Nusokare nana eni awa Maria Madara natera, ata Maria zazo nu Yakoboto Yosefera mia, ata Zebedira mai eto amira mia awa.
40027057	Tua zinu tuwe Arimatia natara ema waure zo zazo nuso Yosefe, Yesura ge ninitinoise noisonua, ami kei awero
40027058	Pilato nana bamuro Yesura woi pumamu senu nininua awa. Niniro woi pumaise soldiare senu dowa.
40027059	Dowa Yosefe meni woi pumuro mo kapawai seka zo iboi-tatana meni ewero
40027060	puro bamuro omata so seka wamai bi diti nuka nuso gegenai amira Yesu potiro omata bamu zo dereweninu baro be gazenu doro bamunua awa.
40027061	Are bi diti mai bera awa Maria Madala natara nu zazoreto arumuro itiwato awa.
40027062	Fraide tuwe wena giti darawa wenu Sarerera be zaawewa be amire pris babezinomare Farisayore nukare poti dara niro Pilato nana bamuwa awa.
40027063	Bamuro ego sewa awa, “Ema tua nasokare, nakare ge zo kotupitinonakare, awa sanekare. Opi ema omi nu seka noise ego toisonua awa, ‘Betero waiko be etorobara wai amire seka ziro eramunona.’
40027064	Gita nu seka noise nutope Soyai Ema Kristo asasai waya inoisia. Ata zeme meni awa bua mai nuso meni bamuro woi nuso bewana puro tara awero amire, ‘Nu betaira ena eriro seka zia,’ opi ago namorekai sara waya me waya wamunoya. Are nukare ago wai azu ni ge sasa soldia meni baro dia wero baititinuara waiko be etorobara tepo waise.”
40027065	Ago sewa Pilato meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Soldia potitinona. Are nikare puro bamuro potiwo uma wero baititinoise itare.”
40027066	Ago senu nukare soldiare dai baro omata be gazai awa asi meni diwa. Ago wero asi sona besara itai gamu sero asi osino eto awa ni saora mu meni anewa awa. Ago wero soldia eni bi diti dia warise potiro awewa awa.
40028001	Sabat pura tepo wenu Sande pina atitinoinu Maria Madala natara nu zazo nusoreto bi diti gamu sero bamuwato awa.
40028002	Susauwato duwi bamu sumunu Tuara angelo zo meni utura ena osero omata musuninu enibara bamunu nu tame arumuro itinua awa.
40028003	Benau nuso awa piri-piri ine zasipitinoinua. Ota tama woi nuso iboi-tatana awa kapa me kapawai, poraga ine awa.
40028004	Are dia ema nukare giro azu wetu zipenu duro ema bebetenai ine wero itiwa awa.
40028005	Are bama eto baro kei awewato angelo meni ego senua awa, “Nito azu oko waweto. Na gosinona: Nito Yesu ni pasinaira dai awa gamu sero tupewato.
40028006	Ata nu ego oko itia. Nu gita nimorekare senua da ago wero eria. Nito muuto, masi nuso gaweto.
40028007	Giti moka nisoto meni giro amire eya bamuro bua mai nusore ego seuto: Yesu nu betaira ena eriro Galilaya zebura gita susawia. Are nikare baro nu ana gamunowa. Ge aware tona awa.”
40028008	Angelo meni ago senu giro nuto bi diti doro eya azu bamuwato. Ata nuto yawa sara bamu dai wero bua mai nusore oziga samuto sumai gege sumuro bamuwato awa.
40028009	Susauwato Yesu meni ebete ena nuto tamunua. Tamuro numoreto ego senua awa, “Pina koko.” Ago senu nuto nuso nana zora koiniroto te nuso ziwato awa.
40028010	Ago wewato Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nito azu oko waweto. Baro otao mamai naso sawato Galilaya zebura bamuro na gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
40028011	Bama eto susauwato bi diti dia nusokare nana eni meni eya sumuro baro nate ena pris babezinomare uge inoise nena kei awenua amira uge wero tepo wewa awa.
40028012	Ago sewa niniro nukare simaire dai auniro ge sero niniro awero soldiare moni witai potitinoise ego sewa awa,
40028013	“Nikare ego seu, ‘Pire gitawa inonakare bua mai nuso meni kei awero woi nuso bewana puro baera.’
40028014	Ge awa ema tua meni niniro nimorekare nena zo wai azu oko wawe. Nakare nu uzutiro sanakare ninamunoya.”
40028015	Ago sewa soldia meni moni awa pumuro ge sai awa dimuwa awa. Are opi ge awa Yuda emara nana te wenua. Te wero itewia itia.
40028016	Bua mai 11 nukare awa Galilaya zebura dirumu zo gita Yesu meni numorekare senua amira witiwa awa.
40028017	Witiro numa giro nuso nana baro kokoiniwa awa. Da da meni awa duba saisai wewa awa.
40028018	Are Yesu meni nusokare nana zora baro ego toise tugata wenua awa, “Putou bamubamu utura amire zebura amire dapikarago namore potiro tepo wai.
40028019	Are nikare zebu sero susawise ema dubu sero ge tugata wawa niniro awiso naso ware. Ago inoise Mama ata Mai ata Ozana amira zazora susupitinoise ge ou guteu pumare.
40028020	Ota potai ge sero gipero awinowena awa gipeu dimuro tepo ware. Are sana niniu. Na waiko be giti nimorekare dai nuana zebura be tepo wamunoya awa.”
41001001	Yesu Kristo Anutura Mai amira Oziga Ewanana ego ine kei awenua awa.
41001002	Porofete zo zazo nuso Yesaya meni bukura ge ei awa gaenu itewia ewa, Ei giu! Na oziga sai ema naso iyetamunona. Nu gita wero ebata niso kora wamunoya.
41001003	Nu ware gamu-gamura ena zawa sero arero ego toya awa, “Tuara ebata awa kora weu sonae.”
41001004	Yesaya meni ge ago gaenua da ago ine Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema ami ware itise zewai ge sasai ninitinoisowa. Ego toisonua awa, “Nikare duba kapeteniro nuai waya nisokare duawa giro amire na nikare ge ou gutamunona. Ago wawa amire Anutu meni nuai waya nisokare disai tepo wamunoya.” Ago toisonua awa.
41001005	Yudaya zebura ema bama ata nata bamu Yerusalem amira ema bama dapikarago ami nuso nana baro pasina nusokare kerenasara nu nukare ou Yodan ena ge ou gutinoisonua awa.
41001006	Yohanera mo wo kamel tu puro wai. Ata ipu gei nuso awa wora tata. Nu koware pikare awa ninoisonua.
41001007	Yohane meni Anutura ge ego toisonua awa, “Na gita inona, ata na putou tepo. Ota ema zo ama mamunoya amira putou bamubake. Nune na dainai. Na dupuniro sandol nusora asi besai ine te oko inoya.
41001008	Nane ge ou gutai nimorekare potena pupitawa, ata nune Ozana nimorekare potai pumamunowa.” Ago toisonua awa.
41001009	Ago inoiwa amire Yesu nata Nasarete Galilaya provinsra itia amira ana munu Yohane meni nu ou Yodan ena ge ou gutenua awa.
41001010	Are Yesu oura ena wititinoinu utu zaumunu Ozana meni nuso nana toyamu sero ni guma ine wero osisinoinua awa ginua.
41001011	Iri niro gosinoinu ge zo ego ine utura ena osenua awa, “Ni Mai naso. Ni wama naso. Na ni emo yawa sara inona.”
41001012	Ge osenu Ozana meni nu uzumunu ware bamunua.
41001013	Ware baro waiko be 40 itinu Satan meni nu etetenamu wenua. Yesu abu wora masira noinu angelo meni nu kora wewa.
41001014	Ema eni meni Yohane puro benai sora potiwa amire Yesu meni Anutura Oziga Ewanana awa sero sero Galilaya bamunua.
41001015	Galilaya baro ego senua awa, “Be kei awetia. Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira be kei awetia. Nikare duba kapeteniro Oziga Ewanana niniwo me wae.”
41001016	Ago wero Yesu meni ou ubu Galilaya amira kora-kora nomite Simonto nami nuso Andereare nuto ami moga oura apitinoiwato ginua awa. Nuto wo pumai ema.
41001017	Yesu meni numoreto ego senua awa, “Nito muuto, na ama ganaweto. Na nito gipana erama pumai ema waweto.”
41001018	Ago senu giro nuto moga nusoto eya doro Yesu ama ganewato awa.
41001019	Yesu meni noko pei-kaka kora-kora baro nami eto zazo nusoto Yakoboto Yohanere, nuto Zebedira mai, ami wara itise moga kora inoiwato awa ginua.
41001020	Giro zawa senu nuto mama nusoto Zebedi ata ama-zanire wara ago doro Yesure dai bamuwato awa.
41001021	Nukare bamu nata Kapaneam niwa. Ago noiwa zanatiaira pura zazo nuso Sabat awa kei awenu giro nu Yuda emara yere ibu amira toiro nukare ge tugata wenua awa.
41001022	Nu ge tugata inoinu nukare ge nuso niniro di tainiwa. Awa nera kota, nu gera susu meni ge diro baitinua, awa lo ge gipai ema nusokare gipinoisowa awa doro dainiro putoure senua awa.
41001023	Ago gipinoinu ema zo bi meni nuso nana toiro itinua ami yere ibu nusokarera ena kei awenua.
41001024	Kei awero ge gunero ego senua awa, “Yesu Nasarete natara ema, ni ne wamu sero nasokare nana tupesi? Ni nakare sisamu sero tupesi, tanita? Na susu niso gosinona. Ni Anutura Mai saramai.”
41001025	Ago senua awa, ata Yesu meni bi senero ego senua awa, “Ni ge doro numa doro bamu.”
41001026	Ago senu giro bi meni ema awa denu aziapinoinu bi zawa gatinoise nu doro bamunua awa.
41001027	Ago wenu ema meni giro di tainiro ge ina-sa inoise atata wero sewa awa, “Awa neni? Nu gipai ge seka zo gipinoiwa. Nu ema putoure ine wero ge sawi nena dapikarago ge nuso dipinowera. Bi dai ge nuso dipinora.”
41001028	Ago sewa oziga nuso meni baro Galilaya zebura te wenua.
41001029	Yesu bua mai nusore ago wero yere ibu doro Simonto Andereare nana sora toiwa Yakoboto Yohanere numorekare dai toiwato.
41001030	Simonra imeti-gagara meni yaya tama mena-manara puro duro itinu giro nukare oziga nuso Yesure sewa awa.
41001031	Sewa giro Yesu meni nuso nana baro wana nuso zinu erinu tama mena-mana awa tepo wenu nu nena nusokare sawero potinu niwa awa.
41001032	Tua amumuka inoinu nukare erama yayare amire erama bi puro noisowa amire awa puro nuso nana kei awewa.
41001033	Ago wewa natara ema bama dapikarago ami toyai bera ina-musa wero toyamu sero wewa.
41001034	Yesu meni senu ema bama dainiro yaya eure-taure puro noisowa ami kokopai wewa. Nu bi dainiro tunenu bamuwa. Bi meni nu gosinoiwa, are nu nukare ge sai azu senu nukare ge sai ine tepo wewa.
41001035	Pire pina kaka atamure nu eriro so doro so zo erama tepo amira baro isa toinu
41001036	Simon ata ema numore dai noisowa ami nu kau wero baro
41001037	tamuro ego sewa awa, “Ema bama dapikarago ni kau inora.”
41001038	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Nata babezinoma zorage itera amira dai bayanekai. Ago barokai na Anutura ge numorekare sane. Nera kota, na bua ami emo musena.”
41001039	Ago sero nu yere ibu nusokare Galilaya zebura itisowa amira baro Anutura ge tugata inoise bi eni tuninoise noisonua awa.
41001040	Yesu tani ago inoinu ema zo boya ayare meni Yesura nana muro ge beina wero bawa diro koiniro ego senua awa, “Ni putou niso itia, are ni na kora wamu wero giro kora wasa ewanana wamunona.”
41001041	Ago senu Yesu meni nu emo zo wenu giro nu kora wamu sero wana potiro nu kimuro ego senua awa, “Iyo, na ago wamu kotupitinona. Tama niso kokopai kei awaise.”
41001042	Ago tuaise boya aya nuso eya wawa wewa tama nuso ewanana wenua.
41001043	Ago wenu Yesu meni nu eya bayaise sero ge zewai numore ego senua awa,
41001044	“Tani nimore wetena amira bowi awa ema zore oko sase. Ata ni bamu, tama niso awa prisre gipasa gae. Ago inoise nena Mose meni Anuture potawise senua, awa potasa yaya niso tepo wetia amira susu giro baitamunora.”
41001045	Ago senu ema awa so doro bamunua awa. Ata nu ema dainirore ge toise amira oziga awa sena-sana wenua. Are Yesu meni nata zota zora eramara giti mokara bayai ine te kaka wamu wenu giro nu so erama tepo amira baro itasai erama enare-onare wero nuso nana kei awinoisowa awa.
41002001	Waiko be eni tepo wenu Yesu meni noko tera bamu Kapaneam ninu ema bama meni Yesu nuso nana baro itinua awa niniwa.
41002002	Niniro erama dainiro meni auniro itiwa aunaira zara tepo wenu so be atune dai zara tepo wenua awa. Ago wewa nu Anutura ge numorekare toise itinu
41002003	ema eni meni ema zo te-wana amai awa puro muwa awa. Ema zoeto-zoeto ami ema awa dimuro puro muwa.
41002004	Ata erama witai itiwa, are nukare Yesura nana zorage bayai ine tepo wenu giro nukare so ena Yesu bage itinua ana be wero ema gogare potiwa osenua.
41002005	Ago wewa Yesu meni tuma diai nusokare giro mai yayare amire ego senua awa, “Mai naka, na pasina niso disinona.”
41002006	Ago senu Yudara lo ge gipai ema eni ego kotupitinoise itiwa,
41002007	“Ema emi Anutu meni wago inoya, atonua! Ema zo meni pasina disai ine tepo awa. Awa Anutura bua gege.”
41002008	Ago kotupitinoiwa giro Yesu meni nukare kotupitinoiwa awa enia wero giro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro ago kotupitinowi?
41002009	Nakai ema yayare amire, ‘Eri, aita wase,’ tepo ago sanakai nu kaka aita wamu wamunoya, awa nakai me namunonakai. Nera kota, ema bama meni ge nasokai gara opi wamunoya. Ata nakai, ‘Na pasina niso disinona,’ tepo ago samunonakai, awa nakai me oko namunonakai. Nera kota, ema bama meni ge nasokaira me awa gai ine tepo.
41002010	Are na pasina disaira putou puro zebura nowena, awa gawise sero na ge ei awa dai numore samunona awa,
41002011	Na nimore ego tona: Eri, awai masi gogare niso puro niso nana bayase.”
41002012	Ago senu nu eriro awai masi gogare nuso puro emara nana giti mokara so doro bamunua awa. Ago wenu nukare di tainiro Anutu bowi wero ego sewa awa, “Nakai tani ego ine gita kaka gamu.” Ago sewa awa.
41002013	Yesu meni so awa doro ou ubura zorage noko bamunu ema bama dapikarago meni nuso nana kei awasara ge tugata inoisonua awa.
41002014	Ago inoe so awa doro susaumite ema zo zazo nuso Lewi, nu Alifayora mai, nu ami takis potaira sora arumuro itinu giro numore ego senua awa, “Ni na ama gane.” Ago senu giro nu eriro nu ama ganenua awa.
41002015	Yesu meni Lewi nana sora baro arumuro nena ninoise itinu takis pumai ema ata Yudara lo ge dai ema witai ami Yesu ata bua mai nusore dai arumuro itiwa. Ema dainiro ago ami Yesu ama ganinoisowa.
41002016	Are Farisayora lo ge gipai ema eni meni Yesu takis pumai ema ata Yudara lo ge dai emare dai nena ninoise itinua, awa giro bua mai nusore ego sewa awa, “Nu nogoro takis pumai emare ge dai emare dai nena ninoi?”
41002017	Ago sewa Yesu meni ge awa niniro numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema yaya tepore meni dokta nana oko susawewera. Ata ema yayare meni gege dokta nana susawewera. Na ema nuai nuso saramai asinoya awa zawa samu oko muna. Ata na ema pasina wai ema awa zawa samu muna.” Ago senua awa.
41002018	Be amire Yohanera bua mai ata Farisayo nukare ami nena nai sienitinoise itiwa. Are ema eni meni muro Yesu atata wero sewa awa, “Nogoro Yohanera bua mai ata Farisayora bua mai ami nena sienitinora bua mai niso meni nena kaka sienamu inori?”
41002019	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema bama ataira bona inoise itara ema nu bama atamunoya ami numorekare dai nuamunoya be amire nena sienarise sawa ninamunorita? Tepo awa. Nukare ema amire dai nuamunora be amire sienarise sawa oko ninamunora.
41002020	Ata ama ema awa iwo meni puro bayara tepo wamunoya be amire nukare nena sienamunora. Da ago ine namore wara amire bua mai naso meni nena sienamunora.” Ago senua awa.
41002021	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nakai mo toto takaniro gayamu sero mo sibi seka puro mo asora oko gainowenakai. Ago wamunonakai, awa mo seka meni zumai mo aso awa noko keyai toto bamubake wamunoya awa.
41002022	Noko, nakai ou wain seka puro meme tata matura oko niginowenakai. Ago wamunonakai, awa ou wain meni dobu wero meme tata ziai keyai ou wainre meme tatare awa zainamunonakai. Nakai ou wain seka puro meme tata sekara niginowenakai.” Ago senua awa.
41002023	Sabat pura zore Yesu ata bua mai nusore ebete noise wuit bua zo sepinoise bua mai nuso meni wuit me zisero niwa.
41002024	Ago wewa giro Farisayo meni numore ego sewa awa, “Lo ge meni nukare bua zo Sabat pura amire wai azu toya awa inora, gosa.”
41002025	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ina ego senua awa, “Nikare uge zo Dawidi ata ema eni numore dai noisowa amire nukare nena nai tepo, meri betinoise itiwa amira uge awa nikare kaka ninamu meni sago inowa, atonua!
41002026	Abayata meni pris bamu wero noisonua be amire Dawidi meni Anutura ibu amira toiro ame Anutura giti mokara potitinoisowa awa ninua. Ame awa nukare osai meni nai ine tepo. Pris meni gege narise sai awa. Ata Dawidi meni ame awa puro dubu nusore potinu niwa Anutu meni ginu waya oko wenua.”
41002027	Ago sero susumuro ego senua awa, “Anutu meni Sabat pura ami erama sogawaise potinua. Ata erama meni Sabat pura awa sogawarise oko potinua.
41002028	Are na Emara Mai meni nena dapikaragora Tua wero nowena ami Sabat pura amira Tua dai wero nowena.” Ago senua awa.
41003001	Yesu meni yere ibura noko toiro ema zo wana amai ami ago itinu tamunua.
41003002	Erama ago itiwa ami Yesu ua inoise, “Nu ema yayare awa Sabat pura be emire kora wamunoita?” asero itiwa. Nukare awa Yesu gera potamu sero kotupitinoiwa,
41003003	are Yesu meni ema wana amai amire ego senua awa, “Ego mu.”
41003004	Ago sero nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai tani ewanana Sabat purare wanakai te wamunoita, tani waya wanakai te wamunoi? Ota nakai erama soremanakai kokopai wara te wamunoita, ema sisanakai betara te wamunoi?” Ago senua, ata nukare usero itiwa.
41003005	Are nu gina-gana wero tini kapenu duba waya nusokare giro duba nuso Farisayo emo di toinu emare ego senua awa, “Wana zuzuti.” Ago senu wana zuzutinu wana ewanana noko wenua.
41003006	Farisayo meni ibu doro eya baro Herodera Pati memba enie dai auniro Yesu dara betaise amira ebata tamamu sero wewa awa.
41003007	Yesu bua mai nusore bamu ou ubura niwa awa. Galilaya ema bama witai-bake meni numore dai bamuwa. Ago wewa ema Yudaya zebura amire
41003008	ema nata Yerusalem amire ema Idumia zebura amire ema ou Yodan enibara amire ema nata Tayato Saidonre ami bua dapikarago Yesu meni inoisonua amira ge niniwa, are nukare witai ami nuso nana muwa.
41003009	Ago wewa nu bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Ema bama na patamera, wa sia wero zorage potiu itae.”
41003010	Ago senua, nera kota, gita nu ema yayare dainiro awa kora wenu giro ema bama yayare dapikarago ami nu kimamu sero ina-musa inoise itiwa.
41003011	Are ema bama bi nusokare nana itiwa ami nu giro te nusora duro zawa gatinoise ego toisowa awa, “Ni Anutura Mai.”
41003012	Ago sasara Yesu meni ge zewai-zawai bire toise nukare susu nuso ema enire kerenai azu toisonua.
41003013	Yesu meni dirumura witiro ema eni yaba wero zawa senu nuso nana muwa
41003014	nu nukare siana-katana wero ema 12 pumuro buara potiro nukare numore dai nuarise senua. Nu nukare iyetai Anutura ge sarise,
41003015	o bi tunaira putou awa pumarise senua awa.
41003016	Nu bua mai 12 sianiro pumunua amira zazo nusokare ewa: Nu zazo seka Simonre potiro Petoro asenua awa.
41003017	Yakobo nu Zebedira mai amireto nami nuso Yohanere amira zazo seka Boanege asenua awa. (Ge nasokaira, “Tararara mai.”)
41003018	Anderea, Filip, Batolomiu, Matiu, Tomas, Yakobo nu Alifayora mai, Tadias, Simon Zelote,
41003019	Yudas Iskeriot nu Yesu kereniro iwora wanera potai ema. Yesu meni bua mai awa buara potiro nu bamu nuso nana ninua awa.
41003020	Ema bama dainiro meni noko Yesu nana muwa nu ata bua mai nuso nukare nena nai ine tepo noiwa.
41003021	Are dubu nuso meni ge awa niniro, “Nu dau wago inoya,” asero nu soyamu bamuwa awa.
41003022	Yudara lo ge gipai ema eni meni Yerusalem ena osero muro ego toise itiwa awa, “Bi zazo nuso Bielsebul ami nuso nana toiro itia. Are bira giti kopi ami nu soremawi bi tuninowia.” Ago sewa awa.
41003023	Are Yesu meni ema zawa senu muwa ge bezai eni numorekare ego senua awa, “Satan meni nogo nogo wero nutope tunamunoi?
41003024	Nata da amira erama meni awiniro ina-da wamunora, awa nata awa zewai oko itamunoya.
41003025	Ota dubu zo awiniro ge ina-sa inoise iwo ina-wa wamunora, awa dubu awa zewai oko itamunora.
41003026	Satan meni nutope iwo nuso wero putou nuso zaumuro nuamia, awa nu zewai itai te oko wamia. Putou nuso tepo wamia.
41003027	Nakai ema putou bamure zo amira wau dapikarago pumamu sero gita ema awa beniro amire so nusora toiro wau nuso dapikarago pumamunonakai awa.
41003028	Na me memeka sana niniu. Eramara pasina dapikarago ata Anutu isimai ge nusokare awa disai te inoya.
41003029	Ata zo nu Ozana isimamunoya ema amira pasina disai ine tepo awa. Pasina nuso itai gege itamunoya.”
41003030	Yesu ago senua. Awa nera kota, nukare numore ego sewa awa, “Bi meni nuso nana toiro itia.”
41003031	Mia nuso ata namisini nuso nukare muro so atune dopero ge numore potiro nusokare nana maise sewa.
41003032	Are ema diti bamu meni Yesura nana zorage arumuro itiwa ami numore ego sewa awa, “Mia niso ata namisini niso ami ni gamu sero muro atune dopero itera.”
41003033	Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Mia naso ata namisini naso awa arekare ni?”
41003034	Ago sero nu ema bama nuso nana zorage arumuro itiwa awa gina-gana wero ego senua awa, “Ema bama emi miamai naso ata namisini naso inora.
41003035	Ema bama Anutura ge niniro dipinowera ami nami naso ata nubama naso ata mia naso inora.” Ago senua awa.
41004001	Yesu nu ou ubura noko baro ge tugata inoinu ema bama dainiro-bake ami nuso nana kei awewa. Are nu wa isero witiro arumuro itinu ema diti bamu meni kora itiwa.
41004002	Ago itiwa nu numorekare ge bezai eni toise nena witai numorekare tugata inoinua. Tugata inoise numorekare ego senua awa,
41004003	“Sana niniu. Ema zo meni nena we buye apamu sero bamunua awa.
41004004	Bamuro nena we apitinoinu we eni ebete ena duuwa ni mamai meni tamuro niro tepo wewa awa.
41004005	Ota we eni meni awa zebu omata tame kara-kara wai amira duuwa awa. Zebu awa tumou tepo, are we ami eya eriwa awa.
41004006	Ago wero tatawi nusokare iboboi tepo, are waiko meni witiro moenu binero betewa tepo wenua awa.
41004007	Ota we eni meni awa zebu iwera tatawi itiwa amira duuwa awa. We awa iwere dai dapikarago te tetemo eriro iwe meni nena awa denu me kaka ziamu wenua awa.
41004008	Ota we eni meni awa zebu me gawire amira duro eriro zamuro me saisai ziwa awa. We zora me 30 zinu, we zora me 60 zinu, we zora me 100 zinua.”
41004009	Ago sero senua awa, “Zo nu danare meni ge ei awa ninaise.” Ago senua awa.
41004010	Ema bama bozewa amire ema eni meni Yesure dai noisowa ata bua mai nuso 12 ami ge bezaira susu gamu sero nu atata wewa.
41004011	Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira ge bezero itewia, amira susu awa nikare ninawise sai itia awa. Ata eni bamu awa ge bezaira uge gege ninarise sero towena.
41004012	Porofete Yesaya meni ge ego gaenua awa, Nukare duba kapeteniro nuai sekara nuara na Anutu meni pasina nusokare disamena, nukare giti moka nusokare meni garise, ata oko giro baitarise. Nukare uge ninarise, ata ugera susu oko niniro baitarise. Anutu meni ago senua, are na ge bezai gege numorekare towena.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
41004013	Yesu meni ago sero numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare ge bezai amira susu awa kaka gamu inowita? Are nikare nogo wero ge bezai eni amira susu giro baitamunowi?
41004014	Susu nuso ego ewa: Ema we uramu apitinoya ami Oziga Ewanana amira ge we urinoya.
41004015	Ata ema enira duba awa ebatara zebu zewai ine. Nukare Oziga Ewanana ninitinuawera Satan meni eya muro Oziga Ewanana dana nusokarera toitinowia awa soinowia.
41004016	Da ago ine ema eni nukare zebu omata tame kara-kara wai ago ine awa. Nukare utura ge niniro eya pumuro yawa sara inora.
41004017	Ata nukare tatawi tepo. Nukare Tuara ebata awa be pei-kaka gege ama ganero noma amire waya nusokare nana kei awawi erama meni utura ge emo iwo numorekare wawera giro nukare eya ebata awa dotinowera.
41004018	Ema eni nukare zebu iwere ine. Nukare ami utura ge ninitinora,
41004019	ata nukare zebura nena emo kotumu-katumu inoise wau moni emo yawa sara inoise nena eure-taure amira duba-duba inoise nowera, are tani ago ami utura ge gogowara me oko kei awamunoya.
41004020	Ata ema eni meni awa zebu me gawire ine. Nukare ami utura ge niniro poti dube niro me zizinora — eni 30, eni 60, eni 100.” Ago senua awa.
41004021	Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai lam gaero puro au sose piero potitinowenikaita? Tepo awa. Ota nakai lam awa so atune potitinowenikaita? Tepo awa. Nakai lam gabarira kimenitinowenakai.
41004022	Nena bezai dapikarago ama kei damu namunora. Nena gogowai dapikarago ama kei damu namunora.
41004023	Zo nu danare meni ge ei awa ninaise.” Ago senua awa.
41004024	Nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ge ninitinowa awa niniro baitiu. Nikare nena eramare potamunowa te Anutu meni nimorekare potamunoya. Nena amire nena enire ewesemamunoya.
41004025	Anutu meni ema zo ge me eni puro nowia amire ge me bamubake potamunoya. Ota ema zo ge me pei-kaka gege puro nowia amira ge me awa Anutu meni soero pumamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41004026	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa ego ine itia: Ema zo meni nena we bua nusora urinowia.
41004027	Nena we urero nu awiyo-ditiyo awinoma we meni eritinuawi ema meni we eraira susu kaka giro baitamu.
41004028	Zebu meni nu nutope gawi nenare potitinowia. Gita pogi kei awinowia amire me zizinowia. Ago wero amire me pisisinowia awa.
41004029	Pisero izawi amire ema ami naira be kei awetia asero ema eni kasiwa orosowaire nena pumarise sero buye potitinowia.” Ago senua awa.
41004030	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa nogo ine asamunonikai? Nakai susu awa kerenamu sero ge bezai nogo ine sanakai te wamunoi?
41004031	Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira susu awa ni zo zazo mastet asinowenakai amira me ine awa. Ema meni me awa buye urinowera be amire me awa zebura ni me dapikarago itera amira osai nusokare awa.
41004032	Ata urawera eriro ni pei-mamai zepa da gege itai awa dainiro bamu inowia. Ago wawi bona nuso babezinoma kei awawera ni mamai meni duga nusora muro bonara zau potitinowera.” Ago senua awa.
41004033	Yesu meni ge bezai saisai toise Oziga Ewanana eramare toisonua awa. Ninai nusokarera te toisonua.
41004034	Nu ge bezai gege numorekare toisonua. Ata bua mai nuso imata numore dai itasara be amire nu gera susu numorekare kerenitinoisonua awa.
41004035	Be amire tua zinu Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nakai ou ubu semuro enibara bayanekai.”
41004036	Ago senu giro nukare ema bama diti bamu awa doro Yesu wara dago itinu giro nu puro bamuwa. Wa eni numorekare dai bamuwa.
41004037	Susauwa bisi pena-pana kei awenu kakawa meni wa kukunamu sero inoinua.
41004038	Ota Yesu meni awa wa awene baro giti guta waira duro gitawa inoinua. Are nukare nu awa-uzero numore ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, nakai betai sogo inonakai ami emo kotupitinosita?”
41004039	Ago sewa nu eriro bisi senero kakaware ego senua awa, “Ni tepo we. Bisi dero iti.” Ago senu so bisi binono denu
41004040	nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro wama bazizinoi? Nikare tuma diai tepo ni?”
41004041	Ago senu nukare mamaniro ina-sa wewa awa, “Ema ei awa neni? Bisire oure dai ge nuso dipinora.” Ago sewa awa.
41005001	Yesu bua mai nusore nukare ou ubu semuro enibara kei awewa. Zebu awa Gerasa emara zebu.
41005002	Yesu wara ena witinu ema zo bi nuso nana toiro itisonua ami bi ditira ena muro Yesu nana kei awenua.
41005003	Ema awa bi ditira omata sora noisonua. Ema zo nu benai te wai ine tepo awa. Asi zewai zazo sen awa dai te kaka wamu.
41005004	Gita ema meni te-wana nuso sen meni benitinoisowa, ata nu wanera sen ziasai kapinoisonua, ota tera sen awa dasai kapinoisonua awa. Ema zo nu saniro patai te oko inoisonua.
41005005	Pi sero waiko sero nu bi ditira noise dirumura noise arinoise nutope omata meni kapinoisonua.
41005006	Nu ami aikera ena itimite Yesu giro sumuro muro Yesura nana ena duro koiniro
41005007	zawa gatero ego senua awa, “Yesu, ni Anutu ike itewia amira Mai, ami namore ne wamu tupesi? Na Anutura giti mokara toise ni na oko dasise tona.”
41005008	Ema ago senua, nera kota, Yesu numore emoko ego senua awa, “Bi, ni ema ewa doro bamu.”
41005009	Yesu meni nu atata wero senua awa, “Zazo ni aweni?” Ago senu ina ego senua awa, “Zazo naso Diti Bamu. Nera kota, nakare witai-bake.”
41005010	Ago sero ge beina-baina wero Yesure begomo senua awa, “Bi esenasa aike oko bayare.”
41005011	Are nata pu saisai dirumu demabera nena kau inoise itiwa giro
41005012	bi meni Yesure begomo sero ego sewa awa, “Nakare esenasa pura nana toyanekare.”
41005013	Ago sewa giro Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ago weu.” Ago senu bi meni emara nana ena kei awero doro pura nana toiwa pu meni sumuro degara baro ou ubura dagimuro ou niro betewa awa. Pu amira namba nusokare awa 2,000.
41005014	Pu dia wai ema ami bozero baro ema nate itiwa amire sero ema wo bowe itiwa amire sewa giro nukare tani kei awenua awa gamu sero muwa.
41005015	Nukare Yesu nana muro ema gita bi saisai nuso nana itiwa ami mo awero kotumai kokopai puro arumuro itinua awa giro azu wewa.
41005016	Ema eni tani emara nana kei awenu giwa ami ge tugata wewa. Ota tani pure kei awenua amira uge dai tugata wewa.
41005017	Ago wewa erama meni Yesure begomo sero zebu nusokare doro bayaise sewa awa.
41005018	Yesu wara wititinoinu ema gita bi nuso nana itiwa ami Yesure begomo sero numore dai nuamu senua.
41005019	Ata Yesu meni “Tepo” asero numore ego senua awa, “Dubu nisora nana baro Tua meni ni awa-diro tani kokopai nimore wetia awa se gare.”
41005020	Ago senu nu baro zebu zazo Dekapolis (ge nasokaira, “Nata wana eto”) amira kei awero tani Yesu meni numore wenua amira ge tugata-magata wasai erama dapikarago be anero ge nuso gege ninitinoisowa awa.
41005021	Yesu wara witiro ou ubu noko semuro enibara kei awero kora itinu erama dainiro meni nuso nana kei awewa.
41005022	Kei awero itiwa yere ibu simai ema zo zazo nuso Yairo ami Yesu giro nuso nana baro koiniro
41005023	ge beina wero begomo sero ego senua awa, “Mai bama diri naso kiaka ami betamu sero inoya. Ni mu. Ni mai kora wamu sero giro wana niso nuso nana tame potasa nu kokopai wero nuamunoya, awa gosinona.”
41005024	Ago senu Yesu meni numore dai bamunua. Susaunu erama dainiro meni numore dai noise nu soe potiro puro susauwa.
41005025	Are bama zo numorekare dai susaunua ami inua giro noe donu zepa 12 tepo wenu inua gaira orara nuso kaka touwamu.
41005026	Nu gita dokta saisai amira nana bayasai nukare bua wasara te kaka wamu wasai nu yaya bamubake tapinoisonua awa. Nu wau moni nuso dapikarago potinu tepo wenua, ata yaya kaka tepo wamu. Yaya bamubake kei awinoisonua.
41005027	Are nu ami Yesura oziga niniro erama diti bamu amira nana gate-gate wero Yesu nana atune kei awero
41005028	nutope ego kotumunua awa, “Na tama woi nuso kimuro ewanana wamunona.”
41005029	Ago kotumuro kei awero Yesura mo kimunu orara nuso eya touwenu Yesu meni nu kora wenu yaya tepo wenua awa ginua.
41005030	Ago wenu Yesu meni kora waira putou eni nuso nana ena bamunua awa enia wero erama diti bamu amira nana soe ena eya kapeteniro ego senua awa, “Agai tama woi naso kimi?”
41005031	Ago senu bua mai nuso meni numore ego sewa awa, “Erama diti bamu meni ni musinora, ata ni ‘agai na kimi?’ asero atata inosua.”
41005032	Ago sewa ata Yesu meni, “Ai meni na kimi?” asero gamu sero gina-gana wenua.
41005033	Ata bama ami tani Yesu meni numore wenua awa giro azu wero boro-boro inoise Yesu nana muro te nusora duro susu nuso kereniro numore senua awa.
41005034	Ago wenu giro Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Mia naka, ni tuma diai nisora ewanana wetesa. Are ni yawa sara inoise bamuyo. Yaya niso oko ewesemamunoya.”
41005035	Yesu meni ago toise itinu ema eni meni simai emara nana sora ena muro ego sewa awa, “Mai bama diri niso betetia. Ni nogoro bua bamu gipai emare potamu tosi?”
41005036	Ago sewa, ata Yesu meni ge toiwa awa ninidanago wero yere ibu simai emare ego senua awa, “Kotumu-katumu oko wase. Tuma diaire gege noiyo.”
41005037	Ago sero nukare dapikarago numore dai bayai azu sero Petoro ata Yakoboto nami nuso Yohanere ami gege numore dai bayarise senua.
41005038	Nukare baro yere ibu simaira sora kei awero Yesu meni erama saisai pasi inoise itiwa awa ginua. Ema bama di toise dibe inoise itiwa.
41005039	Ago inoiwa giro Yesu sora toiro numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nogoro pasi inoise di towi? Mai awa kaka betamu. Nu gitawa inoya.”
41005040	Ago senu nukare nu sero ziwa. Ata nu nukare eseninu so doro bamuwa nu maira mamato miere ata ema numore dai itiwa awa puro masi mai itinua amira toinua.
41005041	Toiro maira wana ziro numore Yuda gera ego senua awa, “Talita kumi.” Ge amira susu ego ewa: “Mai kiaka, erasise tona.”
41005042	Ago senu mai meni eya eriro aita wenua. Zepa nuso 12. Erama meni eya di tainiro yaka asewa.
41005043	Yesu meni nukare susu awa ema enire sai azu ge zewai senua. Ago sero nukare nena nai maire potarise senua awa.
41006001	Yesu meni nata awa doro nata nusora bamunua. Bua mai nuso meni numore dai bamuwa.
41006002	Are Sabat pura kei awenu giro nu yere ibu du toiro ge tugata inoinu ema bama saisai meni ge nuso niniro di tainiro ego sewa awa, “Ema awa kotumai awa nana ena tapitai? Kotumai zewaine nuso nana kei awitai? Nu nogo wero tani erama gita kaka gamu awa inowi?
41006003	Ema ewa nu kapenda. Nu Mariara mai awa. Nu Yakobora Yosefera Yudara Simonra nami. Nubabumana nuso namorekai dai nowera.” Ago sero nukare Yesure kotumai waya pumuro duba mou wewa.
41006004	Ata Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Porofete nukare ema zazore. Ata nata nusokarera ena, o dubu nusokarera nana ena, o mama nusokarera nana ena, awa nukare ema zazore tepo.” Ago senua awa.
41006005	Nu tani erama gita kaka gamu awa nusokare nana ena wai ine te kaka wamu wenua. Ata nu wana nuso meni ema yayare da da amira nana potinu yaya nusokare tepo wenua awa.
41006006	“Nukare nogoro na tuma kaka diamu inori?” ago kotumuro nu aita wero nata kikinakara baro ge tugata wenua awa.
41006007	Yesu meni bua mai 12 zawa senu muwa bi tunaira putou awa numorekare potiro nukare eto-eto baro teya-taya warise sero nu numorekare ego senua awa,
41006008	“Ebatara nena zo oko pumawe. Wo ma tepo, kaita tepo, wau moni tepo. Ketu gege pumuwo.
41006009	Te mokara sandol wosunamunowa, ata tama woi eto oko wosunawe.
41006010	Nikare esewa wero nata zora baro so da amira toiro itise muro baro awinoma nata awa duamu sero amire so awa dowo.
41006011	Nata zo meni nikare sawa kaka diamu, o ge nisokare kaka ninamu wara giro nata awa doro susu nusokare garise sero zebu nusokare te moka nisokarera itia awa deregi weu osae.”
41006012	Ago senu giro bua mai 12 ami baro eramare ego sewa awa, “Nikare duba kapeteniu.”
41006013	Ago sero sero bi saisai tunero gawi eni ema yayare saisai amira nana zozasara yaya nusokare tepo inoisonua awa.
41006014	Yesura oziga baro ema bama dapikarago zebu sero amira te wenua. Ago wenu ema tua zo zazo nuso Herode ami Yesura oziga nininua. Ema eni meni Yesure ego toisowa awa, “Nu Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema. Nune ami betaira ena erinua, are nu tani putoure inowia.”
41006015	Eni meni ago toisowa, ata eni meni ego toisowa awa, “Nu Elia.” Ota eni meni ego toisowa awa, “Nu porofete zo. Porofete gita noisowa ago ine.” Ago toisowa awa.
41006016	Ata Herode meni Yesura tani amira ge niniro ego senua awa, “Na ge sesena nukare Yohanera duba kapetera giti osisia, ata nu noko eriro noya.”
41006017	Herode meni ago senua, nera kota, gita nu soldia senu baro Yohane beniro puro poti benai sora niwa. Herode meni tani awa Herodia emo wenua, amira susu ego ewa: Herode meni nami nuso Filipra bama puro atinua awa. Bama amira zazo Herodia.
41006018	Ago wenu giro Yohane meni Herodere ego senua awa, “Ni nami nisora bama amire nowesa, awa te oko inoya. Lo ge itia.”
41006019	Yohane meni ago senu giro Herodia meni dumu wero Herode nu Yohane daise toisonua.
41006020	Ata Herode meni tani awa kaka wamu. Nera kota, nu Yohane emo azu inoisonua. Herode meni Yohane nu ema saramai, nu ema pasina kaka wamu, awa giro azu wero soinoisonua awa. Yohane nu ge sasai Herode meni niniro itazaita wero kotumu-katumu inoisonua, ata nu Yohanera ge ninamu yaba inoisonua awa.
41006021	Ata Herodia meni Yohane dai betaira be awa tamunua. Herode meni mia nu pumunua amira be awa kei awenu giro nu ema babezinoma nuso ata soldiara giti kopi eni ata Galilaya zebura ema babezinoma eni ami emo ana-bona wenua.
41006022	Be amire Herodia meni Yohane dai betaira ebata tamunua. Awa ego ewa: Mai bama diri nuso meni Herodera ibura toiro yawa bamubake wienu Herode ata esewa numore dai itiwa ami giro yawa sara wewa. Ago wero giro Herode meni mai kanoware ego senua awa, “Ni nena zota zo yaba wero sasa giro potamunona.
41006023	Na Anutura giti mokara sana zewai wae. Ni nena zota zo emo sasa giro potamunona awa. Zebu naso agewa emo samunosa, awa potamunona.”
41006024	Ago senu nu so doro baro mia nusore ego senua awa, “Na ne potaise samunoni?” Ago senu mia nuso meni ego senua awa, “Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema amira giti nimore potaise samunosa.”
41006025	Ago senu nu eya sumuro Herode nana baro ego senua awa, “Zeme-zemeke ni Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema amira giti tewara potiro potasa pumane.”
41006026	Ago senu Herode meni kotumunu te kaka wamu wenu duba mou wenua. Ata nu Anutura nana giti mokara ge senu zewai wenua, noko ema dai itiwa amira nana ge nuso osago wai azu,
41006027	nu soldia zo meni Yohanera giti kapero puro maise senu baro benai sora ena duba nuso kapero
41006028	giti tewara potiro puro baro mai bama dirire potinu puro mia nusore potinua awa.
41006029	Ago wewa Yohanera bua mai meni tani amira oziga niniro giro baro woi nuso pumuro puro baro bi ditira potiwa awa.
41006030	Ema Yesu meni iyetinua ami Yesu nana ena auniro ge tugata inoise bua wewa awa dapikarago numore sewa awa.
41006031	Ota erama saisai Yesu nana muro baro awinoiwa Yesu ata bua mai nusore nena naira be tepo wenua. Ago wenu giro Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Mukai. Nakai imata baro so erama tepora ena zanatianekai.”
41006032	Ago sero nukare wara witiro so erama tepo amira bayamu susauwa
41006033	erama saisai nata serora ami nukare susauwa giro kora-kora ama ganero bamuwa awa.
41006034	Yesu wa doro witi ete niro ema diti bamubake awa giro nukare emo zo amunua. Nera kota, nukare pu mamai meni mia kau inoise nowera ago ine. Ago giro zo amuro nu nukare ge tugata-magata inoinu
41006035	tua zizinoinu giro bua mai nuso meni nuso nana zorage muro numore ego sewa awa, “So ewa so waya. Nena nai tepo. Tua zizinoya,
41006036	are ni ema bama duasa baro nena nai nusokare pumamu nata zora-zara itera amira bayare.”
41006037	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Ninekare nena nai potiu nare.” Ago senu nukare numore ego sewa awa, “Nakare baro ame moyai 200 kina meni zuma gaero numorekare potanakare narise tosa?”
41006038	Ago sewa nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ame moyai nikare nazo ni? Bamuu, gawe.” Ago senu nukare baro giro noko muro ego sewa awa, “Ame wana dare wo etore gege itera.”
41006039	Ago sewa nu eramare ego senua awa, “Nikare dubu sero dopero gras uwiwai tame arumuu.”
41006040	Ago senu nukare dubu sero arumuwa; dubu eni erama 100, dubu eni erama 50, ago wero arumuwa awa.
41006041	Yesu meni ame wana dare wo etore puro iri utura niro Anuture kokopai asero ame awa eweweniro bua maire potinua awa. Awa bua mai meni eramare potarise sero ago wenua awa. Nu wo eto puro totoumuro kanowenu erama dapikarago ami pumuwa.
41006042	Nukare dapikarago niwa te wenua awa.
41006043	Ago wero nukare ame itatare wo itatare dara potiwa kana 12 te wenua.
41006044	Ema nena niwa amira namba nusokare awa 5,000.
41006045	Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nikare wara witiro ziriniro enibara Besaida nate gita bayamunowa. Na ema bama bozarise sero duamunona.”
41006046	Ago sero nu nukare gita iyetinu bamuwa nu isa samu sero dirumura witinua awa.
41006047	Are tua zinu wa ou ubu soe tiara noinu Yesu imata ete itinua.
41006048	Ago itimite bisi meni nukare dero pumunu nukare wa dawaira yaya tapinoiwa awa ginua. Ago giro pina atamu inoinu amire nu ou ubu tame aita wero nusokare nana bayamu sero bamunua. Nu nukare dainamu sero inoinu
41006049	nukare nu ou tame aita inoinua awa giro nu ititi zota asero zawa gatewa.
41006050	Nukare zawa gatewa. Awa nera kota, nukare nu giro azu wero wetu wana zipewa. Ago wewa giro nu numorekare eya ego senua awa, “Nikare zewai wewo. Nama awa. Azu oko wawe.”
41006051	Ago sero nu wara witinu so bisi denua. Ago wenu nukare yaka asewa.
41006052	Nera kota, nukare tani Yesu meni ame eramare potinua amira susu kaka gamu. Giti munu nusokare omata me omata ine.
41006053	Nukare ou ubu semuro bamu zebu zazo Genesaret amira niro wa isewa witinua awa.
41006054	Ago wero wa doro witiwa erama Yesu gai ami nu giro
41006055	nata zora-zora itiwa amira sumuro ema bama keziawewenai goga gaero zuaniro, Yesu ago itia, asero ago potiwa awa.
41006056	So dapikarago Yesu meni bamunua — nata kikinaka, o nata babezinoma, o so nata tepo — so amira erama meni ema bama keziawewenai puro ebete potiwa ema bama yayare meni Yesu begomo sero mo be nuso gege kimamu sewa. Ema bama kimuwa amira yaya tepo wenua awa.
41007001	Farisayo eni ata lo ge gipai ema eni Yerusalem ena muwa ami Yesu nana auniwa.
41007002	Auniro bua mai nuso meni wana saramai tepo, wana kaka sewamu nena ninoiwa awa giwa.
41007003	Wana sewaira tani amira susu ego ewa. Yuda ema dapikarago, Farisayo dai, nukare nena tepo oko ninowera. Nukare ewowo nusokarera sienai ama ganero wana sewero amire nena ninowera awa.
41007004	Nukare maketra ena ewesemuro gita ou gutero amire ama nena ninowera. Nukare ewowora sienai eure-taure inoise akoure teware aure sewinowera.
41007005	Are Farisayo ata lo ge gipai ema ami Yesu atata wero sewa awa, “Bua mai niso meni nogoro ewowora sienai awa doro noweri?”
41007006	Ago sewa nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare opi ema me sao inowewa. Porofete Yesaya meni ge gaenua ami nikare pupinoya. Ge gaenua awa ego ewa, Tua meni ego toya: Erama emi na begiti meni bowi inowera, ata moka nusokare naso nana oko itia.
41007007	Nukare emara ge awa Anutura lo ge ine asero sero gipero awinowera. Are nukare na bowi wero zainitinowera. Yesaya meni ago gaenua awa.”
41007008	Yesu meni ago sero amire ge susumuro ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutura lo ge doro eramara wini ge puro ziro baititinowewa.” Ago senua awa.
41007009	Yesu meni ge zo noko numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutura lo ge apero doro ewowora tani ama ganero nowewa, awa kotumuro kokopai asinowewa, atonua!
41007010	Na ago tona, nera kota, Mose meni ego senua awa, Ni tani kokopai mia mama nisore inoise noiyo. Noko, Zo nu mia mama nusore ge waya samunoya, nu awa deu betae.
41007011	Mose meni ago senua, ata nikare ego towewa awa: Zo nu mia mama nusore ego sai te wamunoya awa, ‘Na nena nimoreto potamena, ata na nena awa Koban asena.’ (Koban amira susu ego ewa: “Na nena awa Anuture potamu sena zewai wenua.”)
41007012	Mai zo ago samunoya, awa nikare nu mia mama soremai azu towewa.
41007013	Ago wero nikare Anutura lo ge poti ama niro ewowora tani poti gita niro maire gipinowewa. Tani saisai ago ine inowewa.” Ago senua awa.
41007014	Yesu meni ago sero ema bama noko zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Ge sana niniu. Nikare dapikarago niniro baitiu.
41007015	Nena be nisokarera toitinowia ami oko nikare wawi bemitire inowewa. Ge be nisokarera ena kei awinowia ami nikare wawi bemitire inowewa awa. [
41007016	Zo nu danare meni ge awa ninaise.]” Ago senua awa.
41007017	Ago sero ema bama doro bua maire dai sora toiro bua mai meni ge bezaira susu gamu sero nu atata wewa awa.
41007018	Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Agoro nikare dai kaka gamu inowewita? Nikare susu ei awa gosinowita? Nena nai meni bera toiro nikare oko wawi bemitire inowewa.
41007019	Nera kota, nena nai ami duba nisokarera oko toitinowia. Nena awa tini nisokarera bamuro eba nusora osisinowia.” Yesu meni ge awa toise nena nai dapikarago siro beto wenua.
41007020	Ago sero amire ego senua awa, “Tani emara nana dubara ena kei awinowia ami ema awa wawi bemitire inowia.
41007021	Nera kota, emara nana mokara ena, o emara dubara ena kotumai waya meni kei awinowera — kuma wai, bewana wai, mai dai betai, soa patai,
41007022	duba-duba wai, tani waya wai, opi sai, gai waya wai, wiza atata wai, tama puro witai, wini ge dero nuai —
41007023	tani awa dapikarago emara nana mokara ena kei awero ema awa wawi bemitire inowia.” Ago senua awa.
41007024	Yesu meni ana eriro bamu zebu zo nata zazo Taya itisonua amira niro so zora toiro itise ema bama nu ago itinua awa gai azu senua, ata nu nutope begi wai ine tepo.
41007025	Ago inoinu bama zo meni Yesura oziga nininua. Bama amira mai bama diri kiaka ami bi nuso nana itinua awa. Bama ami kei awe Yesu nana niro koininua.
41007026	Ota bama awa nu Yudako. Zebu nusora zazo Sirofonisia. Are nu Yesure begomo sero nu mai nusora bi tunaise senu
41007027	Yesu meni numore ge bezai ego senua awa, “Na nena mai mamaire gita potana nara te wae. Nera kota, mai mamaira nena nai soero suna unai ine awa te oko inoya.”
41007028	Ago senu giro bama meni ina ge bezai ego senua awa, “Tua, awa me tosa. Ata suna opa du itise nena mumuka mai meni wawera osawi ninowera.”
41007029	Ago senu giro Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ge ewanana sesesa, are sora bamuyo. Bi meni mai niso doro bamia.” Ago senua awa.
41007030	Ago senu bama meni noko tera nuso nana baro bi bamunu mai nuso duro itinua awa ginua.
41007031	Yesu meni ana eriro zebu nata Taya itinua awa doro nata Saidon busero zebu zazo Dekapolis awa busero kei awe ou ubu zo zazo Galilaya amira ninua.
41007032	Ago itinu ema eni meni ema zo puro muro poti Yesura nana niwa awa. Ema awa dana azai, ge tepo. Ema meni ema awa puro Yesu meni nu kimuro kora waise sero begomo sewa.
41007033	Ago wewa giro Yesu meni ema awa puro ema bama doro baro dopero wana sisino emara nana danara potiro pora pisero wana meni emara iwawa kimuro
41007034	iri ike niro usika apero emare ego senua awa, “Epata.” (Ge nasokaira, “Dana keyaise.”)
41007035	Ago senu dana keenu be peu wenu ge neine senua awa.
41007036	Ago wenu giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare tani emira oziga sai azu tona.” Ago sasai nukare weso-waso wero oziga toisowa.
41007037	Ema bama eni meni niniro di tainiro titibi awero ego sewa awa, “Nu tani dapikarago neine inowia. Nu wawi ema dana azai meni ge noko ninitinowera, ota ema ge tepo ami ge noko towera.” Ago sewa awa.
41008001	Waiko be zore ema bama dainiro meni Yesu nana auniro nena nai tepo itiwa giro nu bua mai nuso zawa senu muwa ego senua awa,
41008002	“Na ema bama emo zo inoya. Nera kota, nukare be etorobara namore dai nora nena nai tepo wetia.
41008003	Are na nena numorekare kaka potamu tepo iyetamunona, awa nukare susauma ebete ena meri betero duwamunora. Nukare eni so zora-zarako ena mutara.”
41008004	Ago senu bua mai meni numore ego sewa awa, “Nakai soe ena nogo nogo wero ema bamera nena nai tamuro potamunonikai?”
41008005	Ago sewa senua awa, “Nikare ame moyai nazo ni?” Ago senu sewa awa, “Nakare ame moyai 7.” Ago sewa awa.
41008006	Are Yesu meni ema bama zebura arumarise senu arumuwa nu ame moyai 7 awa puro Anuture kokopai asero ame awa eweweniro bua maire potinua awa. Bua mai meni eramare potarise sero potinu puro ema bamere potiwa.
41008007	Ota wo kikinaka nusokare eni itiwa giro Yesu meni wo emo Anuture kokopai asero bua maire ego senua awa, “Wo dai ema bamere potiu.” Ago senua awa.
41008008	Are potiwa niwa te wenua. Te wenu giro itata poti dara niwa kana 7 te wenua awa.
41008009	Erama nena niwa amira namba nusokare awa 4,000.
41008010	Niwa amire Yesu meni nukare senu bamuwa. Bamuwa nu bua mai nusore wara witiro zebu zazo Dalimanuta amira bamuwa awa.
41008011	Farisayo eni meni Yesu nana muro numore dai ge bawewa awa. Nukare Yesu gaero gamu sero nu tani zo utura putoure wai gamu sewa.
41008012	Sewa Yesu meni ge nusokare ginu biawa wenu giro ego senua awa, “Ema zeme zebura nowera ami nogoro tani putoure zo gamu tori? Na ge me tona ewa. Ema zeme zebura nowera ami tani putoure zo oko gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
41008013	Ago sero nu nukare doro wara noko witiro ou ubu enibara bamunua awa.
41008014	Bua mai nuso meni ame kaka pumamu nuweniwa. Ame da gege numorekare dai wara itinua.
41008015	Are Yesu meni dana-wena gayai ge numorekare toise ego senua awa, “Nikare uma weu. Farisayora yis ata Herodera yis ami semu nisokare nana nai azu, nikare uma wero baititinoise noiwo.” Ago senua awa.
41008016	Nukare ge nuso awa niniro ina-sa wewa awa, “Nakai ame tepo.”
41008017	Ago~sewa nukare Farisayora gipai ge kota, ame nai awa kotupitinoiwa giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai ame tepo awa nogoro towi? Nikare zeme kaka gamu ni? Gitimunu nisokare omata ine ni?
41008018	Nikare giti mokare, ata nikare kaka gamu ni? Nikare danare, ata nikare kaka ninamu ni? Nikare nuwenitawita?
41008019	Na ema 5,000 emo ame wana da ewewenisena be amire nikare itatara kana nazo diisewi?” Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Kana 12 diisenakare.”
41008020	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na erama 4,000 emo ame 7 ewewenena nikare itatara kana nazo diisewi?” Ago senu sewa awa, “Kana 7 diisenakare.”
41008021	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Nikare zeme kaka gamu ni?” Ago senua awa.
41008022	Yesu bua mai nusore kei awe nata Besaida amira niwa ema eni meni ema giti guma wai zo puro Yesura nana muro Yesu meni nu kimaise sewa awa.
41008023	Ago sewa giro Yesu meni ema giti guma wai amira wana ziro puro nata doro baro be pora giti mokara pisero wana giti mokara potiro atata wero senua awa, “Nena zo gosinosita?”
41008024	Ago senu nu giti panero ina ego senua awa, “Na erama gosinona. Na nukare gena ni ipu ine inora, ata nukare aita inora.”
41008025	Ago senu giro Yesu meni wana nuso giti mokara noko potinu ema awa ua wenu giti moka nuso kokopai wenu nu nena dapikarago giro baitinua awa.
41008026	Ago wenu giro Yesu meni nu iyetamu sero ego senua awa, “Ni noko nata emira oko bayase. Ata niso nana bamu.” Ago senua awa.
41008027	Yesu bua mai nusore dai nata eni zebu zazo Sisaria-Filipai ago itiwa amira bamuwa. Susaumite Yesu meni bua mai atata wero senua awa, “Erama meni na are asinoweri?”
41008028	Ago senu ina sewa awa, “Eni meni ego tora: Ni Yohane ge ou gutai zaawai ema. Ata eni meni awa ego tora: Ni Elia. Ata eni meni awa ego tora: Ni porofete gita noisowa amira zo.”
41008029	Ago sewa giro nu nukare atata wero senua awa, “Ina ninekare nitopekare na are asinowewi?” Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Ni Kristo, Soyai Ema nasokare.”
41008030	Ago senu Yesu numorekare ge zewai ego senua awa, “Ge naso awa ema zore oko sawe.” Ago senua awa.
41008031	Yesu meni nukare ge tugata wamu sero ego senua awa, “Na Emara Mai meni yaya-buyaya tamamunona. Yuda emara simai ata pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema ami na azu sero na dara betamunona awa. Betana be etorobara tepo wai amire na noko seka wero eramunona.”
41008032	Ge awa senu kei awenu giwa. Are Petoro meni nu uzumuro senero ego senua awa, “Ago oko sase.”
41008033	Ago senu Yesu meni kapeteniro bua mai nuso eni giro ina Petoro senero ego senua awa, “Satan, ni na doro daiti. Ni ge tosa awa Anutura ge kota, emara ge inoya.” Ago senua awa.
41008034	Yesu meni bua mai nuso ata ema diti bamu awa zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Zo nu na ama ganamu wero giro ara tamai nuso dapikarago doro duba naire yaya tamaire amira ni pasinai nuso dimuro na ama ganaise.
41008035	Nera kota, zo nu zebura nuai nuso soero puro nuamu kotumamunoya amira nuai nuso tepo wamunoya. Ota zo nu na emo wero o Oziga Ewanana emo wero zebura nuai nuso duamunoya ami nuai ewanana tamamunoya.
41008036	Zo nu zebura nena kokopai dapikarago awa pupinuamunoya, ata nuai nuso tepo wamunoya, awa nena nemi nuso nana itamunoi?
41008037	Ota nuai nuso ewesemaise kotumuro zuma ne potai amire nuai nuso awa ina ewese nuso nana namunoi? Tepo awa.
41008038	Ema pasina inoise Anutu soa patitinoise zebura nowera be amire ema zo meni na ata ge naso awa azu samunoya, awa na Emara Mai meni Mama nasora zasimaire angelo saramaire mamunona be amire na ina ema awa azu samunona.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
41009001	Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema eni ego dopero itera ami kaka betamu nuara Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira putou kei damu nai gamunora.” Ago senua awa.
41009002	Waiko be 6 tepo wenu amire Yesu meni Petoroto Yakobore ata Yohane awa gege puro dirumu bamura witiwa Yesura tama meni giti moka nusokarera ewe wenua awa.
41009003	Mo nuso meni koa-koa wenua. Mo nuso awa kapa me kapa wai. Ema zo meni mo sewai ago wai ine tepo.
41009004	Bua mai nuso meni Eliato Mosere nuto Yesure dai ge toise itiwato awa giwa.
41009005	Giro Petoro meni Yesure ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, nakai ego itenakai awa ewanana. Are ninasa nakare komboa etorobara sinanekare — zo niso, zo Mosera, zo Eliara.”
41009006	Petoro meni ne sei wero ge awa senua. Nera kota, nukare bua mai meni azu bamubake wewa.
41009007	Ago inoiwa bereze zo meni muro nukare gogowenua. Ago wenu ge zo bereze amira mokara ena ego kei awenu niniwa awa, “Awa mai naso. Nu wama naso. Ge nuso niniu.”
41009008	Bua mai meni ge awa niniro eya gina-gana wero erama zo kaka gamu wero Yesu gege numorekare dai itinua awa giwa.
41009009	Yesu bua mai nusore dirumura ena osero susaumite nu numorekare ge zewai toise ego senua awa, “Nikare tani gewa amira ge oko sawe. Na Emara Mai meni betero erana amire nikare ge awa sawa te wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41009010	Are nukare Yesura zewai ge dimuwa. Ata nukare Yesu betero eramunoya amira gera susu gamu sero kotumu-katumu wewa.
41009011	Ago inoise nu atata wero sewa awa, “Lo ge gipai ema meni ego towera, ‘Elia gita mai amire Kristo mamunoya.’ Nogoro ago toweri?”
41009012	Ago sewa giro Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Elia nu gita muro nena bamubamu dapikarago korawai amire Kristo mamunoya. Na Emara Maire ge ego gaewa itewia ewa, Nu yaya-buyaya tamamunoya. Nukare nu sero ziamunora awa. Nogoro ge awa gaewa itewi?
41009013	Ata na nimorekare tona ewa. Elia munua. Munu giro ema eni meni numore tani tebe-tabe wewa. Ge numore gaewa ago ine te wewa.” Ago senua awa.
41009014	Nukare osero muro kei awe bua mai enira nana niro ema diti bamu bua maire dai itiwa giwa. Lo ge gipai ema eni meni bua maire ge bawero itiwa.
41009015	Are ema bama meni Yesu tupinu giro mamaniro sumuro baro areniwa awa.
41009016	Ago wewa Yesu meni nukare atata wero senua awa, “Nikare ge ne numorekare dai towi?”
41009017	Ago senu diti bamu itiwa amira ema zo meni numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, na mai mata naso puro niso nana mena. Nera kota, bi nuso nana toiro itawi nu ge amu itewia.
41009018	Mai nago-nago nuawi bi meni nu daramunawi duro pora gutero di wiawi tama aiso nuso zewai-zawai inowia. Are na bua mai niso meni bi tunarise sesena, ata nukare tunai ine tepo.” Ago senua awa.
41009019	Ago senu Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “O nikare ema bama tuma diai tepo. Na be nazo nimorekare dai nuamunoni? Na be nazo bua nisokarera tama doinoise nuamunoni? Mai puro naso nana muu.”
41009020	Ago senu nukare mai puro nuso nana muwa bi meni Yesu giro mai darauninu duro pora gutinoise aziapinoinu
41009021	Yesu meni maira mama atata wero senua awa, “Be nazo yaya awa puro nowi?” Ago senu ina senua awa, “Nu mai morua amire pumunua.
41009022	Are bi meni mai betaise sero nu dawi oura o niaora duwitinowia awa. Ata ni yaya awa kora wai ine te wamunoya, awa ni nakare emo zo wero nakare soremu.”
41009023	Ago senu giro Yesu meni bera pumuro ego senua awa, “Na yaya awa kora wai ine te wamunoita, asinosita? Ema zo nu tuma diaire ami tani dapikarago wai te inoya.”
41009024	Ago senu maira mama meni eya ego senua awa, “Na ni tuma didinona, ata ni na soremasa na ni tuma diro baitane.” Ago senua awa.
41009025	Are Yesu meni ema bama witai nuso nana sumuro tupiwa giro nu bi senero ego senua awa, “Ni bi ge amu wai, o dana azai, na nimore ge zewai tona ewa. Ni mai doro nuso nana noko oko toyase.” Ago senua awa.
41009026	Ago senu bi meni zawa gaetero mai denu zewai-zawai aziamunu bi nu donu mai betai ine wenua. Ago wenu ema bama saisai meni giro ego sewa awa, “Mai betetia.” Ago sewa,
41009027	ata Yesu meni maira wana ziro zinu erinua.
41009028	Yesu bua maire dai sora toiro bua mai meni erama zo tepo giro nu atata wero sewa awa, “Nakare bi awa tunamu wetenakare nogoro te kaka wamu weti?”
41009029	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nakai bi ago ine tunamu sero isa saira bua gege wero tuninowenakai. Tunaira ebata zo tepo.” Ago senua awa.
41009030	Nukare ana eriro baro zebu zazo Galilaya awa busewa. Ata Yesu meni nukare susauwa awa ema bama meni gai azu senua.
41009031	Azu senua, nera kota, nu bua mai nuso gipinoise ego senua awa, “Nukare na Emara Mai awa puro ema enira nana wanera potara na dara betamunona. Betero be etorobara tepo wai amire eramunona.” Ago senua awa.
41009032	Ata nukare ge nusora susu kaka gamu. Noko nukare nu atata wai azu wewa awa.
41009033	Nukare susaumite bamu Kapaneam niro sora toiro itiwa amire Yesu meni nukare atata wero senua awa, “Nikare ebete ena ge nogo sesewi?”
41009034	Yesu ago atata wenua, ata nukare ge ina kaka samu. Nera kota, nukare ebete ena ego sewa awa, “Nasokai nana zo agai meni bamu inoi?” Ago sewa awa.
41009035	Are Yesu meni arumuro bua mai nuso 12 zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni gita wamu samunoya, nu ami ama waise. Nu ema dapikarago amira sou waise.”
41009036	Ago sero amire nu mai zo puro poti soe niro mai saniro numorekare ego senua awa,
41009037	“Ema zo meni mai zo ego ine na emo kora wamunoya, nu ami na kora wetia ago ine wamunoya. Ema zo na kora wamunoya ami na daba kota, nu na iyetinu osena awa dai kora wetia ago ine wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41009038	Yohane meni numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, nakare ema zo namorekai dai kaka nuamu ami zazo niso zawa toise bi tuninoi goisenakare. Ata nu nakai kaka ama ganamu inowia, are duaise sisenakare.”
41009039	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Bua duaise awa oko sawe. Nera kota, ema zo meni zazo naso zawa toise tani putoure zo wamunoya ami eya zazo naso puro osai ine te kaka wamu wamunoya.
41009040	Ema iwo namorekai kaka wamu awa otao nasokai awa.
41009041	Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema zo meni nikare Kristora mai wero nowewa awa giro ou nai nimorekare potamunoya ami ina zuma nuso ewanana pumamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41009042	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Zo nu mai kikinaka na tuma didinowera amira nana zo uzutai pasina tamai azu, nikare bere-bere omata bamubake zo ema amira nana dube kimeniro ewa surura musunawa dagimai te wamia. Nera kota, ema ami pasina kaka wamure oura dagimuro betamunoya, awa nena peu gege. Ota nu pasina wai amire Anutu meni ina potamunoya, awa nena mou-mau.
41009043	Ni wana zo meni pasina wamesaya, wana awa kapase. Ni wana daimatare gege noma ama utura baro nuasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni wana etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya. [
41009044	So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.]
41009045	Ni te zo meni pasina wamesaya, te awa kapase. Ni te daimatare gege noma ama utura baro nuasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni te etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya awa. [
41009046	So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.]
41009047	Ni giti moka zo meni pasina wamesaya, giti moka awa gusase. Ni giti moka daimatare gege noma ama Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira nate bayasa ewanana wamunoya awa. Ata ni giti moka etore noma ama so niao awai gege awaira bayasa waya wamunoya awa.
41009048	So waya amira zipa meni oko betinora. So amira niao oko osisinoya.
41009049	Nakai ewa puro nena naira tetawenakai ewanana inowia awa. Da ago ine yaya niao ine ami erama dapikarago ewanana wawise tetamunoya.
41009050	Ima awa nena kokopai. Ata ima berusa wamunoya, awa nakai nogo wanakai bapu nuso ewanana kei awamunoi? Nakai ewa puro nena tame tetawenakai ewanana inowia, da ago ine nikare duba-ozaire nuawa ewanana wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41010001	Yesu bua mai nusore dai ana eriro bamu zebu zazo Yudaya amira niro noko doro bamu zebu ou Yodan enibara itinua amira niwa ema diti bamu meni nuso nana noko kei awasara nu numorekare utura ge gipinoisonua awa.
41010002	Farisayo eni meni nuso nana kei awero nu gaero gamu sero atata wero sewa awa, “Ema meni bama nuso duai ine te inoita?”
41010003	Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Mose meni lo ge nimorekare potiro nogo senu?”
41010004	Ago senu nukare sewa awa, “Mose meni ego senua awa: Ema zo bama nuso duamu sero giro bama duaira pas zo gaero amire bama duaise. Mose meni ago senua awa.” Ago sewa awa.
41010005	Ata Yesu numorekare ego senua awa, “Gigai nisokarera Mose meni ge awa nikare emo gaenua.
41010006	Ota Anutu meni nena dapikarago tapinoise emare bamere tamunua.
41010007	Are ema meni mia mama nuso doro bama nusore dai gamuro baitiro
41010008	nuto dubare tamare da wero nuamunorato. Are nuto eto kota, daimata wero nuamunorato.
41010009	Anutu meni nuto dara potinu atiwato, are erama meni oko kaparise.” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
41010010	Nukare sora toiro itiwa bua mai nuso meni gera susu gamu sero nu atata wewa.
41010011	Atata wewa giro nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni ara nuso doro bama seka atamunoya, awa nu pasina wamunoya.
41010012	Ota bama zo meni iu nuso doro ema zo atamunoya, awa nu pasina wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
41010013	Ema bama eni meni mai pei-mamai Yesu meni kimaise sero nuso nana puro tupiwa bua mai nuso meni ema bama senewa.
41010014	Ata Yesu meni giro dumu wero bua maire ego senua awa, “Nikare mai pei-mamai dou naso nana mare. Ebata nusokare oko gazawe. Ago ine ami Anutura nata amira gegenai.
41010015	Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Zo nu tuma diai mai pei-mamaira ine tepo ami Anutura nana nate bayai ine tepo.”
41010016	Yesu meni ge ago sero mai kikinaka puro saniro wana poti giti nusokarera niro gawa wenua awa.
41010017	Yesu meni bayamu sero ebata tapinoinu ema zo sumuro muro kei awe nuso nana niro koiniro ego senua awa, “O gipai ema ewanana, na nogo wero nuai me ewanana tamamunoni?”
41010018	Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni na ewanana asinoise ewananara susu gosinosita? Anutu imata ewanana.
41010019	Ni Anutura lo ge gosinowesa awa: ‘Erama oko dasa betare; Emata bama bewana oko wase; Ni bewana oko wase; Ni ema zo gera potamu opi oko sase; Ema zora nena opi sero oko pumase; Miato mamera ge dimuyo.’ Lo ge ago itia.”
41010020	Ago senu nu numore ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, na seka nasore ge awa dapikarago dipi-tupewena.”
41010021	Ago senu Yesu iri niro nu gosinoise zo amuro giro numore ego senua awa, “Ni bua zo dosa itewia awa weyo. Ni bua ei awa wero amire nuai me ewanana tamamunosa. Ni baro nena niso dapikarago potasa ema meni zuma gaero pumara wau moni niso awa ema bogamasare kanowasa pumare. Ago wasa wau niso utura itamunoya awa. Ago wero amire muro na ama ganase.”
41010022	Yesu meni ago senu nu tuma gosuna-gasuna wero kotumu-katumu inoise doro bamunua. Awa nera kota, wau moni nuso witai.
41010023	Are Yesu meni gina-gana wero bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Erama wau witaire ami Anutura nata amira bayaira bua bamubake wamunora.”
41010024	Ago senu bua mai meni ge awa niniro di tainiwa. Ata Yesu meni numorekare noko ego senua awa, “O bua mai naso, Anutura nata amira bayai awa bua bamubake.
41010025	Wo kamel meni boma sora toyai awa nena mou awa. Ata ema wau witaire meni Anutura nata amira bayai awa nena mou-mau.”
41010026	Ago senu nukare di tainiro ina-sa wewa awa, “Are agai meni utura baro nuai me ewanana tamai te inoi?”
41010027	Ago sewa giro Yesu meni iri nusokare nana niro ego senua awa, “Erama meni ago wai ine tepo, ata Anutu meni ago wai te inoya. Nera kota, Anutu meni tani dapikarago wai te inoya.” Ago senua awa.
41010028	Ago senu giro Petoro meni numore ego senua awa, “Sana giyo. Nakare neu-nau nasokare dapikarago doro nima ama ganinoise nowenakare.”
41010029	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na ge me nimorekare tona ewa. Ema zo meni nata nuso, o namisini nuso, o nubabumana nuso, o mia nuso, o mama nuso, o mai awiso nuso, o zebu nus awa nato Oziga Ewananare emo duamunoya, awa
41010030	nu ami natare namisinire nubabumanare miamaire mai awisore zebure awa 100 be zeme emire tamamunoya. Ago inuai erama eni meni nu mai naso asero nu waya-waya inuamunora. Ama nu nuai me ewanana awa pumamunoya.
41010031	Ota erama gita inora amira eni meni ama wamunora. Erama ama inora ami gita wamunora.” Ago senua awa.
41010032	Yesu ema enire Yerusalem bayamu sero ebata tamuro susaumite Yesu nu gita inoinu bua mai nuso meni ama ena kotumu-katumu inoise susauwa ema eni ama muwa ami dai azu inoise bamuwa awa. Are Yesu meni bua mai nuso 12 puro tani ema meni ama numore wamunora amira ge numorekare kerenitinoise ego senua awa,
41010033	“Sana niniu. Nakai Yerusalem wititinonakai. Witiro ago kei awero nuanakai amire ema zo meni na Emara Mai awa puro poti pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema amira nana wanera nai nukare na dara betanise sero ema Yudakora nana wanera potamunora.
41010034	Ago potara ema Yudako meni na isipitinoise pora namore pisero wamu meni nama pena-pana dero dara betamunona. Betana waiko be etorobara tepo wai amire noko eramunona.” Ago senua awa.
41010035	Zebedira mai eto zazo nusoto Yakoboto Yohanere, nuto ami Yesu nana muro ego sewato awa, “Gipai ema, ni namoreto nena zo wasise kotupitinonato.”
41010036	Ago sewato giro ina ego senua awa, “Na ne nimoreto wanise kotupitinowito?”
41010037	Ago senu nuto sewato awa, “Ni zasimaire itamunosa be amire nato demabe nisora arumuro itamunonato, zo wana mera, zo wana anikara, awa ninasise tonato.”
41010038	Ago sewato Yesu meni ina ge bezai numoreto senua awa, “Nito nenara susu kaka gamu wero na atata wetewato. Na ou dokaka zo namunona, awa nito te nanowato? Na ou gutai zo pumamunona, awa nito te pumanowato?”
41010039	Ago senu nuto numore ego sewato awa, “Nato te wamunonato.” Ago sewato giro Yesu meni numoreto ego senua awa, “Na ou dokaka zo namunona, awa nito dai namunowato. Na ou gutai zo pamunona, awa nito dai pamunowato.
41010040	Ata nito wana naso mera, o wana naso anikara arumuro itamunowato amira ge awa nane sai ine tepo. Anutu meni masi awa ema eni emo sia wenu itewia. Are nukare ami masi amira arumuro itamunora.” Ago senua awa.
41010041	Bua mai 10 meni ge awa niniro Yakoboto Yohanere emo duba mou wewa.
41010042	Ago wewa giro Yesu meni bua mai 12 zawa senu muwa ego senua awa, “Zebura ema tua meni ema bama nukare sou warise towera. Noko ema babezinoma meni ema bama puro osero nunekare witai nusokare ine inowera, awa gosinowa.
41010043	Ata ninekare meni awa ago ine oko wawe. Nisokare nana zo meni ema bamu nisokare wamu wero giro enira ama-zani wero nuaise.
41010044	Ota giti kopi nisokare wamu wero giro enira soumai wero nuaise.
41010045	Nera kota, na Emara Mai meni erama na sou warise kota, na natope sou bua inoise betero erama saisai wayara ena soero pumamu muna.” Ago senua awa.
41010046	Yesu bua mai nusore kei awe Yeriko niro nata awa duamu sero ema bama saisai amire dai susauwa ema giti guma wai zo zazo nuso Batimea, nu Timeara mai, ami ebata enibara arumuro itinua awa. Nu moni emo begomo toisonua.
41010047	Are nu ago itise Yesu Nasaretera ema ego tupia amira ge niniro arero ego senua awa, “O Yesu, ni Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
41010048	Ago senu ema saisai meni nu senero sewa awa, “Ni ge do.” Ago sewa, ata nu noko arero senua awa, “O Dawidira sibuna, ni na emo zo amuyo.”
41010049	Ago senu giro Yesu meni dopero ego senua awa, “Zawa seu mae.” Ago senu nukare ema giti guma wai awa zawa sero sewa awa, “Azu oko wase. Eriro dope. Nu ni zawa toya.”
41010050	Ago sewa nu mo wape nuso kokero eya dopero kei awe Yesura nana ninu
41010051	Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Na ne nimore wanise tosi?” Ago senu ema giti guma wai ami ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, giti moka ewanana waise tona.”
41010052	Ago senu Yesu meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni bamuyo. Tuma diai niso meni ni kora wetia.” Ago senu giti moka nuso ewanana wenu nu Yesu ebete ena ama ganenua awa.
41011001	Nukare nata Yerusalem zorage kei awewa. Nata kiaka eto zazo nusoto Betefasito Betanire ago itisowato awa. Ago kei awero dirumu zazo nuso Oliwa awa busuniro Yesu meni bua mai nuso eto gita bayariseto sero numoreto ego senua awa,
41011002	“Nito semuro nata zorage itia amira bamuwoto. Baroto ago kei awero wo donki amira mai zo kimenera itia awa tamamunowato awa. Erama zo da di wo amira tame kaka arumamu. Wo awa besero puro muuto.
41011003	Ota ema zo meni, ‘Nito ne wamu wo awa besinowito?’ ago samunoya, awa nito numore ego sewoto: ‘Tuara bua emira itia. Nu ego eya noko potamunoya.’ Ago sewoto.”
41011004	Yesu meni ago senu nuto baro wo donkira mai awa tamuwato. Wo awa ema meni so bera kimeniwa ebete itinua awa tamuro besewato awa.
41011005	Asi besinoiwato ema eni ago itiwa ami numoreto ego sewa awa, “Nito ne wamu muro wora asi besinowito?”
41011006	Ago sewa giro nuto ge Yesu meni sariseto senua awa sewato giro dowa.
41011007	Ago wewa nuto wo awa puro bamu Yesura nana niwato nukare mo nusokare wo tame potiwa Yesu meni wo tame witiro arumunua.
41011008	Ago wenu ema saisai meni tama woi nusokare puro ebete ena sawa diwa. Eni meni buye baro ni bona kapero puro ebete potiro potiro bamuwa awa.
41011009	Are ema gita susauwa amire ema ama tupiwa ami arero sewa awa, “Ema Tuara bera tupia nu awa bowi wanekai.
41011010	Tua wero nuaira be nuso kei awamunoya, are nu bowi wanekai. Ewowo nasokai Dawidi amira ema tua waira be awa nune noko tamamunoya. Oro, oro, Anuture sanekai.” Ago sewa awa.
41011011	Yesu meni Yerusalem kei awero Anutura ibu bamu amira toiro nena bamubamu awa ginua. Gosinoinu tua zizinoinu giro nu nata awa doro bua mai nuso 12 amire dai nata Betani amira bamuwa awa.
41011012	Pina atinu nukare nata Betani awa doro susauwa Yesu nu meri betero giro
41011013	ni zo zazo nuso fik awa gire aike ena giro nu me eni itita asero gamu sero bamunua awa. Nu ni amira zorage kei awero me tepo gi gege ginua. Awa nera kota, me ziaira be tepo.
41011014	Are Yesu meni nire waru ge ego senua awa, “Ema zo me niso oko namunoya.” Ago senu bua mai nuso meni ge awa niniwa awa.
41011015	Nukare kei awe Yerusalem niwa Yesu nu ibu bamura toiro ema ibu mokara ena nena ina-pota wai ema awa dero eseniro tunenua awa. Ago inoise nu ema moni ina-pota wai ema amira tebol awa zinu kapeteninu ema ni guma potai ema amira arumai dai kapeteninua awa.
41011016	Ago wero nukare nena dimuro ibu bamu amira izima-sauma wai azu senua.
41011017	Nu numorekare ego senua awa, “Ge gayai zo ego itia ewa, Ibu naso awa zebu serora isa saira ibu itaise. Ge gayai ago itia, ata nikare wetewa ibu awa bewana wai emara bezai masi ine inoya.” Ago senua awa.
41011018	Ema bama dapikarago meni Yesura ge niniro di tainiwa. Ago wewa pris babezinomare lo ge gipai ema enire meni ge awa niniro Yesu azu wero nu damu sero ebata tamamu wewa awa.
41011019	Tua zizinoinu Yesu bua mai nusore nukare Yerusalem doro bamuwa awa.
41011020	Pina atinu nukare aita wero ni fik amira zorage baro ni binenua awa giwa. Tatawi nusore dai binenua.
41011021	Are Petoro meni ni awa giro kotumuro Yesure ego senua awa, “Gipai ema, ei gi. Nima ni fik zo waru watasa ami binitaya.”
41011022	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutu tuma diwo.
41011023	Na ge me ego tona ewa. Ema zo meni dirumu emire ego samunoya awa, ‘Ni nitope eriro baro ewara dagimu.’ Nu ago samunoya, awa tani da ago ine nu emo kei awamunoya. Ata ema ami duba eto wamunoya, awa tani awa oko kei awamunoya. Nune, ‘Ge dirumure sesena awa me wamunoya,’ asero nuamunoya, awa tani awa nu emo kei awamunoya.
41011024	Are na nimorekare tona ewa. Nikare nena zo pumamu sero giro isa samunowa be amire nikare ego kotumuwo: Anutu meni nena awa namorekare potamunoya. Ago kotumamunowa, awa nena awa pumamunowa.
41011025	Ota nikare isa samu sero giro dopero amire ema zore duba mou puro noma giro mou awa diseu. Mama nasokai utura itewia ami pasina nisokare dai disaise sero nikare emara pasina awa diseu. [
41011026	Ata nikare ema zora pasina kaka disamu wamunowa, awa Mama nasokai utura itewia ami pasina nisokare dai oko disamunoya.]” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
41011027	Nukare noko tera baro Yerusalem kei awewa. Ago kei awewa Yesu meni ibu bamura ena aita inoinu pris babezinoma ata lo ge gipai ema eni ata simai eni ami nuso nana kei awero
41011028	numore ego sewa awa, “Ni namorekare se. Ni ara bera tani awa inowesi? Agai senu tani awa inowesi?”
41011029	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na nikare atata zo wamunona. Nikare ina namore samunowa, awa nane da ago ine ara bera tani awa inoweni amira susu samunona.
41011030	Yohane ge ou bua nuso awa ara bera inoisi, — emara berata Anutura bera ni? Ge seu gane.”
41011031	Ago senu nukare nutopekare ge ina-sa inoise ego sewa awa, “Nakai Yohanera ou gutai awa utura nena asamunonakai, awa nu ego samunoya, ‘Are nikare nogoro ge nuso kaka ninamu wisewi?’
41011032	Ata nakai ego samunonikaita? ‘Yohanera ou gutai awa eramara nena.’ Ago samunonikaita?” Ago ina-sa wewa. Awa nera kota, ema bama dapikarago meni Yohane gasara nu porofete me inoisonua, are nukare ema bama azu inoise
41011033	Yesure ego sewa awa, “Nakare kaka gamu inonakare.” Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Are na ara bera tani awa inoweni amira susu awa nimorekare oko kerenamunona.” Ago senua awa.
41012001	Yesu meni ge bezai eni sero numorekare ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni wain bua urero pua gaero wain bua dia wai ema amira so wenua. Ago wero nu wain me zasaira ura bamu zo wamunua. Ago wero nu ema enire ego senua awa, ‘Na zebu zora bayamunona, are nikare bua naso dia weu. Dia wamunowa, awa na me nuso eni nimorekare potamunona.’ Ago sero nu doro zebu zora-zarako amira bamunua.
41012002	Are wain me paira be munu giro buara mama meni bua mai zo ema bua nuso dia inoiwa amira nana baro wain me eni pumaise sero iyetinu bamunua.
41012003	Baro kei awenu nukare nu puro wamu meni dero eseniwa tepo wana zipero bamunua.
41012004	Ago wenu giro buara mama meni noko bua mai zo nusokare nana bayaise sero iyetinu bamunu nukare nu puro sero ziro giti nuso dewa boya wenua awa.
41012005	Ago wewa giro buara mama meni noko bua mai zo iyetinu bamunu nukare nu dewa betenua awa. Tani ago ine inoise noisowa. Nu bua mai sasai potasai bayasara bua mai eni wamu meni dero bua mai eni dasara betinoisowa.
41012006	Ago inoe dowa ema daimata gege buara mama amira nana itinua. Nu mai mata nuso. Nu awa wama nuso. Are nu mai nuso nusokare nana bayaise sero ego senua awa, ‘Nukare mai nasora ge oko damunora.’ Ago sero iyetinu bamunua awa.
41012007	Ata bua dia wai ema meni nutopekare ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, ‘Mai emira mama betai amire nu mamera zebu ewa pumamunoya. Nu danakai betai amire zebu nuso ewa zebu nasokai wamunoya awa. Mukai.’
41012008	Ago sero nukare nu ziro dewa betenu woi nuso puro wain bua doro ape pua atune niwa awa.
41012009	Ago wewa, are wain buara mama meni nogo wamunoi? Nu muro dia wai ema awa dai betara amire ema eni meni zebu nuso dia warise samunoya awa.
41012010	Nikare Anutura ge ei awa kaka azimuro gamu meni sago inowa, atonua! So wai ema meni omata zo giwa waya wenu dowa. Ata omata ami so urura zasiwi wero itewia.
41012011	Nena awa Tuara bera kei awenua. Nakai genakai ziri inoya. Nikare ge awa gita azipisewita?” Ago senua awa.
41012012	Nukare Yesura ge niniro nu ge bezai awa numorekare senua awa giro nu gera potamu sewa, ata nukare ema diti bamu ago itiwa awa azu wero giro Yesu doro bamuwa.
41012013	Yuda emara giti kopi eni meni Farisayo enire Herodera Pati memba enire awa Yesura nana iyetiwa bamuwa awa. Awa Yesura ge zo pumuro nu gera potamu sero bamuwa.
41012014	Nukare baro ge numore ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ni ge me gege towesa awa gosinonakare. Ni ema zo oko azu inosa. Ni ema zezewenaire ema osaire da ago ine gosinosa. Ni ge me toise Anutura ebata gipinowesa. Are nakai Yuda ema meni takis moni Roma emara ema tua Sisa amire potitinowenakai, awa ni gawesa te inowita tepo ni?
41012015	Nakai takis moni potamunonikaita duamunonikai?” Ago sewa awa. Ata nu opi nusokare giro ego senua awa,
41012016	“Nikare nogoro na gaero gamu inowi? Moni zo potiu mai gane.” Ago senu nukare moni zo potiwa pumuro ego senua awa, “Ititire owere monira itia ewa awara ni?” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Awa Sisara.”
41012017	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare nena Sisara asero giro Sisare potiu. Ota nena Anutura asero giro Anuture potiu.” Ago senu nukare ge awa niniro di tainiwa awa.
41012018	Sadukayo ema meni ego toisowa, “Betai nukare noko oko eramunora.” Are Sadukayo eni meni Yesura nana muro atata wero sewa awa,
41012019	“Gipai ema, Mose meni namorekai ge ego gaenua awa: Ema zora nami betai ara nuso mai tepo itamunoya, awa ema ami nami nusora bama kuma awa atiro mai nami nuso emo pumaise. Mose meni ago gaenua awa.
41012020	Are gita namisini 7 itisera. Nami zewai ami bama atiro mai kaka pumamu betisia.
41012021	Ago weti nami nuso namba tu ami bama da awa atiro mai kaka pumamu betisia. Ago weti nami namba tri da ago ine wisia.
41012022	Ago werota wero awinoe namisini 7 dapikarago dago bama awa atiro mai kaka pumamu betisera. Ama bama meni betisia.
41012023	Namisini 7 meni nu atiro noisera, are bebetenai eramunora be amire bama awa ara wamunoi?”
41012024	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare Anutura ge gayaire Anutura putoure awa kaka gamu, are nikare ge me wosunitinowa.
41012025	Betai meni eriro noko oko ina-ata wamunora. Nukare utura angelo ine wero nuamunora.
41012026	Nikare bebetenai eramunorita asero atata inowa, ata nikare ge Mose meni gaenua awa kaka azimuro gamu meni sago inowa, atonua! Nu ni payai zo awero kaka tepo wamu wenua amira uge awa gainomite amire ge zo Anutu meni numore senua awa ego gaenua awa, Na Abrahamto Isakare ata Yakobo amira Tua wero itewena. Nikare ge awa azipitinowewita?
41012027	Anutu nu erama bebetenai asinowenakai awa gawi seka gege inowera. Are nu erama betaira Tua kota, nu erama seka itewera amira Tua wero itewia. Bebetenai eramunora amira susu wosuniro baititinowewa.” Ago senua awa.
