43005021	Mama nu betai ema awa-uzawi seka inowera, da ago ine na Mai meni ara tamai nasora zota zo awa-uzana seka wamunora awa.
43005022	Mama nu emara zas oko inowia. Bua awa dapikarago Maira nana wanera potinua awa.
43005023	Are ema nukare Mama bowi inowera, da ago ine Mai bowi warise. Zo nu Mai bowi kaka wamu wamunoya ami Mama na iyetinua awa dai bowi kaka wamu ago ine inoya.
43005024	Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo meni ge naso ninitinoise Mama naso na iyetinua amira ge gi me inoya ami nuai me ewanana zeme emire puro noya. Nu kotora ena oko duwamunoya. Nu zewai wero betai doro nuaira kei awero nowia.
43005025	Na me memeka sana niniu. Ema bama nowera ami bebetenai ine. Be zo mamunoya — ota kei awero itia — be amire nukare Anutura Mai amira ge awi ninamunora. Eni meni ge niniro baitiro seka wero nuamunora awa.
43005026	Mama nu nuaira Mama, are nu Mai nusore da ago nuai dirieninu na nuaira Mama wero nowena.
43005027	Na Mai, na Emara Mai. Are Mama naso meni emara koto amira zas bua awa na Mamera bera wanise sero putou namore potinua.
43005028	Nikare ge awa niniro oko di tainawe. Nera kota, be zo potai itia awa mai amire bi ditira awinowera ami zawa naso ninamunora.
43005029	Ago niniro ewanana noisowa ami eriro nuai me ewanana tamamunora. Ota waya wero noisowa ami meni awa eriro koto wero kotora ena duwamunora awa.
43005030	Na duba nasora bua zo wai ine oko itia. Na ge Mama nasora bera ena ninitinowena da awa inoise kotora zas inowena awa. Ago inoise kotora zas bua wana te wamunoya. Nera kota, na ara tamai nasora kota, nu senu osena amira ara tamaira wamu inowena awa.
43005031	Na natope susu naso sana te oko wamunoya.
43005032	Susu naso awa zo meni kerenitinowia. Nu susu naso kerenitinoise ge me toya awa gosinona.
43005033	Nikare sesewa bua mai nisokare meni Yohanera nana baro atata wetera nu ge me kereniro sisia awa.
43005034	Ema zo meni susu naso kerenaise awa oko yaba inona. Nikare susu naso ninawa Anutu meni nikare soero pumaise sero nimorekare sesena awa.
43005035	Yohane nu zasimai bamubake ine wero noise nikare zasimunua. Zasimai nuso giro yawa sara apunu-kaka gege inoise noisewa awa.
43005036	Ata susu naso kerenitinowia ami nu Yohane ine oko aewa. Nu witai. Na bua Mama meni wanise senua awa inowena. Bua ami susu naso ego ine kerenitinowia: Mama meni senu osena awa.
43005037	Are Mama na senu osena ami susu naso kerenitinowia. Nikare be nusora ge kaka ninamu inowewa. Nikare giti moka nuso kaka gamu inowewa.
43005038	Ge nuso duba nisokarera oko itia. Nera kota, nikare Mama na senu osena amira ge ninawewa me kaka wamu inowia.
43005039	Nikare ego towewa awa, ‘Anutura ge gayai ami nuai me ewanana namorekai tamamunoya.’ Ago toise nuai me ewanana tamamu sero ge gayai azipitinowewa. Ge gayai ami susu naso kerenitinowia,
43005040	ata nikare na nuai me ewanana nimorekare potanise sero namore dai dara tayai azu towewa.
43005041	Ema meni na bowi warise oko towena.
43005042	Na susu nisokare gosinowena. Duba nisokare meni awa Anutu Mama nasora nana oko itewia.
43005043	Na Mama nasora ge dimuro nisokare nana osena awa, ata nikare ge naso doro na oko otao inowewa. Noma ema zo kotumai nusora kei nisokare nana nai amire numore dai otao wamunowa.
43005044	Nikare nitopekare bowi ina-wa inoise nowewa. Ota Anutu imata nikare bowi waise ago kaka samu inowewa ami nogo wero na tuma diamunowi?
43005045	Nikare namore ego oko sawe, ‘Nune nakai gera potai ge bua wamunonakai.’ Namore ago oko sawe. Nikare Mose tuma diro nowewa, are Mose meni nikare gera potamunoya.
43005046	Mose meni ge gaenua, awa namore gaenua awa. Nikare ge nuso ninawa me wamia, awa nikare ge naso dai ninawa me wamia.
43005047	Ota nikare Mosera ge gayai awa niniwa me kaka wamu wenu giro dowa, are nogo nogo wero ge naso ninawa me wamunoi?” Yesu meni ago senua awa.
43006001	Yesu meni ge awa senu tepo wenu Galilaya ou ubu semuro bamu enibara ninua awa. Ou ubu amira zazo zo Taibirias asinowera.
43006002	Semuro bamunu nu ema bama yayare kora wasai ewanana inoisowa awa eni meni gosinoisowa, are ema diti bamu meni nu ama ganewa awa.
43006003	Ago wewa Yesu meni bua mai nuso pumuro witi dirumura niro arumuro itiwa awa.
43006004	Be amira ana Yuda emara pura zo zazo nuso Betai Daininua amira be zora awenua awa.
43006005	Are Yesu meni ema dubu bamu nuso nana tupiwa giro Filip atata wero ego senua awa, “Ma nana ena puro ema dubu bamu amire potanakai nara te wamunoi?”
43006006	Yesu nu bua zo wamu kotupitinoinua, ata nu Filip gaero gamu atata wero senua awa.
43006007	Ago senu Filip meni ego senua awa, “500 kina meni ma pumuro potanakai nara te kaka wamu wamunoi, tanita.”
43006008	Ago senu bua mai nusora nana zo Anderea, nu Simon Petorora nami, ami ego senua awa,
43006009	“Mai zo meni ma wana dare ou wo etore puro noya. Ata ema dubu bamu, are te oko wamunoi, tanita.”
43006010	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare seu ema poti dara niro arumare.” Zebu amira zewaka itisonua, are patiro arumuwa. Namba nusokare 5,000 ago ine ami arumuwa awa.
43006011	Ago wewa Yesu meni ma puro Anuture kokopai asero ema arumuro itiwa amire kanowenua. Ou wo da ago ine wenu te wenua.
43006012	Niwa te wenu itata da ago dowa giro Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nena itata itima waya wamera, sianiu.” Ago senua awa.
43006013	Are ma wana da niwa amira itata awa sianiwa kana 12 ago be muwa.
43006014	Ema meni tani putoure awa giro Yesu bowi inoise ego sewa awa, “Porofete bamubake zo zebura kei awaise sai awa ewa.”
43006015	Ago sero Yesu puro ema tua nusokare potara nuaise toiwa giro nu ema dubu awa doro imata witiro bamu dirumura ninua awa.
43006016	Tua zinu bua mai nuso meni ou ubura osero
43006017	Kapaneam nate ewesemuro bayamu sero wara witiro bamuwa awa. Ago susauwa pi zinu Yesu meni nusokare nana kaka kei awamu wenu
43006018	bisi zewai-zawai munu kakawa bamubake inoinu
43006019	nukare dawero bamu soe niro 5 kilomita ago awa inoiwa Yesu meni ou tame aita wero baro wa nusokare nana zorage kei awinoinu giro azu wewa awa.
43006020	Azu wewa giro Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Azu oko wawe. Nane tupena awa.”
43006021	Ago senu giro nukare yawa sara inoise ziwa wara witinu wa meni nata bayamu sero inoiwa amira eya kei awenua awa.
43006022	Pina atinu ema ou ubu enibara awinoiwa ami ego sewa awa, “Pire wa daimata gege iti bua mai nuso meni Yesu doro nukare imata wara witiro bamitara awa.”
43006023	Ago sewa, ata wa eni Taibirias nate ena muro kakamo Tua meni ma gawa wenu niwa amira muwa awa.
43006024	Are ema bama meni Yesu bua mai nusore awa kau inomite nukare tamamu sero wa muro itiwa amira witiro bamu Kapaneam nate niwa awa.
43006025	Bamu ou enibara niro Yesu kau inomite tamuro ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, ni nazi mesi?”
43006026	Ago atata wewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana niniu. Tani putoure wawena gosinowewa amira kota, ma potena nitawa amira gege na kau inowa.
43006027	Nikare ma sisai amira kota, nuai me ewananara ma amira bua wewo. Na Emara Mai awa Anutu Mama meni putou namore potinu pumuna. Are nuai me ewananara ma awa nane nimorekare potamunona.”
43006028	Ago senu nukare ge ina ego sewa awa, “Nakare nogo nogo wero Anutura bua wamunonikare?”
43006029	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Anutura bua ego ewa. Na Anutu meni senu osena, nama awa tuma diwo.”
43006030	Ago senu nukare ge ina ego sewa awa, “Ni tani putoure ne wasa ganakare ge niso me wamunoi?
43006031	Ewowo-kawowo nasokare ware noise ma zazo mana awa ninoise noisowa. Amira ge gayai ego itia ewa, ‘Utura ma potasai ninoisowa.’”
43006032	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana niniu. Mose meni utura ma nimorekare oko potinua. Mama naso meni utura ma me nimorekare potitinowia awa.
43006033	Ma Anutu meni potitinowia ami utura ena osero zebura ema nimorekare nuai tapinowia.”
43006034	Ago senu ina ego sewa awa, “O Tua, ni ma tosa awa be giti namorekare potitinoiyo.”
43006035	Ago sewa ina ego senua awa, “Nuai potaira ma na ewa. Zo nu namore dara tairo nuamunoya ami meri oko wamunoya. Ota zo nu na tuma diamunoya ami ou uza oko wamunoya.
43006036	Na sesena gewa. Nikare na gosinowewa, ata nikare na kaka tuma diamu inowewa.
43006037	Ema Mama meni namore potitinowia ami dapikarago naso nana kei awamunora. Are zo nu naso nana mai na nu oko esenamunona.
43006038	Utura ena osena awa kotumai nasora kota, Mamera bera bua nuso wamu sero osena awa.
43006039	Nu senu osena amira ara tamai ego ewa. Ema dubu namore potinua nukare ami sisero waya wai azu, na be bamura ena awa-uzana dapikarago erarise.
43006040	Mama nasora ara tamai awa ego ine itia awa. Nukare na Mai giro baitiro tuma diamunora ami nuai me ewanana pumamunora. Ago wara nane be bamura ena nukare awa-uzana eramunora. Mama nasora ara tamai ago itia awa.” Ago senua awa.
43006041	Yesu meni, “Ma utura ena osenua na awa,” ago senua, are Yuda ema giwa waya wenu giro ego sewa awa,
43006042	“Ema awa nu Yesu. Nu Yosefera mai awa. Nakai mia mama nuso gosinowenakai. Are nogoro nu utura ena osenu sia toi?”
43006043	Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare gung-ga oko sawe.
43006044	Zo nu kotumai nusora naso nana mai ine oko itia. Mama na senu osena ami nu zumamunoya, awa nu naso nana mamunoya. Ago wai nane be bamura ena awa-uzana seka wero eramunoya.
43006045	Porofete meni ge zo ego gaewa itewia ewa, ‘Anutu nu nutope ema dapikarago ge nuso tugata wamunoya.’ Are zo nu Mama meni ge gipai niniro kotumai tamamunoya ami naso nana mamunoya.
43006046	Ema agai meni Mama ginu? Tepo awa. Anutura nana ena osena na daimata ami Mama gina awa.
43006047	Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo nu na tuma didinoise nowia ami nuai me ewanana awa puro nowia awa.
43006048	Nuaira ma na ewa.
43006049	Ewowo-kawowo nisokare ware noise ma zazo mana ninoise bebeteniwa.
43006050	Ota utura ma niro kaka betamu nuai gege nuai awa na ewa.
43006051	Nuaira ma utura ena osena na ewa. Are zo nu ma awa namunoya ami nuai gege nuamunoya. Pisi naso meni ma inoya awa. Are erama meni nuai tamarise potamunona.”
43006052	Ago senu Yuda ema nutopekare ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, “Nu nogo wero pisi nuso potai nanisekai toi?”
43006053	Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na me tona. Nikare Mamera Mai amira pisire orarare kaka namu wamunowa, awa nuai me duba nisokarera oko itamunoya.
43006054	Zo nu pisi nasore orara nasore namunoya ami nuai me ewanana tamamunoya. Ago wai nane be bamura ena nu awa-uzamunona awa.
43006055	Pisi naso meni ma me. Orara naso meni ou nai me.
43006056	Pisi nasore orara nasore namunoya ami namore dai nuamunoya. Ago wai na da ago numore dai nuamunona.
43006057	Mama nu nuaira Mama ami na senu osena, are nuai na Mamera nana zewai-zawai itawi nowena. Are zo nu na namunoya awa da ago ine nuai nuso naso nana itai nuamunoya.
43006058	Utura ma amira susu ago itia awa. Awa ewowo-kawowo nisokare meni niwa, ago ine oko aewa. Nukare ma awa ninoise bebeteniwa. Ota zo meni ma ei awa namunoya ami nuai gege nuamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
43006059	Yesu nu Kapaneam nate ena yere ibura ena ge awa emare tugata wenua awa.
43006060	Dubu nusora nana eni meni ge awa niniro ego sewa awa, “Ge awa ninenakai te kaka wamu inoya. Ge awa agai meni ninai te wamunoi?”
43006061	Ago toise duba tu meni gung-ga sewa giro Yesu meni enia wero giro ego senua awa, “Ge awa ninewa waya inoita?
43006062	Are Mamera Mai meni noko ewesemuro utura witana gawa nogo wamunoi?
43006063	Ozana meni nuai emare potitinowia. Tamara pisi meni oko sorepitinowia. Na ge towena awa Ozanare ata nuaire awa.
43006064	Ata nikare eni meni niniro na tuma kaka diamu inowewa.” Yesu meni ago senua. Nera kota, nu nukare eni meni ge nuso niniro nu tuma kaka diamu wamunora amira benau nusokare gita ona ginu tepo wenua awa. Ota ema nu kerenamu inoinua amira benau dai ginu tepo wenua. Are ge awa senua awa.
43006065	Are nu ge zo susumuro ego senua awa, “Na ami emo ego tona awa. Zo nu Mama meni kaka ninamu wai nu naso nana mai ine oko itia.” Ago senua awa.
43006066	Are be amira ana dubu nuso eni meni numore dai nuai awa biawa wenu giro nu doro bamuwa awa.
43006067	Ago wewa Yesu meni bua mai nuso 12 atata wero ego senua awa, “Nikare da ago ine na duamu towita?”
43006068	Ago senu Simon Petoro meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, ni doro zo ara nana bayamunonikare? Nuai me ewanana amira ge niso nana itewia.
43006069	Are nakare ni tuma didinoise ego genakare me wetia awa: Ni Anutura Mai saramai.”
43006070	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na nikare mai 12 sianiro pumuna. Ata nisokare nana zo meni nogoro Satan ine inoi?”
43006071	Ago senua, awa nu Simon Iskeriot amira mai zazo Yudas amire senua. Nu Yesura bua mai 12 amira otao zo ami ama Yesu kereniro iwora wanera potinua.
43007001	Yesu meni ago senu giro Yuda ema eni meni Yesu damu sero ge diwa dagimunu Yesu meni ge awa niniro giro Yudaya zebu doro Galilaya zebura baro noisonua awa.
43007002	Ago noinu Yuda emara pura zo zazo Komboara Pura amira be zora awenua awa.
43007003	Ago wenu namisini nuso meni numore ego sewa awa, “Ni zebu ei awa doro Yudaya zebura baro bua inowesa awa ona wasa bua mai niso ago nowera ami gare.
43007004	Ema zo bua inowia ami ema bama garise sero oko bezinowia. Ni bua inowesa, are ni bamuro ema dapikarago amira nana giti mokara kei awero bua awa we gare.” Ago sewa awa.
43007005	Namisini nuso meni ge ago sewa, nera kota, nukare nu tuma kaka diamu noisowa.
43007006	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare be tepo amira ana bua zo wawewa te inowia. Ata be naso kaka mamu.
43007007	Ema bama meni nikare iwo wai ine tepo. Ata nane meni awa nuai nusokare waya awa kerenawena giro na iwo inowera.
43007008	Are nikare aunaira bamuu. Nane aunai amira oko mamunona. Nera kota, be naso kaka kei awamu.”
43007009	Ago sero nu Galilaya zebura dago itinua awa.
43007010	Ago noinu nukare gita bamuwa amire nu ama imata upene bamunua awa.
43007011	Ago wenu pura zora awenu Yuda ema babezinoma meni nu kau inoise ego sewa awa, “Nu nago iti?” Ago sewa awa.
43007012	Ota ema dubu bamu ge dainiro sewa. Ago toiwa eni meni ego sewa awa, “Nu ema kokopai.” Ota eni meni ego sewa awa, “Tepowa. Nu opi toise ema bama etete nitinowia.” Ago sewa awa.
43007013	Ata dubu bamu meni Yuda ema babezinoma awa azu inoise ge tura bezero sewa awa.
43007014	Pura soe sieninu Yesu meni Anutura ibu bamu amira mokara toiro ema bama ge tugata wenua.
43007015	Ge tugata inoinu Yuda ema gita wai meni giro di taniro ego sewa awa, “Nu ninai ibu nasokaira kaka toyamu ami nogo wero ge susure ninitinowi?”
43007016	Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na gera susu nimorekare tugata inowena, awa naso kota, na senu osena amira awa.
43007017	Nikare na kotumai nasora gege towenita Anutura bera ge tugata inoweni, ago towewa. Ata ema zo meni Anutura ge dipinoise nuamunoya ami na ge towena amira susu gamunoya.
43007018	Zo nu kotumai nusora towia ami tama nuso puro witamu towia. Ata zo nu buara mama amira bowi kei awaise towia ami opi tepo ge me gege towia.
43007019	Mose meni lo ge nimorekare potinua, ata nisokare nana zo meni oko dipinowia. Nikare nogoro na damu towi?”
43007020	Ago senu ema bama bamu ami girara asero ego sewa awa, “Ni bi meni duba nisora iti dau wero tosa. Ai meni ni damu toi?”
43007021	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na tani putoure daimata wetena nikare di tainiro itewa awa.
43007022	Sana niniu. Mose meni mai mamatana nisokarera tama aiso agewa kapawise senua. Ota Mose meni kota, ewowo meni zaawewa. Are bua awa waira be mawi pura bera ena inowewa.
43007023	Awa Mosera sai zewai wai ge dainai azu, nikare pura bera ena mai mamatana nisokarera tama aiso kapinowewa awa. Ota nane meni awa ema zo me zere dago pura be nisokarera ena kora wisena. Amira nikare nogoro namore tini kapai pupinowi?
43007024	Na pasina wago wisena asero bua naso waya oko sawe. Bua nasora susu giro baitiro amire bua kokota waya ni, awa seu.”
43007025	Ge ago senu Yerusalem ema eni meni ego sewa awa, “Ema damu towera awa ewa.
43007026	Giu. Nu ge damu ena toya, ata nukare numore ge zo kaka samu inora. Pris nukare nu gawera Kristo inowita? Tepo tanita.
43007027	Nakai kei awai nuso gosinonakai. Ata Kristo mamunoya amira kei awai awa zo meni oko gamunoya.” Ago sewa awa.
43007028	Yesu nu Anutura ibu bamura ena dopero ge tugata inoinu ge awa sewa niniro ina ego senua awa, “Nikare na gosinowewa, ota kei awai nasora susu gosinowewa. Ata na kotumai nasora oko osena. Nu senu osena nu awa me awa. Nikare nu oko gosinowewa.
43007029	Na nuso nana ena osena, noko nune senu osena, are na nu giro baititinowena.” Ago senua awa.
43007030	Ago senu nukare nu benamu sewa, ata be nuso kaka mamu, are wana nuso nana tame potai awa mou wero dowa awa.
43007031	Ago wewa ema bama dainiro meni Yesu tuma diro ego sewa awa, “Kristo mamunoya awa ema emi tani putoure inowia awa dainiro wamunoita? Tepo, tanita.” Ago sewa awa.
43007032	Ema nukare ge ago ine awa upene toiwa Farisayo meni niniro pris babezinoma enire dai auniro ge sero Yesu benamu ge sero soldia iyetiwa Yesu pamu sero bamuwa awa.
43007033	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na be apunu nimorekare noma nu senu osena amira nana ewesemamunona awa.
43007034	Ago wana nikare na kau bamubake wero oko tamamunowa. Baro nuamunona amira nikare bayai ine tepo.”
43007035	Ge ago senu Yuda ema nutopekare ge ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, “Nu nago bayai kau wamunonakai asinoi? Yuda ema otao mamai nasokai Grik zebura nowera amira nana baro Grik ema ge tugata wamu toita?
43007036	Nu ego sesia, ‘Na kau wero oko tamamunowa. Ota bayamunona amira nikare bayai ine tepo.’ Ge ago ine awa nogo toi?” Ago sewa awa.
43007037	Pura be pesunitinoinu Yuda ema meni aunai bamu inoise itiwa amire Yesu meni eriro dopero zawa sero ego senua awa, “Zo nu ou uza wai giro naso nana muro ou naise.
43007038	Zo nu na tuma diamunoya amira dubara ena nuai me ewanana amira ou sasa ine mai gege tupise itamunoya. Amira ge gayai zo itia awa.” Ago senua awa.
43007039	Awa ema nu tuma didinora ami Ozana pamunora ago senua. Yesu meni Ozanara ge awa oura potiro ge awa senua. Be amira ana nu utura zasimaira kaka kapeteniro witamu wenua, are Ozana meni kaka osamu wenua.
43007040	Ema nukare ge awa niniro ego sewa awa, “Porofete dia inowenakai numa awa.”
43007041	Ota eni meni ego sewa awa, “Nu Kristo me.” Ago sewa eni meni enira ge dero ego sewa awa, “Kristo meni Galilaya ena nogoro kei awamunoi? Tepo tanita.
43007042	Anutura ge gayai zo ego ine itia ewa, ‘Kristo nu Dawidira nata susu Betelehem ena saisibuna nusora nana soe ena kei awaise sai.’ Ge gayai ago ine itia.” Ago sewa awa.
43007043	Ema nukare Yesure ge ago toise zazaumuwa awa.
43007044	Ago toise eni meni Yesu benamu ge sewa, ata zo da nu oko zinua.
43007045	Soldia nukare pris babezinomare Farisayo nana ewesemuro bamuwa atata wero ego sewa awa, “Nikare nogoro nu kaka puro mamu wetewi?”
43007046	Ago atata wewa soldia meni ego sewa awa, “Nu ge towia ago ine ema zo meni sai ine oko itia.”
43007047	Ago sewa Farisayo ema meni ina ego sewa awa, “Nu nukare dai eteteni gewa me wetiwa.
43007048	Simaire Farisayore nasokare nana zo ai meni nu tuma didinoi?
43007049	Awa tepo awa. Ata ema dubu bamu nu ama ganinora ami Mosera lo ge kaka gamu inoise nowera, are waru nusokare nana itewia.”
43007050	Ago sewa otao nusokare zo zazo nuso Nikodemo nu gita be zore Yesura nana bamunua ami ego senua awa,
43007051	“Nikare seu. Ema zo nakai susu nuso kaka gamu, ota pasina nuso kaka tamamu inoise nu tepo gera potanisekai sai itita? Lo ge nasokai meni go wanisekai toita?”
43007052	Ago senu otao mamai nuso meni ina ego sewa awa, “Ni da ago Galilaya ema ni? Ni lo ge nasokai azimai bua i-susauma ego gamunosa: Galilaya zebura ena porofete zo kei awaise sai oko itia.” [
43007053	Ge ago tomite doro so sero bozero bamuwa awa.
43008001	Yesu nu Oliwa dirumura witinua.
43008002	Pina atinu ana ewesemuro bamuro Anutura ibu bamura toinu ema dainiro meni nuso nana auniwa giro arumuro ge tugata wenua awa.
43008003	Ago inoinu lo ge gipai emare Farisayore meni bama zo kuma inoinu tamuwa awa puro poti soe niro Yesure ego sewa awa,
43008004	“Gipai ema, bama ami bewana inoi tamera.
43008005	Mose meni lo ge nasokai gainoise bama ego ine awa omata meni danakai betarise senua. Ota ni nitope nogo wanisekare tosi?”
43008006	Ago sewa, awa ego emira: Nukare nu atata wara ina ge zo sai giro nu puro gera potamu sewa. Ago sewa Yesu nu numorekare ge ina kaka samu. Nu dupuniro zebu owe inoise itinua.
43008007	Ago wenu nukare nu atata werota wero awewa giro eriro ego senua awa, “Nisokare nana zo meni pasina amu nowia ami omata puro zaawero daise amire dawe.”
43008008	Ago sero noko dupuniro zebura owe wenua.
43008009	Ago wenu nukare ge nuso niniro bama awa doro zezewenai meni gita wewa tiri-tara awero baro tepo wewa awa.
43008010	Ago wewa bama imata itinu Yesu iri niro giro numore ego senua awa, “Nukare nani? Zo meni ni gera potita?”
43008011	Ago senu bama meni ina ego senua awa, “O Tua, tepo awa.” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na da ago ni gera oko potamunona. Ni baro noise pasina noko oko wase.” Ago senua awa.]
43008012	Yesu meni ema bamere ge zo ego senua awa, “Na zebu serora ema amira zasimai. Are zo nu na ama ganamunoya ami mumera oko susawiamunoya. Nu nuaira zasimai nuso nana itai nuamunoya awa.”
43008013	Ago senu Farisayo ema meni ego sewa awa, “Ni nitope susu niso kerenitinosa, awa genakare me oko inoya.”
43008014	Ago sewa giro Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na natope susu naso kerenitinona ami me amu oko inoya. Na nana muni, ota nago susaweni, amira susu gosinoise ge towena. Ata ninekare meni awa na nana muni, ota na nago susaweni, amira susu kau inowewa awa.
43008015	Nikare tama naso gege giro na waya asinowa. Ata nane meni awa erama awina-dawina waira bua oko inona.
43008016	Ata na awina-dawina waira bua wamena, awa bua me wamia. Nera kota, na imata oko itena. Nu na senu osena ami namore dai nowia awa.
43008017	Lo ge gayai nisokare amira ego gayai itia awa, ‘Ema eto meni nena zora susu sarato te wamunoya. Ago wai me asamunora.’
43008018	Are susu naso awa na natope kerenawena Mama na senu osena ami dai kerenitinowia.”
43008019	Ago senu nukare nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Mama niso nani?” Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Nikare na kaka giro baitamu inowewa. Are nikare Mama naso da ago kaka giro baitamu inowewa. Nikare na giro baitamewa, awa Mama naso dai giro baitamewa.” Ago senua awa.
43008020	Yesu nu ibu bamura itise akou wau moni potitinoisowa amira zorage dopero ge tugata inoise amire ge awa senua. Ota betaira be nuso kaka mamu, are nukare nu kaka ziamu wewa.
43008021	Yesu meni numorekare noko ego senua awa, “Na nikare doro bayana na kau wero pasina nisokare amire dai noma betamunowa. Na baro nuamunona amira nikare bayai ine tepo.”
43008022	Ago senu Yuda ema meni ego ina-sa wewa awa, “Nu ego toya, ‘Na baro nuamunona amira nikare bayai ine tepo.’ Ge ago awa nogo toi? Nu nutope tama dero betamu toita?”
43008023	Ge ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Nikare bagera. Na ikera. Nikare zebura. Na zebura oko aewa.
43008024	Ami emo na nimorekare ego sesena awa, ‘Nikare pasina nisokare amire dai noma betamunowa.’ Na susu naso kerenitinowena, awa ninawa me kaka wamu wamunoya, awa nikare pasina nisokare amire dai noma betamunowa.”
43008025	Ago senu nukare noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni aweni?” Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Na sawena gosinowewa.
43008026	Na pasina nisokare dainiro kereniro nikare gera potamu wero giro te wero baitamena. Ata nu na senu osena ami ge me towia. Are nane be nusora nana ena ninina da awa gege zebura ena kerenitinowena.” Ago senua awa.
43008027	Nu Mamere ago senu nukare kaka giro baitamu wewa awa.
43008028	Are Yesu meni noko ego senua awa, “Nikare na Emara Mai awa ni pasinaira ikoniro amire susu naso gamunowa awa. Be amire na bua inowena awa kotumai nasora oko inowena awa gamunowa. Mama meni gipenua ge awa puro noise towena awa dai gamunowa.
43008029	Nu na senu osena ami namore dai nowia. Be giti bamu awa bua wawena giro ara tapinowia. Are nu na kaka duwamu nowia.” Ago senua awa.
43008030	Yesu ge ago senu ema dainiro meni nu tuma diwa.
43008031	Nukare awa Yuda ema, are Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Nikare ge naso niniro baitiro dimuro nuamunowa, awa nikare mai dubu naso me wero nuamunowa.
43008032	Nikare ago inoise ge me niniro baitawa ami mui nisokare besamunoya. Besai mui amu kokopai nuamunowa awa.”
43008033	Ago senu ina ego sewa awa, “Nakare Abrahamra saisibuna. Nakare ema zora soumai kaka wamu nowenakare. Nakare mui amu nuamunonakare, awa sesesa amira susu nogo iti?”
43008034	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sane. Zo nu pasina inowia ami pasinara soumai inoya.
43008035	Soumai meni ema tua nusora ibu marara oko nuai gege nuamunoya. Ata ema tuara mai meni mamera ibu marara nuai gege nuamunoya awa.
43008036	Are Mai meni nikare besamunoya, awa nikare mui amu me amu nuamunowa.
43008037	Nikare Abrahamra saisibuna awa gosinona. Ata ge naso meni nisokare nana mokara kaka toyamu inowia, are nikare na dawa betanise towa.
43008038	Na Mama nasora nana ena nena gosinoise noisona awa nikare tugata inowena, ata ninekare meni awa mama nisokarera niniwa awa inowewa awa.”
43008039	Ago senu nukare ina ego sewa awa, “Nakare mama nakare Abraham.” Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare Abrahamra saisibuna nuamewa sia, awa nikare Abrahamra tani puro nuamewa.
43008040	Anutura nana ena ge me susure ninina awa nikare tugata inowena, nama nogoro damu towi? Goroba ago ine awa Abraham meni oko wenua.
43008041	Nikare mama nisokarera bua inowewa.” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nakare eba mai oko aewa. Anutu nu Mama nasokare daimata.”
43008042	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Mama nisokare Anutu sia, awa nikare na ara tamamewa. Nera kota, na Anutura nana ena muro nowena. Na kotumai nasora oko osena. Anutu meni senu osena.
43008043	Nikare nogoro ge naso kaka gamu inowewi? Nikare kaka gamu inowewa, nera kota, ge towena awa nikare ninai ine tepo.
43008044	Nikare mama nisokare Satan amira mai awiso, are ara tamai nuso ama ganero bua waya awa wamu towewa. Nu gita ona ema dasai betinoisowa, da ago ine i-tupewia awa. Nu ge me oko puro nowia. Nera kota, ge me zo nuso nana oko itia. Opi ge nuso meni nuso nana mokara be munua, are nu opi saira mama wero nowia awa.
43008045	Na ge me gege tona, are nikare ge naso gewa me kaka wamu inoya.
43008046	Nisokare nana zo meni na pasina ema ago sai me wamunoita? Tepo awa. Na ema agami ge me susure tugata wawena nogoro gawewa me kaka wamu inowi?
43008047	Zo nu Anutura mai wero nowia ami Anutura ge ninitinowia. Nikare Anutura mai oko nowewa, are ge nuso azu towewa awa.” Ago senua awa.
43008048	Ago senu Yuda ema meni ego sewa awa, “Nakare nimore ego tonakare: Ni Samaria ema. Bi meni niso nana itia. Nimore ago toise ge me tonakare.”
43008049	Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Bi naso nana mokara oko itia. Na Mama naso bowi inowena, ata ninekare meni awa zazo naso puro osisinowewa.
43008050	Na zazo bowire naso wamu oko towena. Zo itia ami zazo naso de ike nitinowia. Nune zas inoya.
43008051	Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo nu ge naso niniro puro nuamunoya ami oko betamunoya. Nu nuai gege nuamunoya.”
43008052	Ge ago senu Yuda ema nukare ego sewa awa, “Bi niso nana mokara itia awa me towenakare. Abraham betenua, ota porofete eni nukare da ago bebeteniwa. Ata ni ego tosa, ‘Zo nu ge naso puro nuamunoya ami oko betamunoya.’
43008053	Mama nasokare Abraham betenua. Ota nine nu dainamu tosita? Ina porofete dago betewa awa. Ni nogoro tama niso puro wititinosi?”
43008054	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na tama naso puro witana te oko wamunoya. Mama naso nowia, awa nikare Anutu nisokare asinowewa, nune ami na bowi inowia.
43008055	Nikare nu giro kaka giro baitamu inowewa. Nane meni awa giro baititinowena awa. ‘Na nu kaka gamu inowena,’ ago samena, awa na opi sai ema nikare ine wamena. Na nu giro baititinoise ge nuso dipinoise nowena awa.
43008056	Mama nisokare Abraham nu kei awaira be naso gamu sero yawa sara inoise noisonua. Are nu be naso giro yawa sara wenua awa.”
43008057	Ago senu Yuda ema meni ina ego sewa awa, “Ni zepa niso 50 kaka wamu ami Abraham gisita?”
43008058	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sane. Na Abraham kaka kei awamure noisona nowena ewa.”
43008059	Ago senu nukare omata puro damu sero wewa ibu mokara ena tara awero kei awenua awa.
43009001	Yesu nu susaumite ema zo miera nana tinira ena giti guma wai kei awero itisonua awa tamunua.
43009002	Ago wenu bua mai nuso meni nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, pasina ara amira ema ei awa giti guma wenu? Pasina nuso amirata mia mamera amira ni?”
43009003	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Amira oko aewa. Pasina nusorata mia mamera amira oko aewa. Anutu putou nusora susu ami ema emira nana kei awaise ago wenua awa.
43009004	Ema bama waikore bua wawera pi ziawi giro bua dotinowera, da ago ine nakai nama senu osena amira bua waikore inoise nuanekai. Be zo mai amire bua nuso waira be tepo wamunoya.
43009005	Na zebura nuamunona, te zasimai naso meni nikare zasipitinuamunoya awa.”
43009006	Ago sero pora we zebura niro zebure dawero puro emara gitira anenua awa.
43009007	Anero iyetitinoise ego senua awa, “Ni baro Siloam ou butura ana benau niso sewe.” Ago senua awa. (Siloam awa ge nasokaira “Iyetai”). Are ema awa baro ou butu amira ana giti moka sewenu giti moka keenua awa.
43009008	Giti moka keenu ewesemunu otao mamaita ema nu nena emo begomo tuasai gosinoisowa ami nu giro ego sewa awa, “Nena emo begomo toise itewia awa ni, tanita?”
43009009	Ago sewa eni meni ego sewa awa, “Nu awa.” Ota eni meni ego sewa awa, “Nu tepo, ata nu ine zo.” Ago toiwa nu nutope ego senua awa, “Zo tepo, ata na ewa.”
43009010	Ago senu nukare nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Nogo nogo wetesa giti moka niso kokopai weti?” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa,
43009011	“Ema zo zazo nuso Yesu ami zebu dawero giti moka nasora anero ego sero iyetia awa, ‘Siloam ou butura baro benau niso sewe.’ Ago sesi baro sewetena giti moka naso keetia.”
43009012	Ago senu nukare atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ema awa nago noi?” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na kaka gamu inona.” Ago senua awa.
43009013	Ago senu nukare ema gita nu giti guma wai awa puro bamu Farisayo dubura nana niwa.
43009014	Yesu meni zebu dawero emara giti mokara anenu keenua, awa Sabat pura amire wenua.
43009015	Are Farisayo nukare da ago atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni nogo wetesa giti moka niso keeti?” Ago sewa ema giti guma wai ami ego senua awa, “Nu zebu dawero giti moka nasora aneti na baro oura ena sewetena giti moka keetia.”
43009016	Ago senu Farisayo eni meni ego sewa awa, “Ema awa Sabat purara ge sai zewai wai awa doinoya, are nu Anutura nana ena oko munua.” Ota nusokare nana eni meni ego sewa awa, “Nu ema waya nuami sia, awa tani putoure ago ine oko wamia.” Ago toise ge ina-sa wero zazaumuwa awa.
43009017	Ago tomite ema giti guma wai awa noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Giti niso sesi keetia numore nogo tosi?” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Nu porofete.”
43009018	Ago senu Yuda ema meni ema giti keenua amira ge niniro giro, “Gita nu giti guma wai tepota,” asero mia mama nuso zawa sewa muwato atata wero ego sewa awa,
43009019	“Ei awa mai nisoto ni? Nu giti guma wai tinira ena kei awenuta? Ota nu nogoro giti moka keeti?”
43009020	Ago atata wewa ina ego sewato awa, “Nu mai nasoto awa gosinonato. Ota nu giti guma wai tinira ena kei awenua, awa gosinonato.
43009021	Ata nogo wero giti moka keeti amira susu nato kaka gamu inonato. Ata ai meni giti nuso sesi kokopai weti, awa nato kaka gamu inonato. Nu baziro ema wai, are nikare nu atata weu sai gawe.”
43009022	Mia mama nuso meni Yuda ema azu weroto ge ago sewato. Nera kota, Yuda ema nukare ge emoko ego sewa zewai wenua awa, “Zo nu Yesure ‘Nu Kristo’ asamunoya, nu awa tunero yere ibura ena esenamunonakai awa.”
43009023	Ago sewa, are mia mama nuto azu wero ego sewato awa, “Nu baziro ema wai, are nikare nu atata weu sai gawe.”
43009024	Are nukare ema giti guma wai awa noko zawa sewa munu ego sewa awa, “Ni Anutura benaura ena ge me se. Nakare ema amira susu gosinonakare. Nu ema waya.”
43009025	Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Nu ema wayata nogo wai ni, awa na kaka gamu inona. Ata na giti guma wai noe dotena giti moka keetia ami meni awa gosinona.”
43009026	Ago senu nukare noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Nimore nogo nogo weti, o nogo wero weti giti moka niso keeti?”
43009027	Ago sewa nu ina ego senua awa, “Na aware sesena awa. Nikare nogoro kaka ninamu wetewi? Nogoro sai matu da awa noko sana ninamu towi? Nikare dai bua mai nuso wamu towita?”
43009028	Ago senu nukare nu gona inoise ego sewa awa, “Nine bua mai nuso zo wero nosa. Nanekare meni awa Mosera bua mai awa.
43009029	Anutu meni Mosere ge tugata wenua. Ami meni awa ninitinowenakare. Ata ema awa nana ena kei awero munu, ami meni awa nakare kaka gamu inonakare.”
43009030	Ago sewa ema giti moka keenua ami di tainiro ego senua awa, “Nikare kei awai nusora susu kaka gamu inowa, ata saineba, nu weti giti naso keetia awa.
43009031	Nakai ego ine ninitinowenakai: Anutu meni ema waya-kawaya amira isa sai oko ninitinoya. Ata zo nu Anutu bowi inoise Anutura ara tamai inoya amira isa sai awa Anutu meni ninamunoya.
43009032	Ota ema zo giti guma wai tinira ena kei awenu zo senu giti keenua amira uge zo oko itia. Nakai uge zo ago ine gita ona kaka ninamu tupise noisonakai nowenakai.
43009033	Are ema awa Anutura nana ena kaka mamu wami sia, awa nu bua ago ine wai ine te oko wamia.”
43009034	Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Ni tinira ena kei awero pasina mai nowesa ami nakare tugata wamu tosita?” Ago sero nu yere ibura ena musuniro eseniwa awa.
43009035	Eseniwa Yesu meni niniro nu tamuro ego senua awa, “Nine Emara Mai tuma didinosita?” Ago senu nu ina ego senua awa,
43009036	“O Tua, ni are tosi? Gipe giro tuma diane.”
43009037	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni nu goitasa awa. Na ge tona, na ewa.”
43009038	Ago senu ema giti guma wai ami ego senua awa, “O Tua, na ni tuma didinona.” Ago sero muro nuso nana te gitira ena koininua awa.
43009039	Ago wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na ema susu nisokare kerenamu sero zebura osena awa. Ema duba giti guma wai ami garise sero, ota ema ‘nakare gai’ asinowera ami duba giti guma wai itarise sero osena awa.”
43009040	Ago senu Farisayo eni numore dai dopero itiwa ami niniro ego sewa awa, “Nakare dai duba giti guma wai ni?”
43009041	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Nikare duba giti guma wai nuamewa sia, awa pasinara ina nisokare nana oko itamia. Ata nitopekare ego towewa, ‘Nakare gai awa.’ Are pasinara ina nisokare nana itai gege itewia.” Ago senua awa.
43010001	Yesu meni ge ego senua awa, “Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo nu lamara goma amira toyamu sero so be doro demese ena goma zausemuro bamu mokara nitinoya, nu awa bewana ema. Nu nena ewera pai ema.
43010002	Zo nu so be piakaniro toitinoya, nu ami lama dia me awa.
43010003	Nu mawi giro so be dia wai meni so be piakanawi lama nuka nuso meni ge bapu nuso ninawera goma mokara ena zazo nusokare sero sero awero uzumuro puro susawewia awa.
43010004	Nu lama nuso uzumawi ge bapu nuso ninawera nu gita wawi nukare nu ama ganero susawewera.
43010005	Ota ema zo ewe awa nukare oko ama anamunora. Nukare ge bapu nuso ewe niniro azu wero sumamunora.”
43010006	Yesu nu ge bezai awa senu nukare ge nusora susu kaka gamu wewa.
43010007	Yesu meni noko sero senua awa, “Na me memeka sana niniu. Lama toitinowera amira so be awa na ewa.
43010008	Na kaka kei awamure gita kei awewa nukare awa bewana ema. Nukare nena ewera pai ema. Ata lama meni ge nusokare doro azu wewa awa.
43010009	Lamara so be awa na ewa. Zo nu goma mokara toyamu sero naso nana mamunoya, awa nu Anutu meni soero pamunoya. Ago wai nu toiro pusumuro awinoise nena zamai bamubake tamamunoya.
43010010	Bewana ema nu lama bewana wamu sero, o damu sero, o dero tepo-tapo wamu sero tupewia. Ata nane meni awa lama zamai bamubakere kokopai nuarise sero kei awena awa.
43010011	Na lama dia wai kokopai. Dia kokopai meni lama dubu emo nuai nuso duamunoya.
43010012	Ota soumai meni awa, nu dia me tepo. Lama awa nuso kota, ewera, are abu suna kei awai giro nu lama dubu doro azu bayai abu suna meni gamai bozamunora.
43010013	Nu soumai gege. Nu lama dubu emo oko kotupitinoya. Are nu doro susawia.
43010014	-
43010015	Na dia kokopai nowena. Nato Mamere ina-ga inowenato, da ago ine na ata lama dubu naso nakare ina-ga inoise nowenakare. Are na lama dubu emo nuai naso dotinona awa.
43010016	Lama dubu naso zo nora, awa nukare goma emira oko aewa. Are na baro uzumuro puro mana ge naso ninamunora. Ago wana lama dubu daimata wero dia daimata wero nuamunora.
43010017	Na nuai naso doro noko pamunona, are Mama meni na ara tapinowia.
43010018	Nuai naso awa ema zo meni oko soero pamunoya. Awa kotumai nasora duamunona. Na nuai naso doro noko pamunona amira putou na itia. Mama naso meni ago wanise senua awa.” Ago senua awa.
43010019	Yuda ema nukare ge awa niniro zaumuro dubu eto wewa.
43010020	Dubu bamu meni ego sewa awa, “Bi meni mokara toi dau inoya. Nogoro ge nuso ninitinowi?”
43010021	Ata eni meni ego sewa awa, “Bire meni ge ago ine oko samunoya. Bi meni ema giti guma wewenai awa sai giti panamunorita? Tepo awa.” Ago sewa awa.
43010022	Yuda emara pura zo zazo nuso Ibu Bamu Korawewa amira be munu giro nukare Yerusalem ena auniwa. Be awa zazamara be.
43010023	Are Yesu meni ibu bamura osi zo zazo nuso Solomonra Osi amira izima-sauma awinoinu
43010024	Yuda ema nukare nu zimuro atata wero ego sewa awa, “Ni nogoro susu niso bezawesa nakare itazaita inowenikare? Ni Soyai Ema nasokare Kristo me noma giro kereniro se ganekare.”
43010025	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ina ego senua awa, “Na sesena ninisewa, ata ninewa me kaka wamu inoya. Ata bua eni na Mama nasora bera inowena ami susu naso kerenitinowia.
43010026	Ata nikare lama dubu nasoko, are ge naso ninewa me kaka wamu inoya.
43010027	Lama dubu naso wero nowera nukare awa ge naso ninitinowera. Are nane nukare gosinuawena na ama ganinowera.
43010028	Ago wawera na nuai me ewanana numorekare potawena kaka betamu nuai gege nowera. Nukare wana nasora ena zo meni soero pai ine oko itia.
43010029	Mama naso meni nukare namore potinua awa. Mama naso meni ema dapikarago ata nena dapikarago awa dainitinowia. Are zo meni Mama nasora wanera ena nukare soero pai ine tepo.
43010030	Na ata Mama awa nato daimata.” Ago senua awa.
43010031	Ago senu Yuda ema nukare omata meni Yesu noko damu wewa.
43010032	Damu inoiwa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Bua kokopai dainiro Mamera soremai amira wetena gewa, are nikare tani na-awa giro na omata meni damu towi?”
43010033	Ago senu nukare be nusora puro ego sewa awa, “Bua kokopai inowesa amira kota, ni da ago ema nowesa ami Anutu dainitinoise ni nitope Anutu asinowesa, ami emo nakare ni omata meni damu tonakare.”
43010034	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Lo ge nisokarera ego gayai itia awa, ‘Anutu meni ego senua awa: Nikare tua.’
43010035	Agoro ge gayai itia awa doro zo sai ine oko itia. Are Anutura ge ewowo-kawowo nasokai amira nana kei awenu giro nu nukare ‘Tua’ asenua,
43010036	noko Mama nama gita ose zebura nanise sero na senu osena. Are na natope Anutura Mai asawena nikare nogoro na Anutu dainamu inona asinowewi?
43010037	Bua inowena awa gawa Mama nasora ine kaka wamu wamunoya, awa ge naso duawa te wamunoya.
43010038	Ota gawa Mama nasora ine wamunoya, awa ge nasora kota, bua wai nasora na gawa me waise. Ago inoise Mama meni namore dai nowia, da ago ine na Mamere dai nowena, amira susu awa giro baitamunowa.”
43010039	Ago senu giro nukare nu benamu sero wewa doro bamunua awa.
43010040	Yesu nu baro ou Yodan enibara Yohane meni gita ema bama ge ou gutinoisonua ago baro noisonua awa.
43010041	Ago noinu ema dainiro meni nuso nana baro ego sewa awa, “Yohane nu tani putoure zo kaka wamu. Ata ge Yohane meni ema emire sisia awa me inoya.”
43010042	Are ema dainiro meni so amira ana Yesu tuma diwa awa.
43011001	Betani natara ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Lasaro. Nu ami yaya puro itinua. Mariato Matare, nuto maeto zawere, nuto nata da amira.
43011002	(Maria ou zamare meni Tuara te sewero giti tu nuso meni Tuara te gaenua amira numata Lasaro ami yaya puro itinua.)
43011003	Are maeto zawere meni Yesura nana ge ego ine potiwato bamunua, “O Tua, ni nini. Otao niso yaya puro itia.”
43011004	Ge ago potiwato bamunu Yesu meni niniro giro ego senua awa, “Yaya amira me awa betai kei awaise kota, ema bama meni Anutu bowi warise sai awa. Ema bama meni Anutura Mai bowi warise sero yaya awa kei awitaya.” Ago senua awa.
43011005	Yesura ara tamai awa Matato zawere ata Lasaro amira nana itisonua.
43011006	Are nu yaya ge niniro waiko be eto dago itinua.
43011007	Ago itimite nusokare nana bayamu sero bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Muu. Yudaya zebura ewesemuro bayanekai.”
43011008	Ago senu bua mai nuso meni ego sewa awa, “Gipai ema, waiko be zo omire Yuda ema omata meni ni damu sisera, awa nogoro amire noko nusokare nana ewesemanisekai tosi?”
43011009	Ago sewa Yesu meni bua waira be nuso kaka tepo wamu dago itinua awa garise sero ge bezai zo ego senua awa, “Bua waira be 12 aua itia awa. Zo nu waikore ebete susauma te oko koinamunoya. Nera kota, nu zebura zasimai gosinoya.
43011010	Zo nu pire ebete zasimai tepo susauma te koiniro duwamunoya.”
43011011	Ago sero ge zo ego senua awa, “Otao nasokai Lasaro gitawa inoya, ata nakai barokai na nu awa-uzamunona.”
43011012	Ago senu bua mai nuso meni ego sewa awa, “Tua, nu auro kokopai wamunoya.”
43011013	Yesu meni betaira ge awa gitawa waira potiro senu bua mai nuso meni gitawa mere toita asero ago sewa awa.
43011014	Are Yesu meni kereniro ego senua awa, “Lasaro betitaya.
43011015	Na ago kaka baro nuamu ego nona betitaya, are na nikare emo duba naso kokopai inoya. Nikare tuma diai mere nuawise nena awa kei awitaya. Are nuso nana bayanekai.”
43011016	Ago senu Tomas zazo nuso zo Didimo nune ami otao mamaire ego senua awa, “Nakai baro numore dai betanekai.” Ago senua awa.
43011017	Lasaro bi ditira itinu be zoeto-zoeto wenu amire Yesu baro kei awenua.
43011018	Betani nata awa Yerusalem nana zorage kena itinua. Bayaira ebata awa kilomita 4 gege.
43011019	Are Yuda ema dainiro meni Matato Mariara numata betenua awa gamu muwa awa.
43011020	Are Mata nu “Yesu tupia,” ago sewa giro Maria sora dago itinu nune baro Yesu ebete ena tamunua.
43011021	Tamuro numore ego senua awa, “O Tua, ni ego nuamesa, awa numata naso oko betamia.
43011022	Agoro na susu niso gosinona. Ni zeme nena zo emo Anutu isa sasa ninamunoya.”
43011023	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Numata niso seka wero eramunoya.”
43011024	Ago senu Mata meni ina ego senua awa, “Ama be bamura ena seka wero eramunoya awa gosinona.”
43011025	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Seka wero erai ata nuai amira mama na ewa. Are zo nu na tuma diamunoya ami betero noko eriro nuamunoya.
43011026	Ota zo nu seka noise na tuma diro nuamunoya ami kaka betamu seka nuai gege nuamunoya. Ni ge awa ninesa me inoita?”
43011027	Ago senu Mata meni ego senua awa, “Ni Kristo, Anutura Mai me. Ni zebura osasise sai, awa ninena me weti giro ni tuma didinona.”
43011028	Ago sero baro zawa nuso Maria zawa senu munu upene ego senua awa, “Gipai ema muro ni zawa toya.”
43011029	Ago senu Maria meni niniro eya eriro Yesura nana bamunua.
43011030	Yesu nu nata atura ena Matare ge senua zara da amira dopero itinua.
43011031	Itinu Maria eriro bamunu Yuda ema betaira muro itiwa ami “Maria bi ditira ena di samu susawia,” asero ama ganero bamuwa.
43011032	Are Maria nu ose nata atura niro Yesu tamuro nuso nana koiniro ego senua awa, “O Tua, ni ego nuamesa, awa numata naso oko betamia.”
43011033	Ago sero di senu Yuda ema Maria ama ganewa ami Maria giro da ago di eroma sewa awa. Di sewa Yesu meni ginu mou wenu koininua awa.
43011034	Yesu meni atata wero ego senua awa, “Nu nago gowitawi?” Ago atata wenu ego sewa awa, “Tua, mu gase.”
43011035	Ago sewa Yesu di senu diriu munua.
43011036	Ago wenu Yuda ema nukare nu giro ego sewa awa, “Giu. Duba nuso bamubake Lasaro nana itia.”
43011037	Ago sewa eni meni ego sewa awa, “Giti guma wai zo senu giti panenua da ago ine ema ei awa betai azu wero nu kora wai kokopai wai te kaka wamu inoita?”
43011038	Ago toiwa Yesu ge awa niniro moka nuso meni yaya bamubake tamuro bamu bi ditira ninua. Betaira masi awa omata bamubake meni dereweniwa baro be gazenua.
43011039	Are Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Omata be gazai awa derewieu bayae.” Ago senu Mata nu betaira nubama ami ego senua awa, “Tua, nu waiko zoeto-zoeto awia, are gugumu toya.”
43011040	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na ego sesena awa, ‘Ni na tuma diamunosa, awa ni Anutura putou gamunosa.’ Ge awa sesena ninesita?”
43011041	Ago senu omata dereweniwa bamunu Yesu meni iri ike niro ego senua awa, “Mama, ni isa naso nenesa, are na nimore kokopai asinona.
43011042	Ni isa naso be giti ninitinowesa awa gosinowena. Ata ema dubu emi nine sesa osena awa gara me waise sero ge ago tona awa.”
43011043	Ago sero zawa sero ego senua awa, “Lasaro, ni pusumuro mu.”
43011044	Zawa senu betai meni pusumuro munua awa. Te-wana nuso mo meni dowai, ota benau nuso mo meni gopai, are Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Mo beseu bayae.” Ago senu mo besewa bamunua awa.
43011045	Yuda ema Maria nana muro itiwa amira nana dainiro meni tani putoure awa giro Yesu tuma diwa awa.
43011046	Ata eni meni awa Farisayo emara nana bamuro Yesu meni tani wenua amira ge uge wewa awa.
43011047	Are pris babezinomare Farisayo ema nukare ge awa niniro giti kopi dubu zawa sewa muwa auniro ego sewa awa, “Ema ami tani putoure dainiro inowia, are nu nogo wamunonikai?
43011048	Nakai nu duanakai tani ago ine inuai ema dapikarago nu tuma diara Roma emara soldia meni nakai iwo wero muro ibu bamu nasokaire dubu nasokaire awa gera wamunora.”
43011049	Ago sewa otao nusokare zo zazo Kayafa nu zepa amire pris bamu wero noisonua ami ego senua awa, “Nikare kotumai tepo nowewa.
43011050	Nikare ego giu. Ebata kokopai ego itia awa. Ema dubu nakai waya wai azu, ema daimata ami nakai emo betaise.” Ago senua awa.
43011051	Ge awa kotumai nusora oko senua. Nu zepa be amire pris bamu wero noisonua, are nu porofete meni sago wero Yesu nu Yuda ema dubu emo betamu inoinua amira ge senua.
43011052	Yesu betamu inoinua, awa Yuda ema emo gege kota, nu Anutura mai awiso zebu sero nowera nukare dapikarago poti dara nai dubu daimata wero nuarise betamu inoinua awa.
43011053	Are giti kopi dubu nukare waiko be amire Yesu puro daira ge bua zaawewa.
43011054	Are Yesu nu Yuda emara nana noko kaka kei awero nuamu. Nu bua mai nuso puro bamuro nata zo zazo Efraim ware kena itinua amira noisowa awa.
43011055	Yuda emara pura zo zazo Betai Daininua amira be zora awenu giro nata pei-mamaira ema dainiro meni pasina disaira buara gita witiro bamu Yerusalem niwa.
43011056	Are nukare Yesu kau inoise ibu bamura auniro ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, “Nikare nogo towi? Nu pura emire mamunoita, tepo ni?”
43011057	Pris babezinomare Farisayo emare nukare sai zewai wai ge ego sewa awa, “Ema zo meni nu tamuro giro saise nu puro benare.” Ago sewa awa.
43012001	Betai Daininua amira pura nusokarera waiko be 6 ago itinu Yesu meni Betani nate kei awenua. Nu gita nata amira ana Lasaro betaira ena awa-uzenu seka wero erinua awa.
43012002	Are Yesu emo nena sawewa Mata meni dumunu Lasaro dai arumuro nena niwa awa.
43012003	Nena ninoise itiwa Maria meni boto kiaka zo ou zamare kokopai zazo nuso nad zuma bamubakere, awa puro Yesura te gutero giti tu nuso meni te nuso gaenua awa. Ago wenu so itiwa awa zama sere-sere wenua awa.
43012004	Ago wenu Yudas Iskeriot, nu Yesu kerenamu noinua, ami ego senua awa,
43012005	“Nakai nogoro ou zamare awa potanakai 300 kina meni zuma gaero pumara moni awa bogamasare kaka potamu wetenikai?”
43012006	Nu ema bogamasare kotumuro oko senua. Yesu bua maire amira moni awa kaita zora potasara Yudas meni dia inoise moni eni bewana pupinoisonua awa. Are ge awa senua awa.
43012007	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Nikare bamere ge oko sawe. Nu ou zamare awa puro nuai na betana amire woi naso gutai gowawe.
43012008	Erama bogamasa nukare be giti nimorekare dai nowera nuamunora. Ata nane meni awa nimorekare dai oko nuai gege nuamunona.” Ago senua awa.
43012009	Yesu nata amira noinua amira oziga Yuda ema dainiro meni niniro muwa. Ota nukare Yesu gege gamu kota, Lasaro betaira ena awa-uzenu seka wero erinua awa dai gamu muwa.
43012010	Are pris babezinoma meni Lasaro dai damu ge bua wewa awa.
43012011	Nera kota, Yuda ema dainiro meni Lasaro awa-uzenu seka wero erinua awa giro pris babezinoma doro Yesu tuma diwa, are nukare Lasaro dai damu sewa awa.
43012012	Pina atinu ema dubu bamubake meni pura nusokarera Yerusalem auniwa ami ge oziga ego niniwa awa, “Yesu tupia.”
43012013	Ge awa niniro giro ni gomi bozero wane-wane wero ebete ena tamamu bamuwa awa. Tamuro yawa sara inoise ego sewa awa, “Tuara bera nasokai nana tupia, nu awa bowi wanekai. Nu Tua nasokai Isreli emara.”
43012014	Yesu nu wo donki mai zo tamuro amira tame witiro arumuro bamunua. Awa ge gayai ego itia amira te wenua awa:
43012015	Zion natara, nikare azu oko wawe. Giu. Ema tua nisokare tupia. Nu wo donki maira tame arumuro tupia.
43012016	Ge awa gita bua mai nuso meni kaka giro baitamu wewa awa. Noe Yesu nu witi utu zasimai nusora ninu amire ge awa kotumuro susu giwa awa. Ge awa numore gayai, are amira te wewa awa.
43012017	Nukare dubu bamu meni Yesu Lasaro zawa senu bi ditira ena kei awenu giwa ami ge uge wewa dubu bamu meni niniwa.
43012018	Tani amira oziga niniwa, are ema dainiro meni baro nu ebete ena tamuwa awa.
43012019	Ago wewa Farisayo nukare nutopekare ego toise sewa awa, “Gosinowa. Nikare ge bua gege kaputitinowa. Ema dapikarago nuso nana gege susawera.” Ago sewa awa.
43012020	Yuda ema pura nusokarera Yerusalem aunitinoiwa Grik ema eni meni numorekare dai aunai amira noiwa awa.
43012021	Are Grik ema ami Filip, nu Besaida natara Galilaya zebura, amira nana baro ego sewa awa, “Otao, nakare Yesu gamu tonakare.”
43012022	Ago sewa Filip meni baro Anderea sero eroma Yesura nana baro sewato awa.
43012023	Sewato Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na Emara Mai meni simai zasimaire pumamunona, amira be zora awinoya.
43012024	Na ge me memeka sana niniu. Koni me zo zebura duro kaka zasamu wamunoya, awa nu imata tepo itamunoya. Ata nu zebura duro zasero eramunoya, awa nu me witai ziamunoya.
43012025	Da ago ine, zo nu nuai nuso ara tapinowia amira nuai tepo wamunoya awa. Zo nu zebura noise nuai nuso iwo inowia ami nuai nuso zizinoise nuai me ewanana tamamunoya awa.
43012026	Zo nu soumai naso wero nuamu wero giro na ama waise. Ago wero na nuamunona amira soumai naso nuamunoya awa. Zo nu na sou wamunoya nu awa Mama naso meni simamunoya.
43012027	Zeme moka naso meni mamana awero zipinoya. Are na nogo samunoni? Mama, ni yaya ei awa musuni. Ago samunonita? Tepo awa. Na ge ago oko sane. Nera kota, na yaya ei awa umuro betamu sero osena.
43012028	O Mama, ni zazo niso de ike ni.” Yesu meni ago senu utura ena ge ego osenua awa, “Na zazo naso de ike nitana, noko de ike namunona.”
43012029	Ago senu ema dubu dopero itiwa ami niniro ego sewa awa, “Tarara gatetia.” Ota eni meni ego sewa awa, “Angelo zo meni ge numore sesi, tanita.”
43012030	Ago sewa Yesu meni nusokare nana bera puro ego senua awa, “Ge awa namore kota, nikare emo kei awetia.
43012031	Zeme Anutu meni zebura ema bama awina-dawina wamunoya. Zeme na zebu emira tua dereniro masi nuso pumamunona.
43012032	Nukare na zebura ena puro witi ike nara zebu serora ema bama zumana naso nana mamunora.” Ago senua awa.
43012033	Awa betai nogo betamu inoinu amira ge awa senua.
43012034	Ago senu ema itiwa ami ego sewa awa, “Nakare ge gayai itia amira ego gosinowenakare awa: Soyai Ema nasokare Kristo nu kaka betamu nuai gege nuamunoya. Ata nine meni awa ego tosa, ‘Emara Mai puro witiro nira ikonamunora.’ Nogoro ago tosi? Emara Mai aweni?”
43012035	Ago sewa Yesu meni ge ina ego senua awa, “Zasimai meni nisokare nana ena be apunu-kaka gege zasimamunoya awa. Are mume meni nikare dowai azu, zasimai itai zasimaire noiwo. Zo nu mumera susawise ebata oko gosinoya.
43012036	Are zasimai nisokare nana itai duba meni tuma didinoise dubu nuso wero noiwo.” Yesu meni ge ago sero nukare doro baro bezero noisonua awa.
43012037	Yesu nu tani putoure dainiro nusokare nana giti mokara wero munu gosinoise nu tuma kaka diamu wewa awa.
43012038	Awa porofete Yesayara ge me waise ago ine wewa awa. Nu ge ego gaenua awa, Tua, oziga niso sawenakare ai meni gawi me inowi? Tua meni putou nuso are kereninu?
43012039	Are nukare Yesura ge niniro nu tuma diai ine tepo wewa. Nera kota, Yesayara ge gayai zo itinua. Ge awa ego ewa,
43012040	Anutu meni ego senua awa, “Nukare giti moka meni nena gai azu, o duba meni nena kotumuro gai azu, o duba nusokare kapetenara na nukare kora wai azu.” Anutu meni ago sero senu giti moka nusokare guma wenua, ota nu duba nusokare gazenu omata ine wenua.
43012041	Yesaya meni ge awa gaenua. Nera kota, nu Yesura simai zasimaire giro ge awa Yesure senua awa.
43012042	Yuda emara gita wai ema dainiro meni Yesu tuma diwa. Ata nukare tuma diai nusokare kerenara Farisayo meni nukare yere ibura ena esenai azu, tuma diai bezero noisowa awa.
43012043	Ago wewa, nera kota, Anutu meni nukare bowi waise awa yaba pei-kaka inoisowa. Ata ema meni nukare bowi warise awa yaba bamubake inoisowa awa.
43012044	Yesu meni zawa sero ego senua awa, “Zo nu na tuma diamunoya ami na gege kota, na senu osena nu awa dai tuma diamunoya.
43012045	Ota zo nu na gamunoya ami na senu osena awa dai gamunoya.
43012046	Zo nu na tuma diamunoya ami mumera itai azu sero na zasimai ine ami zebura osena awa.
43012047	Zo nu ge naso niniro kaka dimamu duamunoya nu awa nane oko gera potamunona. Na ema gera potamu kota, korawamu osena awa.
43012048	Zo nu ge naso niniro doro na azu samunoya amira zas itia. Ge towena ami ama be bamura ena zas nuso wamunoya.
43012049	Nera kota, na ge towena, awa duba nasora oko towena. Mama na senu osena ami ge sanise sero na tugata-magata wenua awa.
43012050	Na ego gosinowena: Mamera ge meni nuai me ewanana tapinowia. Are ge towena awa Mama meni sero gipenua te towena awa.” Ago senua awa.
43013001	Betai Daininua amira pura be zora awinoinu Yesu nu nutope ego ginua awa, “Na zebu doro ewesemuro Mamera nana witamunona amira be zora awinoya.” Ago gosinoise giro bua mai nuso zebura noisowa awa dubara dumi pumunua. Dumi pumai nuso awa kaka tepo wamu.
43013002	Pire nukare nena namu auniro itiwa tani ego ine kei awenua. Simonra mai Yudas Iskeriot nu Yesu kerenaise Satan meni kotumai awa emoko duba nusora potinu itinua awa.
43013003	Are Yesu meni ego ginua awa: “Mama nu nena dapikarago wana nasora potinu itewia. Na Anutura nana ena osena, noko Anutura nana ewesemuro witamunona.”
43013004	Kotumai ago gosinoise nena ninoinua awa doro eriro tama woi nuso tame awa dutero poti enibara niro tauli zo puro ipune awero
43013005	ou tewara zozero bua mai nusora te sewenua awa. Sewero tauli ipune itinua ami te nusokare gaenua.
43013006	Ago inoise mai enira te sewero amire Simon Petorora te sewamu wenu nu ego senua awa, “Ni Tua meni te naso sewamu tosa?”
43013007	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Tani inona emira susu ni oko gosinosa. Noma ama gamunosa.”
43013008	Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Tepo awa. Ni te naso oko sewamunosa.” Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na te niso kaka sewamu wana ni namore dai duba da wero oko nuamunosa.”
43013009	Ago senu Simon Petoro meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, ago sero giro te naso gege kota, wanere gitire dai sewe.”
43013010	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Zo nu ou gutero noma te nuso gege sewai tama saramamunoya. Nikare saramai. Ata nisokare nana zo meni saramaire oko nowia.”
43013011	Nu kerenai ema awa gosinoise amire ego senua awa, “Nisokare nana zo meni saramaire oko nowia.”
43013012	Yesu meni te nusokare sewero pesuniro tama woi nuso iboi noko wosuniro arumuro itise ego senua awa, “Na nena nimorekare wetena amira susu gosinowita?
43013013	Nikare namore gipai ema asise, o Tua asise awinoise nowewa. Na ago wero nowena, are me towewa.
43013014	Are na Tua nisokare o gipai ema nisokare meni na natope puro osisinoise te nisokare sewetena giro nikare nitopekare puro osisinoise te ina-sewa inoise nuawa te wamunoya.
43013015	Na tani nimorekare gipetena awa puro noise na wetena da ago ine inoise noiwo.
43013016	Na me memeka sana niniu. Soumai zo meni ema tua nusora nuai awa dainiro nuai ine oko itia. Ota buara senu bamunua ami buara mama dainai ine oko itia.
43013017	Are nikare ge awa niniro baitiro amira te nuamunowa, awa nikare yawa sara wamunowa.
43013018	Na ge sesena ami nikare dapikarago oko pupinoya. Dubu sianiro pumuna nikare awa gosinona. Ata ge gayai zo ego itia awa me waise sai itia, ‘Ma ewawena ninowia ami na damu toya.’
43013019	Tani awa kaka kei awamure na nikare bere-bere tugata inona. Are ama tani awa kei awai amire nikare namore ego sewo, ‘Nu me Soyai Ema nasokai Kristo.’
43013020	Na me memeka sane. Zo nu nikare buara potina awa sawa diamunoya ami buara mama na sawa dia ago ine wamunoya. Zo nu na sawa diamunoya ami na senu osena nu awa dai sawa dia ago ine wamunoya.
43013021	Yesu nu ge ago sero moka nuso waya wenu giro kereniro ego senua awa, “Na me memeka nimorekare sane. Nisokare nana zo meni na kereniro iwora nana wanera potamunoya.”
43013022	Ago senu bua mai nuso nukare ina-ga wero are toi asero kau wewa awa.
43013023	Are mai zo Yesura nana zorage itinua. Yesu nu ara tapinoisonua.
43013024	Are Simon Petoro meni giti-awa meni etete wero ego senua awa, “Atata we sai gase. Are toi?”
43013025	Ago senu mai ami Yesu nana zorage baro be dane potiro ego senua awa, “Tua, ni are tosi?”
43013026	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Porong sura patiro potana namunoya nu amire tona.” Ago sero porong sura patiro Simonra mai Yudas Iskeriot amire potinu ninua awa.
43013027	Ninu Satan meni moka nusora toinua awa. Ago wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Tani wamu tosa awa eya weyo.”
43013028	Ge ago Yudasre senu eni dai itiwa ami gera susu kaka gamu wewa awa.
43013029	Eni meni ego sewa awa, “Yudas nu moni nasokai dia inowia, are nu pura emira nena zo paise sesi susawita? Ota ema bogamasare moni kanowaise toi?” Ago sewa awa.
43013030	Yudas nu porong niro eya eriro pi mumere bamunua awa.
43013031	Yudas bamunu Yesu meni bua mai enire ego senua awa, “Emara Mai amira zazo de ike naira be zeme zora awetia. Tani naso nana kei awamunoya ami Anutura zazo de ike namunoya.
43013032	Are na Emara Mai meni Anutura zazo de ike nana nu nutope zazo naso de ike namunoya. Agoro be iboi tepo, eya de ike namunoya.
43013033	O mai awiso naso, na be apunu-kaka nimorekare dai nuamunona. Ama nikare na kau wamunowa. Are na Yuda ema enire sisena da ago ine nimorekare sane. Na bayamunona amira nikare bayai ine oko itia.
43013034	Are na potai ge seka zo nimorekare potitinona. Dubara dumi ina-pa wewo. Na nikare dubara dumi pumawena nowewa ago ine nitopekare dubara dumi ina-pa inoise noiwo.
43013035	Nikare dubara dumi ina-pa inoise nuawa ema nikare giro Yesura bua mai wero nora asamunora.” Ago senua awa.
43013036	Ago senu Simon Petoro meni atata wero ego senua awa, “Tua, ni nago bayamunosi?” Ago atata wenu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na bayamunona amira ni zeme emire bayai ine oko itia. Noma ama bayamunosa.”
43013037	Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Tua, ni nera na zeme nimore dai bayai ine oko itia asinosi? Na ni emo inoise nuai naso sisamunona te awa.”
43013038	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni na emo nuai niso sisamu tosa? Na me memeka sane. Kokara ge kaka samure nine na begi wasa be etorobara wamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
43014001	Yesu meni bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Nikare duba nisokare oko sisawe. Nikare Anutu tuma didinoise na dai tuma diwo.
43014002	Mama nasora nata amira ibu-mara dainiro itera. Ago kaka itamu sia, awa na itai zara nisokare sia wamu bayamunona ago oko samena.
43014003	Are na baro itai zara nisokare sia wero noko kapeteniro muro nikare uzumana baro na nuamunona da amira nuamunowa.
43014004	Bayamunona amira ebata awa gosinowewa.”
43014005	Ago senu Tomas meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, ni nago bayamunosi, awa nakare kaka gamu inonakare. Are nogo wero ebata gamunonikare?”
43014006	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ebata Mamera nana bayai awa na ewa. Ge me kerenai awa na ewa. Nuai seka potai awa na ewa. Na dainiro Mamera nana kei awai ine oko itia.
43014007	Nikare susu naso gamewa sia, awa nikare Mama nasora susu da ago gamewa. Zeme nikare Mama nasora susu gewa kei awinoya.”
43014008	Ago senu Filip meni ego senua awa, “Ni Mama gipasa giro te asamunonakare.”
43014009	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Filip, na be iboi-tatana nimorekare dai nuawena ni na kaka giro baitamu inowesita? Zo nu na gosinowia ami Mama gosinowia. Are ni nogoro, ‘Mama gipe ganekare,’ ago tosi?
43014010	Mama meni naso nana itewia, da ago na Mamera nana itewena, awa gesa me kaka wamu inoita? Ge nimorekare tugata inowena awa duba nasora oko tugata inowena. Mama meni duba nasora noise bua nuso inowia.
43014011	Mama meni namore itewia, o na da ago Mamere itewena ge awa niniwo me wae. Ota ge awa gawa me kaka wamu wai giro tani inowena awa kotumuro amire ge awa giwo me wae.
43014012	Na me memeka sana niniu. Zo nu na tuma diamunoya ami bua inowena da awa wamunoya. Na Mamera nana witamunona, are nu bua awa gege kota, wai nama awa dainiro bamu wamunoya.
43014013	Nikare zazo naso puro noise isa sawa te ninitinoise wamunona. Awa Mamera bowi kei awaise sero na Mai meni ago wamunona.
43014014	Nikare zazo naso puro noise na nena zo emo begomo sawa ninitinoise ago wamunona.
43014015	Ara tamai nisokare naso nana itamunoya, awa nikare ge naso dimamunowa.
43014016	Nane Mama begomo sana nu Soremai nisokare zo potai osero nimorekare dai nuai gege nuamunoya.
43014017	Nu awa Ozana. Nu ge me susure nimorekare gipamunoya. Ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera ami Ozana giti moka nusokare meni oko gosinowera. Noko nukare nu kotumai meni oko gosinowera. Are nukare Ozana puro nuai ine tepo. Ata nu nimorekare dai nowia, ota moka nisokarera toiro nuamunoya. Are nikare nu giro baititinowewa.
43014018	Na nikare duana popoiwo oko wero nuamunowa. Na nisokare nana noko ewesemuro mamunona.
43014019	Be apunu-kaka zo itia awa tepo wai amire ema na tuma kaka diamu nowera ami na noko oko gamunora. Ata ninekare na gamunowa. Na nuai gege nowena, are nikare dai nuamunowa awa.
43014020	Ozana meni ose nisokare nana nai amire Mama meni namore dai nowia, ota na nimorekare dai nowena, ota nikare namore dai nowewa, amira susu awa giro baitamunowa.
43014021	Zo nu bera ge naso niniro puro dipinoise nowia amira ara tamai awa naso nana itia. Are zo nu na ara tapinowia, da ago ine Mama naso meni nu ara tamamunoya. Ota nane da ago nu ara tapinoise susu naso numore kerenamunona.”
43014022	Ago senu Yudas Iskeriot amira zazo meni atata wero ego senua awa, “Tua, ni nogo wero susu niso namorekare gege kerenitinoise ema eni bamu amire kaka kerenamu bezamunosi?”
43014023	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Zo nu na ara tamamunoya ami ge naso niniro dimamunoya. Ago wai Mama naso meni nu ara tamamunoya. Ago inoise nato Mamere nuso nana kei awero nuamunonato awa.
43014024	Zo nu na ara kaka tamamu wamunoya ami ge naso oko dimamunoya. Ota ge tugata wawena gosinowewa awa naso kota, Mama na iyetinua amira nana ena tupewia awa.
43014025	Na nimorekare dai noise ge ago ine tugata-magata inowena awa.
43014026	Ota Soremai nisokare Ozana awa nu Mama meni be nasora iyetai osero ge dapikarago nimorekare tugata-magata wamunoya. Ge nane tugata inowena da awa Ozana meni awa-uzero tepo wamunoya.
43014027	Na duba-ozaire nuai awa nimorekare potitinona. Na duba-ozaire nuai naka naso awa nimorekare potitinona. Zebura ema meni potitinowera ago ine kota, duba-ozaire nuai naso me awa nimorekare potitinona. Are duba nisokare azu wai tepo, kotumu-katumu wai tepo, itarise.
43014028	Na ego sesena ninewa awa. Na nikare doro baro noma noko nisokare nana ewesemuro mamunona. Nikare na ara tamamewa sia, awa na Mamera nana witamunona awa giro yawa sara wamewa. Nera kota, Mama nu witai naso nowia.
43014029	Tani naso nana kei awamunoya awa kaka kei awamure gita nimorekare tona. Are kei awai amire tuma diai nisokare zewai waise.
43014030	Na ge dainiro susumuro nimorekare oko samunona. Zebura tua Satan meni naso nana mamu inoise inoya. Ata nu namore tani zo wai ine tepo.
43014031	Ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera ami ara tamai naso Mamera nana itia awa garise sero bua ge towia awa inowena. Are eriu bayanekai.” Ago senua awa.
43015001	Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na wain susu me. Mama naso meni wain buara mama.
43015002	Bona zo naso nana itise me kaka ziamu wai giro kapero duamunoya. Ota bona zo mere itai giro me dainiro ziaise sero kapero kora wai saramamunoya.
43015003	Nikare awa ge tugata wena niniwa, are Mama naso meni waya nisokare kapero nikare kora wenu saramuro nowewa.
43015004	Are nikare namore dai nuawa na da ago nimorekare dai nuamunona. Wain bona meni susure kaka gamamu nu gege itise me oko ziamunoya. Are nikare da ago ine namore kaka tayamu inoise me oko ziamunowa.
43015005	Na awa wain susu. Nikare awa bona-wagana. Zo nu naso nana susumuro nuamunoya, awa na da ago nuso nana susumuro nuamunona. Ago wana nu me witai ziamunoya. Nikare na doro noise Anutura bua zo wai ine oko itia.
43015006	Zo nu naso nana kaka susumamu wamunoya, nu awa duamunona. Ago wana wain bona duawera amawi sianiro niaora potawera awinowia ago ine wamunoya.
43015007	Nikare naso nana susumuro ge naso poti dube niro nuamunowa, awa nena zota zo emo begomo sawa nisokare nana kei awamunoya.
43015008	Nikare me bamubake zizinoise bua mai naso wero nuawa Mama nasora bowi kei awamunoya.
43015009	Mama meni na ara tapinowia, da ago ine nane nikare ara tapinowena. Are nikare ara tamai nasora noiwo.
43015010	Na Mama nasora ge dipinowena, are ara tamai nuso naso nana itewia. Da ago ine nikare ge naso dimamunowa, awa ara tamai naso nisokare nana itamunoya.
43015011	Yawa sara wai naso meni nisokare nana itai amire yawa sara nisokare meni moka nisokarera be muro itaise sero ge awa sesena.
43015012	Potai ge naso ego itia awa: Na nikare ara tapinowena, da ago ine nitopekare ara ina-tama inoise noiwo.
43015013	Zo nu otao mamai nuso soyamu wero giro nuai nuso nukare emo doro betamunoya amira ara tamai awa ara tamai me asamunora.
43015014	Ge potitinowena awa dimamunowa, awa nikare otao mamai naso wamunowa.
43015015	Na be zeme emire nimorekare soumai oko tona. Nera kota, soumai meni ema tua nusora kotumai itewia awa oko gosinowia. Na nikare soumai kota, otao mamai naso asinona. Nera kota, nane Mama nasora nana ena ge ninina awa te kereniro tugata wero tepo watana. Are na nikare gena otao mamai naso inowa awa.
43015016	Ninekare na buara bayanise sero oko pumuwa. Nane nikare buara bayawise sero pumuna. Are nikare baro buara me bamubake ziawise sena awa. Are me ziawa itai gege itaise. Ago wero zazo naso puro noise Mama begomo sawa te potamunoya.
43015017	Nikare nitopekare ara ina-tama inoise noiwo. Ge awa potai ge naso awa.
43015018	Ema ge naso kaka ninamu ami nikare iwo wara amire ego sewo, ‘Gita Tua ago zaawero iwo wewa.’
43015019	Ema ge naso kaka ninamu amira mokara toyamewa sia, awa nukare nikare saore giro nimorekare otao wamera. Ata na nikare nusokare nana dubura ena sianiro pumuna nuai nusokare dowa, are nukare nikare iwo inowera awa.
43015020	Ge zo nimorekare ego sesena awa kotumuwo: Soumai meni ema tua nusora nuai awa nune dainiro nuai ine oko itia. Ge amira susu ego ewa. Eni meni ge naso niniro dipinora, da ago ine eni meni ge nisokare niniro dimamunora. Ota eni meni na iwo inora, da ago ine eni meni nikare iwo wamunora.
43015021	Nukare nu na iyetinua awa kaka gamu inowera, are da ago ine nimorekare wamunora. Nikare bua mai naso, are ago ine wamunora.
43015022	Na nusokare nana kaka osamu wamena, ota susu naso kaka tugata wamu wamena, awa nukare pasina amu nuamera. Ota zeme nukare pasina nusokare nogo nogo sero bezamunori?
43015023	Zo nu na iwo inowia ami da ago ine Mama naso iwo inowia.
43015024	Na nusokare nana noise tani putoure ema meni wai ine tepo awa kaka wamu wamena, awa nukare pasina amu nuamera. Ata nukare tani putoure inowena awa giro na iwo inoise Mama naso da ago iwo inowera.
43015025	Ago wawera ge zo lo buku nusokarera gayai itewia awa me inowia. Ge awa ego ewa: ‘Nukare na tepo iwo wewa.’
43015026	Ata Soremai nisokare Mamera nana itewia awa iyetana Mamera nana ena osero nikare sorepitinoise susu naso nimorekare kerenamunoya. Nu awa Ozana. Ge me saira mama numa awa.
43015027	Ota nikare be bua zaawena amira ana namore dai nowewa ami dai susu naso kerenamunowa.
43016001	Ama nukare nena mou-mau nimorekare wara nikare itazaita wero tuma diai nisokare besai azu, na ge ei awa bere-bere kerenitinona awa.
43016002	Nukare yere ibu soyamunora. Awa daba kota, be zo mamunoya be amire nukare ‘Anutura bua inowenakare’ asinoise nikare dara bebetenamunowa.
43016003	Nukare nato Mamere awa kaka giro baitamu inowera, are ago ine wamunora.
43016004	Ge tona ami me wai amire, ‘Yesu gita namorekai ago senua,’ ago sawise sero nikare bere-bere tugata inona. Na nikare gipamu sero bua zaawero noina be amire be naso iboi itinua, are na ge awa gita nimorekare kaka samu noisona.
43016005	Ata zeme meni awa na senu osena amira nana witamu sero inona, are ge awa sesena. Ata nisokare nana zo meni na ego kaka atata wamu inoya, ‘Ni nago bayamunosi?’
43016006	Ge ago ine nimorekare sesena, are duba nai meni moka nisokare bera muro itia.
43016007	Na ge me sana niniu. Na ewesemuro witamunona, awa nikare kokopai itawise sero witamunona. Na kaka witamu wamunona, awa Soremai meni oko osamunoya. Ata na witiro iyetana osero nimorekare dai nuamunoya.
43016008	Osero nena etorobara amira susu awa eramare kerenamunoya: pasinara susu, ata ewanana wero nuaira susu, ata pasinara ina tamai amira susu. Nu susu etorobara awa kerenai eraa meni gara me wamunoya.
43016009	Pasinara susu ego ine gipai gamunora: nukare na kaka tuma diamu inowera, are pasina nusokare dago itewia.
43016010	Ewanana wero nuaira susu ego ine gipai gamunora: na Mamera nana ewesemuro witana nikare na noko oko gamunowa.
43016011	Pasinara ina tamai amira susu ego ine gipai gamunora: zebu emira tua awa Anutura kotora ena duwaise sai itia.
43016012	Ge tugata wai naso dainiro dago itia, ata nikare zeme ninai ine tepo.
43016013	Ge me susure sai awa Ozana awa. Nune osero ge me dapikarago susure nimorekare gipamunoya. Ota ge awa kotumai nusora oko puro samunoya. Ge naneto Mamere samunonato awa niniro te nikare tugata wamunoya. Tani eure-taure ama kei awamunora awa dai bere-bere nimorekare kerenamunoya.
43016014	Na ge sana Ozana meni niniro puro nimorekare kerenamunoya. Ago wai bowi naso kei awamunoya awa.
43016015	Mamera nena dapikarago awa nena naso, ami emo na nimorekare ego sesena awa, ‘Ozana meni nena naso puro nimorekare kerenamunoya.’
43016016	Be apunu-kaka itia awa tepo wai amire nikare na oko gamunowa. Noko be apunu-kaka tepo wai amire nikare na gamunowa.”
43016017	Yesu meni ago senu bua mai nuso nutopekare ge ina-sa wero ego sewa awa, “Nu ego toya, ‘Be apunu-kaka itia awa tepo wai amire nikare na oko gamunowa. Noko be apunu-kaka tepo wai amire nikare na gamunowa.’ Nu nogoro ago toi? Ota nu ge zo dai ego sesia awa, ‘Na Mamera nana witamunona.’ Ago sesia awa.”
43016018	Bua mai meni ago sero noko ego sewa awa, “Nu ego sesia, ‘Be apunu-kaka itia.’ Ago awa nogoro toi, nakai sirinonakai.”
43016019	Ago sero nu atata wamu sero wewa Yesu nu nutope giro ego senua awa, “Ge ego nimorekare sesena amira ina-sa inowita? ‘Be apunu-kaka itia awa tepo wai amire nikare na oko gamunowa. Noko be apunu-kaka tepo wai amire nikare na gamunowa.’ Ge amira susu sana gamu towita?
43016020	Na me memeka nimorekare tona. Nikare dire-buare inuawa ema na tuma kaka diamu ami yawa sara wamunora. Nikare duba naire nuawa duba nai nisokare meni kapetenai yawa sara wai nisokare nana kei awamunoya.
43016021	Bama meni mai pamu inoma yaya tapinoise duba nitinowera. Ago inoma mai puro oreniro ‘mai pumena’ asero yawa sara inowera. Yaya tapinowera awa oko kotupitinowera.
43016022	Da ago ine nikare zeme duba nitinowa. Ata na nikare noko gamunona be amire nikare yawa sara bamubake wamunowa. Yawa sara nisokare awa ema zo meni kapai tepo wai ine tepo.
43016023	Are be amire nikare nena zo kau wero giro na oko atata wamunowa. Na me memeka sane. Nikare nena zo emo Mama begomo sawa nena awa potamunoya. Awa nera kota, nu na emo inoise potamunoya.
43016024	Noisonakai amira ana tupise nikare zazo naso puro noise nena zo emo begomo kaka samu. Are yawa sara wai meni nisokare nana kei awero be muro itaise begomo seu. Begomo sawa potai pamunowa awa.
43016025	Ge nimorekare tugata wero tupewena awa ge bezai tugata inowena. Noma be zo mamunoya amire na ge bezai meni awa oko samunona. Be amire na Mamera susu poti damu namu ge bezero kota, me kereniro nimorekare samunona.
43016026	Be amire nikare zazo naso puro noise Mama begomo samunowa. Na ego oko tona, ‘Nane nikare soremuro Mama begomo samunona.’ Awa oko tona. Awa nera kota, Mama meni nikare ara tapinowia.
43016027	Na Mamera nana ena osena ge awa nikare niniwa me wenu na ara tapinowewa. Are Mama meni da ago ine nikare ara tapinowia.
43016028	Na Mama doro zebura osena, are na zebu doro noko Mamera nana wititinona.”
43016029	Ago senu bua mai nuso meni ego sewa awa, “Ni zeme ge bezai doro damu-damuke kereniro tosa awa.
43016030	Are nimore ego gosinonakare: ni nitope nena dapikarago giro tepo inowesa. Nakare ni atata wamu kotupitinuawenakare ni nitope gosinowesa, ami emo ni Anutura nana ena osesa awa genakare me inoya.”
43016031	Ago sewa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nikare zeme gewa me inoita?
43016032	Be zo itia awa eya mai amire na doro bozero nata nisokare sero baro tepo wamunowa. Ago wero na duawa na imata nuamunona. Ata na imata oko nuamunona. Mama meni namore dai nowia, are imata oko nuamunona.
43016033	Nikare azu doro oreniro nuawise sero ge ei awa nimorekare sesena. Nikare zebura yayare duba naire nuamunowa. Ata nane zebura nena dire-bere awa puro osero patitinona, are nikare putoure noiwo.” Ago senua awa.
43017001	Yesu nu ge awa sero tepo wero iri utura niro begomo toise ego senua awa, “Mama, be zora awinoya. Na Mai niso. Na zazo niso de ike nana bamu waise sero gita nine zazo naso de ike nasa bamu waise tona.
43017002	Ni ema eni namore potisa. Potiro na nuai me ewanana awa numorekare potanise sero na zebu serora ema bama amira mama bamubake potisa.
43017003	Nuai me ewanana amira susu ego itia: Ni Anutu me daimata. Ema iyetisa awa Yesu Kristo awa. Ema bama meni namorege gara me wai nukare nuai me ewanana pumamunora.
43017004	Bua ge namore sesa awa wero tupie pesunitinona. Ago inoise zazo niso de ike nitana.
43017005	O Mama, zebu kaka kei awamure na nimore dai utu zasimai nasore noisona, da awa noko potiyo na puro nuane.
43017006	Erama dapikarago amira nana ena ema eni sianiro namore potisa naso wewa. Are na susu niso numorekare kerenisena. Dubu niso asai noiwa awa namore potisa nukare ge niso niniro puro poti dube niro nowera.
43017007	Nukare zeme nena naso dapikarago niso nana ena gege tupewia awa gosinowera.
43017008	Ni ge namore potisa awa sena niniro pumuwa awa. Ago inoise niso nana ena osena awa giro me asewa awa, are nine bua ge namore sesa awa da ago niniwa me wenua awa.
43017009	Na nukare emo nimore begomo tona awa. Ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera nukare ami emo oko nimore begomo tona. Dubu namore potisa ami emo isa tona. Nera kota, nukare awa dubu niso me awa.
43017010	Ema naso dapikarago awa niso awa. Ota ema niso dapikarago awa naso awa. Are nukare zazo naso de ike nitinora.
43017011	Nane niso nana muro zebura oko itamunona. Ata nukare meni awa zebura itise nuamunora. O Mama saramai, nage duba da wero nowenage, da ago ine nukare duba da wero nuarise sero ni zazo niso namore potisa amira putou meni nukare dia weyo.
43017012	Na numorekare dai noise zazo nisora putou meni nukare dia inowena. Ni zazo awa namore potisa. Na nukare dia wero baititana, are zo meni kaka tara awamu. Ota ge gayai zo itia awa me waise daimata meni tara awero sisamunoya. Nu tara awaira gegenai.
43017013	Yawa sara wai naso meni duba nusokare topetaise sero na zebura itise niso nana mamu inoise ge ewa tona.
43017014	Na ge niso potawena puro nuawera zebura ema meni nukare iwo inowera. Nuai naso awa zebura ema amira nuai ine oko aewa. Da ago ine nuai nusokare awa zebura ema amira nuai ine oko aewa. Are zebura ema meni nukare iwo inowera.
43017015	Ni bua mai naso awa zebu emira ena soero pumasise kota, Satan meni nukare waya wai azu, ni nukare soremasise begomo tona ewa.
43017016	Nuai naso awa zebura ema amira nuai ine oko aewa. Da ago ine nuai nusokare awa zebura ema amira nuai ine oko aewa.
43017017	Ge niso me meni duba nusokare ziai dopero itai nukare saramuro gegenai niso warise. Ge niso awa ge me susure awa.
43017018	Nine na zebura ena bua wanise sesa, are da ago ine nane nukare zebura ena bua warise sena awa.
43017019	Ge me meni duba nusokare ziai zewai wai nuarise na nuai naso nukare emo wana nisora potitinona ewa.
43017020	Ota na nukare emo gege oko begomo tona. Ge tugata wara niniro na tuma diamunora nukare emo dai begomo tona.
43017021	Nukare duba da wero nuarise nimore begomo tona. O Mama, ni namore itewesa na da ago nimore itewena, da ago ine nukare namorege dai itarise. Ago wara ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera ami nine na iyetisa osena awa giro me asare.
43017022	Nage duba da wero nowenage, da ago ine nukare duba da wero nuarise sero ni putou namore potisa da awa numorekare potitinona.
43017023	Na numorekare dai itana ni da ago namore dai itasa nukare duba meni puniro daimata wero nuare. Ago wero nuara ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera ami na iyetisa osena awa garise. Agoro nine na duba meni punitinoise nukare dai punitinowesa awa giro baitarise.
43017024	O Mama, ema dubu namore potisa nukare awa na nuamunona da amira nuarise tona. Ago wero zebura siwako kaka kei awamure nine na ara tapinoise utura zasimai namore potisa zasimai awa namorege dai noise garise tona.
43017025	O Mama, ni saramaira mama. Ema na tuma kaka diamu inowera ami ni oko giro baititinowera. Nane meni awa ni giro baititinowena. Ota dubu naso meni nine na iyetisa osena awa giro baititinowera.
43017026	Ara tamai niso naso nana itewia da ami nusokare nana itai na numorekare dai nuamu sero oziga ge niso numorekare kerenitana. Ago gege kerenitinoise nuamunona.” Ago senua awa.
43018001	Yesu nu begomora ge awa senu tepo wenu eriro bua mai nuso pumuro nate ena osero ou Kidoron semuro zebu zora ni bua itisonua amira bamuwa.
43018002	Yesu bua mai nusore nukare be eyaya ago aunitinoisowa, are Yudas kerenai ema ami ni bua awa nu gai awa.
43018003	Are Yesu bua mai nusore ago noiwa Yudas kerenai ema ami pris babezinomare Farisayore amira polis eni ata soldia eni awa puro gita wenu bana izimuro lam gaero gi ami puro bamuwa awa.
43018004	Yesu meni nena dapikarago numore wamu inoiwa awa giro eriro gita baro nukare tamuro atata wero ego senua awa, “Nikare aware kau inowi?”
43018005	Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nasaretera ema zo zazo nuso Yesu awa kau inonakare.” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na ewa.” Ago senua awa. Yudas kerenai ema awa soldiare dai dopero itinua awa.
43018006	Are Yesu meni, “Na ewa,” ago senu nukare azu atune baro duuwa awa.
43018007	Ago wewa noko atata wero ego senua awa, “Nikare aware kau inowi?” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Yesu Nasaretera ema.”
43018008	Ago sewa Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Na sesena awa. Na ewa. Nikare na kau inowa, are dubu naso awa dou bayare.”
43018009	Nu ge gita senua awa me waise sero bua mai nuso duarise senua. Ge gita ego senua awa, “Namore potisa nukare dia wetena zo da kaka tara awamu awa.”
43018010	Are Simon Petoro nu kasiwa egira puro noinua awa zinu kisimunu pris bamura soumai zo amira dana wana mera awa kesenua. Mai awa zazo nuso Maliko.
43018011	Ago wenu Yesu meni Petorore ego senua awa, “Kasiwa niso egira poti toyae. Yaya ei awa Mama naso meni namore potitinoya, awa azu duanise inosita?” Ago senua awa.
43018012	Ago senu soldiara dia wai meni senu soldia ata Yudara polis ami Yesu puro wana beniwa awa.
43018013	Beniro puro gita bamu Anasira nana sora niwa awa. Zepa amire ema zo zazo nuso Kayafa ami pris bamu wero noisonua. Nune Anasira mai bama diri atiro noisonua.
43018014	Kayafa nune gita Yuda emare ge ego senua awa, “Ema nakai dapikarago waya wero tepo wai azu, nu daimata ami nakai emo betaise sai itia.” Gita ago senua awa.
