43018015	Polis meni Yesu poti Anasira nana niwa Simon Petoroto otao nuso zore nuto Yesu puro bamuwa awa ama ganero bamuwato awa. Petorora otao awa pris bamu meni gosinoinsonua, are Yesu ama ganero toi goma mokara ninua awa.
43018016	Petoro meni awa goma atune dopenua awa. Ago wenu otao nuso meni awa pris bamura nana sora noisonua, are osero goma be dia wai mai bama diri zo amire senu goma be piaka ninu Petoro toi mokara ninua awa.
43018017	Petoro toinu mai bama diri goma be dia wai ami Petoro giro ego senua awa, “Ema omira bua mai zo ni awani, tanita?” Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Na tepo.”
43018018	Pris bamura soumaire soldiare nukare zazama wenu giro ni wero awinoiwa Petoro nu da ago bamu nusokare nana soe niro ni awenua awa.
43018019	Pris bamu meni Yesu bua mai pumunua o ge tugata inoisonua amire atata wenua.
43018020	Atata wenu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Na ge damu ena gege towena. Yuda ema aunitinowera — yere ibura enata ibu bamura ena — amira ena na ge sero tugata wise gipise awinowena. Na bezero ge oko towena.
43018021	Are ni nogoro na atata inosi? Ge sawena ninitinowera nukare awa atata wasa ge towena awa sara ninase.”
43018022	Ago senu dia ema dopero itiwa amira nana zo meni Yesu opewe dero ego senua awa, “Ni nogoro ge ago ine pris bamure tosi?”
43018023	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ge waya sesena sia tosa amira susu se gare. Ota na ge kokopai tona amira nogoro na doinosi?” Ago senua awa.
43018024	Anasi meni senu Yesu beniro puro bamu pris bamu zo zazo nuso Kayafa amira nana niwa awa.
43018025	Simon Petoro nu ni awinoise itinu nukare nu noko atata wero ego sewa awa, “Bua mai nusora dubu amira nana zo ni awani, tanita?” Ago sewa nu begi wero ego senua awa, “Na tepo.”
43018026	Ago senu pris bamura soumai zo, Petoro meni dana kesenua amira dikai zo, ami ego senua awa, “Ina ni ni buara ena Yesure dai dopero itesa geni, tanita?”
43018027	Ago senu Petoro meni noko begi wenu amire kokara ge senua awa.
43018028	Pina atinu nukare Yesu Kayafara nana sora ena puro osero bamu Roma ema zo nukare dia inoisonua amira nana niwa awa. Yuda ema nukare Betai Daininua amira bona namu sero inoiwa, are nukare pura sisai azu, nukare Pilatora nana sora kaka toyamu wewa. Awa nera kota, Yuda ema meni ego toise noisowa awa, “Duba nasokai bemitire wai azu, nakai ema Yudakora nana oko toyanekai.”
43018029	Ago toisowa, are nukare dura dopewa Pilato meni kei damu niro nukare atata wero ego senua awa, “Ema ei awa pasina nera puro tupewi?”
43018030	Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nu pasina kaka wamu nuamia, awa nakare niso nana oko puro mamenakare.”
43018031	Ago sewa Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Lo ge nisokare itia amira te seu tepo wae.” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nakare mai betarise sai tepo wai awa nasokare nana gazai itia. Nera kota, lo nisokare Roma emara ami gazinoya. Ota nine sasa te wamunoya.” Ago sewa awa.
43018032	Yuda ema ago wewa Yesu nu nutope gita, “Na ni pasinaira dara betamunona,” ago senua amira ge me wenua.
43018033	Pilato meni so mokara baro Yesu zawa senu bamunu ego senua awa, “Ni Yuda emara ema tua ni?”
43018034	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Ge awa duba nisora tosita eni meni oziga naso nimore sesera giro tosi?”
43018035	Ago senu Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Na Yuda ema oko aewa. Ema mamana niso ata pris babezinoma ami ni naso nana potitinora. Ni ne wetesi?”
43018036	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na zebura ena ema tua oko wero nowena. Na zebura ena ema tua inoise nuamena, awa ema dubu naso meni gi ami puro na soremara Yuda ema na oko pamera. Tua wero nuaira bua naso awa zebura oko itia.”
43018037	Ago senu Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Agoro ni ema tua zo ni?” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Awa, are tosa awa. Na ema tua zo. Na ge me susure kerenamu sero osero zebura ena kei awena awa. Ge me yaba inowera ami ge naso ninitinowera.”
43018038	Ago senu Pilato meni ina ego senua awa, “Ge me awa neni?” Ago sero kei damu niro Yuda emare ego senua awa, “Na ema emira pasina tamamu sero kau inomite zo kaka tamamu wetena.
43018039	Ota tani nisokare zo itia. Betai Daininua amira pura nisokarera ena sawewa benai ema zo awa-diawena tepo susawewia. Are pura emire ninawa na Yuda emara ema tua nisokare awa-diana nuaise towita?”
43018040	Ago senu nukare arero sewa awa, “Tepo awa. Nu kota, Barabas awa awa-diasa mae.” Ago sewa awa. Barabas nu mai dero bewana wai ema.
43019001	Pilato meni senu soldia nukare Yesu asi dirinare meni dewa.
43019002	Ago wero nu isimamu sero asi dirinare puro bubuna wero giti nusora wosuniwa awa. Ago wero tama woi izasewai zo dai wosuniwa awa.
43019003	Ago wero bamu nuso nana zorage niro sowene doinoise ego sewa awa, “Waiko koko, Yuda emara ema tua.”
43019004	Pilato meni noko kei damu niro Yuda emare ego senua wa, “Giu. Na nu puro nisokare nana tupena. Na pasina nuso tamamu sero kau inomite zo kaka tamamu wetena.”
43019005	Ago senu Yesu nu asi dirinare bubuna wai amire tama woi izasewaire dai osero dopenu Pilato meni gipero ego senua awa, “Ema ewa giu.”
43019006	Ago senu pris babezinomare soldia nusokarere ami giro arero ego sewa awa, “Ni pasinaira witaise, ni pasinaira witaise.” Ago sewa Pilato meni be nusokarera pumuro ego senua awa, “Na pasina nuso kau inona. Nu pasina tepo. Are nikakare nitopekare puro ni pasinaira deu.”
43019007	Ago senu Yuda ema meni ego sewa awa, “Nu nutope, ‘Na Anutura mai,’ asinowia, are ema ago ine awa betarise lo ge nasokare amira sai itia, are betaise.”
43019008	Ago sewa Pilato meni ge awa niniro azu bamubake wenua awa.
43019009	Ago wero Yesu noko uzumuro so mokara puro baro atata wero senua awa, ‘Ni nana kei awesi?” Ago senu Yesu meni ina kaka samu donua.
43019010	Ago wenu Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Ni ge namore kaka samu inosa, atonua. Nane sana nuamunosita ni pasinaira betamunosi, amira putou namore potai, awa ni kaka gamu inosita?”
43019011	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Anutu meni putou awa nimore kaka potamu wamia, awa ni na betaira potai ine te oko wamia. Are na niso nana wanera potia amira pasina meni pasina niso dainitinoya.” Ago senua awa.
43019012	Ago senu Pilato meni ge awa niniro kei damu niro Yesu awa-diro duamu senu Yuda ema nukare arero ego sewa awa, “Ni ema nu awa awa-diro duaira samunosa, awa ni Romara ema tua Sisa amira otao noko oko nuamunosa. Zo nu nutope ema tua asamunoya ami Romara ema tua Sisa awa dainamunoya.”
43019013	Ago sewa Pilato meni ge awa niniro giro senu Yesu puro kei damu niwa Pilato meni ge sai tepo wai masi nusora arumuro itinua awa. Masi awa omata meni nabero wai. Masi amira zazo Yuda ema meni Gabata asinoisowa awa.
43019014	Are Yuda ema pura itamu sero nena sia inoiwa waiko soe dopenu Pilato meni masi nusora itise Yuda emare ego senua awa, “Giu. Ema tua nisokare ewa.”
43019015	Ago senu nukare arero ego sewa awa, “Nu tepo waise. Nu tepo waise. Ni pasinaira witaise.” Ago sewa Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Ema tua nisokare sana ni pasinaira betaise towita?” Ago senu pris babezinoma meni ina ego sewa awa, “Nakare ema tua nasokare zo tepo. Roma emara ema tua Sisa ami gege inoya.”
43019016	Ago sewa giro Pilato meni ge nusokare niniro Yesu ni pasinaira betaise sero poti wana nusokarera ninua awa.
43019017	Are soldia meni Yesu puro ni pasinai potiwa dimunu zebu zo zazo nuso Giti Kopira Wetu, ota Yuda gera Goligata, amira puro bamuwa awa.
43019018	Puro baro ni pasinaira dewa awa. Dero pasina mai eto ni pasinai etora dero zo enibara zo enibara Yesu soe ago urewa dopewa awa.
43019019	Pilato meni senu Yesura ni pasinaira owe ego ine potiwa awa, “Yesu Nasarete natara. Nu Yuda emara ema tua.”
43019020	Yesu dewa zebu awa nata itinua amira zorage. Are Yuda ema dainiro meni izima-sauma awinoise owe awa azimuwa. Owe awa Yuda gera ata Roma gera ata Grik gera gaewa awa.
43019021	Are Yuda emara pris babezinoma meni Pilatore ego sewa awa, “Ni ego gaetesa awa te oko inoya, ‘Yuda emara ema tua.’ Awa doro ego ine gaeyo, ‘Nu nutope na Yuda emara ema tua asinowia.’ Ago gaeyo.”
43019022	Ago sewa Pilato meni ego senua awa, “Gaetena ami itaise.” Ago senua awa.
43019023	Soldia nukare Yesu dero tama woi nuso tame awa zoeto-zoeto, are kanowero pumuwa awa. Ata tama woi tura awa be dara tairo gayai tepo. Ike ena gaero osero bayai awa.
43019024	Are nukare ego sewa awa, “Awa kapanakai waya wamunoya. Are ozina laki wanakai ema zora nana kei awai giro ami paise.” Ago sero wewa awa. Ago wewa amire ge gayai zo ego itia ami me wenua, Nukare tama woi naso tame awa kanowewa. Tama woi naso emo ozina laki wewa. Ge gayai ago itinua, are soldia meni ago wewa awa.
43019025	Yesura ni pasinai susura ena erama ego ami dopewa: mia nuso, miera zawa, Maria Kliopara ara, Maria nata nuso Madala.
43019026	Are Yesu nu mia nuso ata bua mai nuso kokopai nuto dopero itiwato giro mia nusore ego senua awa, “Mia, mai niso awa.”
43019027	Ago sero bua mai nusore ego senua awa, “Mia niso awa.” Ago senu giro be amira ana nu Yesura mia uzumunu nuso nana witinu dia inoisonua awa.
43019028	Are Yesu nu bua nuso tepo wenu giro ge gayai zo itinua awa me waise sero ego senua awa, “Na ou uza inoya.”
43019029	Ago senu nukare ewara somisomi zo puro ou wain dokaka akou zora itinua amira patiro utura gaero be nusora potiwa ninua awa.
43019030	Ou wain niro ego senua awa, “Bua wero pesunena.” Ago sero tuma gosumunu ozana nuso tepo wenua awa.
43019031	Yuda ema nukare pura nusokarera nena sia inoise giro ego sewa awa, “Auma Betai Daininua amira pura bamubake, are ema ni pasinaira dai awa oko itare.” Ago sero Pilatore ego sewa awa, “Nukare eya betarise sero ni ge sasa soldia meni baro te nusokare dara toumara eya betara woi nusokare ni pasinaira ena parise.” Ago sewa Pilato meni ge nusokare nininua awa.
43019032	Are soldia nukare pasina ema eto Yesure dai dewa amira zora te wetu dewa toumunu zora da ago dewa toumunu awewa awa.
43019033	Ago wero Yesura nana baro nu betero itinu giro wetu kaka dai toumamu dowa awa.
43019034	Ota soldia zo baro karao meni Yesu zezegira ena gaenu urukumunu orarare oure osenua awa.
43019035	Nane nena awa giti moka naso meni gina. Are na sero kerenitinona me inoya awa. Na gosinona, ge awa me awa. Nikare dai gawa me waise sero ge me kerenitinona awa.
43019036	Ge gayai zo ego itia awa me waise sero nena awa kei awenua, Nukare wetu nuso zo da di oko dara toumamunoya.
43019037	Ota ge gayai zo ego itia, Nukare nu gaewa urukumunua amira nana giti moka potiro gamunora. Ge gayai eto ago iterato awa.
43019038	Yosefe Arimatia natara nu Yesura mai zo wero noisonua, ata nu Yuda ema azu wero tuma diai nuso kaka kerenamu bezero puro noisonua. Nune ami Pilato nana baro Yesura woi ni pasinaira ena dusunamu sero atata wenua. Ago wenu Pilato meni nininu baro dusuninua awa.
43019039	Nikodemo nu gita pire Yesura nana kei awenua ami ni mu zamare mou nuso 34 kilogram ago puro bamuro Yosefe soremunua awa.
43019040	Ago wero Yesura woi ni mu zamare meni gutero mo kapawai meni ewewato awa. Yuda ema nukare erama betasara ago inoisowa awa.
43019041	Yesu dewa zebu amira agewara ni bua zo itinua, amira omata so zo bi ditira asero seka wamai itinua. Gita ema zora woi ago kaka potamu.
43019042	Are Yuda emara pura amira nena sia waira be itinua, noko bi diti awa zorage itinu giro nuto Yesura woi ago potiwato awa.
43020001	Sande pina kaka atiro baitamu Maria nata nuso Madala ami bi ditira bamunua awa. Baro ego ginua awa. Omata bi ditira so be gazai awa dainiro enibara baro itinua.
43020002	Ago giro sumuro bamuro Simon Petoroto Yesura bua mai kokopaire amira nana kei awero ego senua awa, “Nukare Tuara woi puro baera. Awa nago poteri?”
43020003	Ago senu giro Petoroto otao nuso zore bamu bi ditira niwato awa.
43020004	Ebete sumuro susawiseto otao ami Petoro dainiro gita baro bi ditira kei awenua awa.
43020005	Kei awero omata sora dupuniro mo woi nuso ewewato awa itinu ginua. Ata nu kaka toyamu.
43020006	Ago inoinu Simon Petoro ama kei awero omata sora toiro mo ginua.
43020007	Mo zo gitine ewewato awa dai itinu ginua awa. Mo awa mo enire dai oko itinua. Nu imata enibara bozero baitai itinua.
43020008	Are Petoro meni awa gosinoinu otao nuso gita baro omata sora bera dopenua ami ama toiro ginu me wenua awa.
43020009	Nuto Yesu betero seka wero eramunoya amira ge gayai itinua awa oko giro baitiwato.
43020010	Ago weroto nuto noko ewesemuro bamu nate niwato awa.
43020011	Maria nu bi ditira so be zorage amira dopero di senua awa. Di toise baro omata sora bera dupuniro anegi wenua.
43020012	Anegi wero angelo eto tama woi kapawaire Yesura zarara itiwato ginua. Zo nu Yesura giti itinua amira zarara, zo Yesura te itinua amira zarara, ago wero itiwato ginua awa.
43020013	Ginu nuto ego sewato awa, “Ni nogoro di tosi?” Ago sewato nu ego senua awa, “Tua nasora woi puro nago baerata kau inona.”
43020014	Ago sero kapeteniro Yesu dopero itinu ginua awa. Giro Yesura giti moka kaka giro baitamu wenua awa.
43020015	Ago wenu Yesu meni atata wero ego senua awa, “Ni nogoro di tosi? Ni are kau inosi?” Ago senu Maria nu ni buara mama meni dopero itinuta asero ego senua awa, “Nine Yesura woi puro baro agewa zora potesita? Se giro baro pumane.”
43020016	Ago senu Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Maria.” Ago senu nu zuzumeniro Yuda gera “Rabonai” asenua. (Ge nasokaira, “Gipai Ema.”)
43020017	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Na oko ziase. Na Mamera nana kaka witamu awa. Ni baro bua mai nasore ego se: Mama naso awa Mama nisokare. Anutu naso awa Anutu nisokare. Are amira nana witamunona. Ago se gare.”
43020018	Ago senu Maria nata nuso Madala ami ewesemuro baro Yesura bua mai amire ego senua awa, “Na Tua gena. Nu namore ge awa sesia.” Ago senua awa.
43020019	Sande pi zinu bua mai meni Yuda ema azu wero auniro so be dewa gamunu itiwa Yesu meni nusokare nana soe ena kei awero dopero ego senua awa, “Azu doro kokopai itiwo.”
43020020	Ago sero boino zara wana etora amire zezegira amire gipenua. Ago wenu bua mai meni Tua nusokare giro yawa sara wewa awa.
43020021	Ago wewa nu noko numorekare ego senua awa, “Azu doro kokopai itiwo. Mama meni na iyetinua, da ago ine nane nikare iyetitinona.”
43020022	Ago sero ozana nuso pise nusokare nana niro ego senua awa, “Ozana pumuu.
43020023	Nikare emara pasina disawa tepo wamunoya. Ota nikare kaka disamu wawa itamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
43020024	Otao nusokare Tomas, zazo nuso zo Didimo, nu awa agewa zora noinu Yesu meni mai enira nana kei awenua.
43020025	Are otao mai eni meni oziga ge numore ego sewa awa, “Nakare Tua genakare.” Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Na natope giti moka naso me meni wanera boino zara giro, o wana sisino naso meni boino zara gaero giro, o zezegi nuso gaitara amira sora wana naso meni sineniro giro awamunona, awa ge nisokare me asamunona.” Ago senua awa.
43020026	Waiko be 8 tepo wenu amire bua mai nuso eni ata Tomas dai so mokara toiro so be dapikarago dewa gamunu itiwa Yesu meni nusokare nana soe ena noko kei awero dopero ego senua awa, “Azu doro kokopai itiwo.”
43020027	Ago sero Tomasre ego senua awa, “Ni wana sisino niso meni wana naso ziro gi. Wana niso sineniro zezegi naso ziro gi. Ago wero duba eto noko oko we. Na seka nona awa gasa me wae.”
43020028	Ago senu Tomas meni ego senua awa, “Ni Tua naso. Ni Anutu naso.”
43020029	Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni na gosinosa, are ni na tuma didinosa. Nukare na kaka gamu inoise na tuma diamunora nukare ami dai yawa sara wamunora.” Ago senua awa.
43020030	Tani eni dainiro Yesu meni bua mai nusora nana giti mokara ena wenua awa na buku emira kaka gaero tepo wamu.
43020031	Ota ge gainona amira susu nogoro kota, ego emira awa: Nikare ge ei awa azimuro ninitinoise Yesu nu Soyai Ema Kristo, Anutura Mai, amira ge awa gawa me waise, o nu tuma didinoise zazo nuso emo inoise nuai me ewanana tamawise sero ge awa gainona.
43021001	Yesura bua mai eni Taibirias ou ubura noiwa nu nusokare nana kei awenua. Bua mai dubu ego amira nana kei awenua:
43021002	Simon Petoro, Tomas zazo nuso zo Didimo, Nataniel Galilaya zebura Kena nata itisonua amira, amire Zebedira mai eto, amire zo eto dai. Ema ago ami poti dara niro itiwa
43021003	Simon Petoro meni enire ego senua awa, “Na wo pumamu susawena.” Ago senu nukare ego sewa awa, “Nakare nimore dai bayanekai.” Ago sero wara witiro bamuwa awa. Susawise pi amire wo kaka pumamu wewa.
43021004	Are ou ubura noiwa pina atitinoinu Yesu meni kora dopenua awa. Dopenu nukare benau nuso oko giro baitiwa.
43021005	Ago wewa Yesu meni nukare atata wero ego senua awa, “Mai awiso, wo nisokare zo itita?” Ago atata wenu nukare ego sewa awa, “Tepo.”
43021006	Ago sewa nu ego senua awa, “Wa wana mera ana mona potiwo osai wo ikai zumawe.” Ago senu mona potiwa osenu wo dainiro-bake ikewa awa. Ago wewa zumu wara namu kaputiwa awa.
43021007	Are Yesura bua mai kokopai meni Petorore ego senua awa, “Awa Tua awa.” Ago senu Simon Petoro nu mo gege awero noinua, are nu “Tua noya owa,” awa niniro tama woi nuso tame awa wosuniro ewara dagimunua awa.
43021008	Nukare kora duku bera asike noiwa, are mai eni meni wa dawinoise mona wore zumuro bamuwa awa.
43021009	Ago wero ete witiro nena ego ine giwa awa. Niao mokara wore mare sasinoise itinua.
43021010	Itinu nukare witiro bamuwa Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Wo pumewa amira eni puro muu.”
43021011	Ago senu Simon Petoro meni wara witiro mona zumu ete ninua awa. Mona mokara wo babezinoma 153 ago itiwa, ata mona oko kapenua.
43021012	Are Yesu meni numorekare ego senua awa, “Muu, nena nawe.” Ago senu bua mai nuso meni “Ni aweni?” ago atata wamu sero giwa mou wenu giro dowa. Nera kota, nu Tua awa, awa emoko giwa kei awenua awa.
43021013	Are Yesu meni wo ma bona wero numorekare potinua awa.
43021014	Are Yesu nu betaira ena seka wero eriro bua mai nusora nana kei awenu be etorobara wenua awa.
43021015	Nena niwa amire Yesu meni Simon Petoro atata wero ego senua awa, “Simon Yohanera mai, otao mamai niso nukare na ara tapinowera, awa nine nukare dainitinoise na ara bamu tapinowesa, awa me ni?” Ago senu Petoro meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, nage otao wero nowenage, awa gosinosa.” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni lama dubu naso awa uninoise noiyo.”
43021016	Ago sero noko atata wero ego senua awa, “Simon Yohanera mai, ni me na ara tapinowesita?” Ago senu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Tua, nage otao wero nowenage, awa gosinosa.” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni lama dubu nasora dia wero noiyo.”
43021017	Ago sero noko atata wero ego senua awa, “Simon Yohanera mia, nage otao wero nowenage, awa me ni?” Tairo nuaira atata wenu be etorobara wenu Petoro nu pumunu nuso nana mou wenu giro duba nitinoise ego senua awa, “Tua, ni nena bamubamu giro tepo inowesa. Nage otao wero nowenage awa gosinosa awa.” Ago senu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Ni lama dubu naso uninoise noiyo.
43021018	Na me memeka sane. Ni mai seka noise nitope ipu sapi diai niso diro ebata nago nago bayamu susawewesa. Ata noma zai wero wana niso suamasa ema zo meni ipu sapi diai niso diro masi oko bayamu samunosa amira ni puro bayamunoya.”
43021019	Yesu meni ago toise Petorora betai amira ge awa kereninua. Betai nuso meni Anutura zazo de ike namu inoinua awa senua awa. Ge ago sero numore ego senua awa, “Mu, na ama ganase.”
43021020	Are Petoro meni zuzumeniro Yesura bua mai kokopai nuso nana atune susaunu ginua. Mai awa gita Betai Daininua amira bona ninoiwa amire Yesu nana zorage baro ge dane potiro atata wero ego senua awa, “Tua, ai meni ni kerenamunoi?”
43021021	Mai ago senua ami ama susaunu giro Petoro meni Yesu atata wero ego senua awa, “Tua, mai ei awa gire?”
43021022	Ago atata wenu Yesu meni ego senua awa, “Nu dago nuai na ewesemuro mamu samunona, awa nena awa nena niso oko aewa. Ni na ama gane.” Ago senua awa.
43021023	Are ge ninai eni meni ama namore ge bisi ego sewa awa, “Mai awa nu oko betamunoya.” Ago toisowa awa. Ata Yesu meni namore ego oko senua, “Nu oko betamunoya.” Ge ego gege senua awa, “Nu dago nuai na ewesemuro mamu samunona, awa nena awa nena niso oko aewa.”
43021024	Na nena awa dapikarago giro baitina ami kereniro ge ei awa gaetena. Are nikare namore ego gosinowewa, ge naso me bamubake.
43021025	Ota Yesu meni tani eni-kani inoisonua awa. Ota ema meni tani Yesu inoisonua awa da da bukura gayamera, awa buku meni zebu sero topetiro tepo wami, tanita.
44001001	O Teofilo, na gita ge gaena, awa bua dapikarago Yesu meni inoisonua, o ge tugata inoisonua amira ge uge awa gita buku zora gaena awa.
44001002	Yesu bua nuso zaawero inoe donu Anutu meni senu utura witinua amira uge gaero pesunina awa. Yesu kaka witamure Ozana meni nu soremunu nu aposolo dubu gita awininu noisowa numorekare bua ge potinua awa.
44001003	Nu yaya tapinomite betero noko seka wero eriro aposolo dubura nana waiko be 40 ago kei awero bezero awinoise Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira ge tugata-magata wero nu erinua amira susu dai kereniro baitinu giwa awa.
44001004	Nu numorekare dai noise potai ge ego potinua awa, “Nikare Yerusalem nata eya oko duawe. Mama meni Ozana potamu senua, awa dia inoise itiwo. Na amira gita sesena goisewa.
44001005	Dia itawise tona, nera kota, Yohane meni ema bama ou gutinoisonua, ata be pei-kaka gege tepo wai amire Anutu meni Ozana nimorekare potamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
44001006	Aposolo nukare Yesure dai auniro itise nu atata wero ego sewa awa, “Tua, ni be emire Isreli ema dago poti dara nasa nakare natopekare zebu nasokarera mama wero nuamunonikareta?”
44001007	Ago sewa Yesu meni ina ego senua awa, “Mama nu putou nuso meni be iboire apunure potinu itewia, awa nikare ninai ine oko itia.
44001008	Ata Ozana meni osero nisokare nana toyai amire putou pumamunowa. Putou pumuro oziga sai ema naso wero nuamunowa. Ago wero Yerusalem nate ena zaawero Yudaya zeburata Samaria zebura o zebu sero amira nikare oziga naso puro bayamunowa.” Ago senua awa.
44001009	Ge ago sero nusokare nana giti mokara witinua. Wititinoinu bereze meni nu gogo wero puro witinu kau wewa awa.
44001010	Utura wititinoinu nukare iri ike niro kau inoiwa ema eto tama woi nusoto kapawaire meni nusokare nana eya kei awero dopewato.
44001011	Ago doperoto atata wero sewato awa, “Galilaya zebura ema, nikare nogoro giti iri utura niro itewi? Yesu nikare doro utura witi gewa da ago ine wero noko osamunoya.” Ago sewato awa.
44001012	Aposolo nukare dirumu zazo Oliwa amira ena ewesemuro Yerusalem nate muro toiwa. Ebata dirumu zazo Oliwa awa doro Yerusalem bayai awa apunu-kaka gege awa.
44001013	Nukare Yerusalem nate toiro esewa so itisowa da amira baro witiwa awa. Ago witiwa amira zazo nusokare ewa: Petoro, Yohane, Yakobo, Anderea, Filip, Tomas, Batolomiu, Matiu, Yakobo nu Alifayora mai, Simon Pugeu asinoisowa, Yuda nu Yakobora zazo amira mai.
44001014	Ema awa ata Yesura mia Maria ata bama eni ata Yesura namisini, nukare ami duba da wero isa bua waiko be sero inoise itiwa awa.
44001015	Be amire waiko be eto kaka tepo wamure Yesura ema bama 120 ami auniro itiwa Petoro meni nusokare nana soe ena eriro ego senua awa,
44001016	“O otao mamai naso, Yudas nu eba gita weti iwo meni Yesu pupisera amira ge nuso Ozana meni Dawidira be pumunu peu wenu ge senua, ge awa me waise sai itinua, are me wataya.
44001017	Yudas nu nasokare nana amira zo. Nu dai buara sai awa.” Petoro meni ago senua awa. (
44001018	Yudas nu pasina wenu zuma gaewa amira moni awa puro baro ema zora zebu zuma gaero pumunua. Nu zebu amira baro duunu oti zaumunu ze wama berekuninu betenua awa.
44001019	Ago wenu oziga awa Yerusalem ema meni niniro zebu amira zazo ge nusokarera Akelidama asewa awa. Ge nasokaira Orara Berekunaira.)
44001020	Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Yere buku nasokai zazo Sam amira ena ego gayai itia awa, Nata nuso zasu kei awaise. So nusora ema zo oko nuaise. Agoro zo ego ewa, Bua nuso awa zo meni paise.
44001021	Ge gayai ago ine itia, are ema zo meni nakare soremai Yesu betaira ena seka wero erisia amira oziga nuso toise nuanekare. Ema ego ine ami nakare soremaise:
44001022	Yohane meni ema bama ge ou gutinoinu Tua Yesu meni bua nuso zaawero nasokai nana soe nuasai nakai nu ama inoise noe donakai utura witisia, ema zo susura ena Yesu ama wero musia ami kei awero nakare soremaise.”
44001023	Petoro meni ago senu ema eto tamuwa awa. Zo zazo nuso Yosefe. Eni meni nu Basaba asinoisowa, ata eni meni awa Zastas asinoisowa. Ema zo zazo nuso Matayas awa dai tamuwa.
44001024	Tamuro giro isa ego sewa awa, “O Tua, ni dubara gai, are ema eto ei awa nusoto nana are gesa te inoi, awa gipeyo giro
44001025	aposolo bua Yudas meni dotisia awa pumae. Yudas nu bua awa doro so gegenai nuso amira bamisia.”
44001026	Isa ago sero vot wewa Matayas meni daininua. Ago wewa Matayas nu aposolo 11 amira nana tainua awa.
44002001	Pura bamu zazo nuso Pentekos amira be kei awenu giro Yesura ema bama dapikarago so daimata amira auniro itiwa awa.
44002002	Itiwa awi zo bisi bamubake meni awi sago wero utura ena osenua. Osero so itiwa amira toiro be munua.
44002003	Ago wenu nukare gosinoiwa nena zo iwawa ine ami niao ine wero zazaumuro ema bama itiwa amira nana erama sero dopero zasimunua awa.
44002004	Ago wenu Ozana meni duba nusokarera toiro be munu Ozanara ge ewe-pape sewa. Awa Ozana meni duba nusokarera potinua awa te sewa awa.
44002005	Be amire Yuda ema zebu sero meni gera Yerusalem auniro itiwa awa. Nukare yere sai ema awa.
44002006	Are nukare awi bamu awa dai niniro ema bama dago muro zimuwa awa. Zimuro di tainiwa. Nera kota, aposolo meni ge zebu serora awa toiwa niniwa awa.
44002007	Niniro wana di gamuro itazaita inoise ego sewa awa, “Ema dubu ge tora ei awa Galilaya ema gege.
44002008	Nukare nogo wero zebu kei awenakai amira ge eure-taure sesera ninenakai gera mamana meni sago inori?
44002009	Nakai ei awa Patia ema, Midia ema, Ilam ema, agoro Mesopotemia zebura, Yudaya zebura, Kapadosia zebura, Ponto zebura, Asia zebura,
44002010	Frizia zebura, Pamfilia zebura, Izip zebura, nata Sairini Libia zebura itia amira nata pei-mamaira, nakai eni meni nata Roma ena muro esewa inoise itenakai,
44002011	Yuda ema kei awaire Yuda ema meni nuago waire, agoro Krit emare Arebia emare. Nakai ami nonakai ge nasokai zebu serora awa toise tani ewa-gaewa Anutu meni inowia amira oziga ge sesera ninitinonakai awa.”
44002012	Ema nukare ago sewa duba sirenu kotumai dainiro pumuro ego sewa awa, “Tani awa neni?”
44002013	Ago sewa, ata eni meni awa aposolo dubu isinoise ego sewa awa, “Nukare ou wain pena-pana nera, are duba dau inoi ge ago ine tora awa.” Ago sewa awa.
44002014	Ago sewa Petoro nu otao 11 amire dai dopero arero ego senua awa, “O Yuda ema otao mamai ata mai Yerusalem nate nowa, nikare dapikarago dana zaawewo ge sana ninawe.
44002015	Nikare ema dubu emire ego towa awa, ‘Ou wain ninomite duba dau inora.’ Ago tepo awa. Pina zeme atitinoya. Are ou wain nogoro namunonikare?
44002016	Nikare ge towa ago ine oko aewa. Tani gosinowa amira susu awa ego ewa. Porofete Yoeli meni ge ego gaenua awa me inoya.
44002017	Anutu meni toya awa, Noma zebura be pesunitinuai na Ozana naso potana wa boruza ine wero osero ema dapikarago amira nana mokara toyamunoya. Mai mamatanare babumanare nisokare meni porofete meni sago wamunora. Mai mamatana nisokare meni seka itise atua ine wero nena me gamunora. Ema zezewenai nisokare meni atua me wamunora.
44002018	Be amire na Ozana naso ema bama naso amira nana potana nukare porofete meni sago wamunora.
44002019	Sana bereze ike ena wagu eni kei awamunora. Ota zebura ena dai wagu eni kei awamunora. Wagu awa orarare niaore ibosi bamure ami kei awamunoya.
44002020	Waiko diti sikimamunoya. Inua izero orara ine wamunoya. Wagu awa kei awara Tuara be bamu zasimaire kei awamunoya.
44002021	Be amire zo nu Tua zawa samunoya, nu awa Tua meni soero pumamunoya. Yoeli meni ago gaenua awa.
44002022	O Isreli ema otao mamai naso, ge sana niniu. Anutu meni Yesu Nasarete ema buara potinua, awa gawise sero Anutu meni putou numore potinu nisokare nana soe noise bua zezewenaire tani sekare tani putoure wasai gosinoisewa awa. Susu awa gosinowa awa.
44002023	Nukare Yesu puro wana nisokarera potamunora, awa Anutu meni emoko ago ine warise senu zewai wenua. Noko emoko ginu te wenua. Are ebata senua te nikare Yesu betaise sero ema Yudara lo ge ninai tepo amira wanera potewa ni pasinaira detera betisia awa.
44002024	Nu awa betaira yaya tami Anutu meni yayara mui besero betaira mokara ena awa-uzesi seka wero erisia. Nera kota, betai meni nu soyai ine tepo.
44002025	Dawidi meni Soyai Ema nasokai eramunoya amira ego senua awa, Tua nu benau nasora itawi gosinowena. Na azu wai azu, nu wana me nasora dopero itewia.
44002026	Are moka naso meni yawa wawi iwawa naso meni yawa sara inowia. Awa daba kota, na betaira gegenai ami Anutu tuma didinoise kokopai zanatiamunona.
44002027	Ago wamunona. Nera kota, ititi naso meni betai natara itai azu, Anutu ni na oko duamunosa. Ni soumai me niso oko duasa woi naso gumu wero yarasa awamunoya. Tepo awa.
44002028	Ni nuai mera ebata awa namore gipesa. Ni namore dai itasa na yawa sara bamubake wamunona.
44002029	Dawidi meni ago senua awa. O otao mamai naso, na ewowo nasokai Dawidira ge awa sero baitana niniu. Nu betenu gowewa diti nuso nasokai nana itewia.
44002030	Nu ami porofete noisonua, are nu ego ginua awa. Anutu meni Dawidira saisibuna dubu amira ena zo ema tua potai tua waira bua nuso awa pumaise ge senu zewai wenua awa.
44002031	Anutu meni bua wamu senua, awa Dawidi meni ginua. Are nu Soyai Ema nasokai erai nusora ge ego ine senua awa, “Anutu nu oko duai betai natara itamunoya. Tama aiso nuso meni oko gumu wero yarasa awamunoya. Tepo awa.”
44002032	Yesu nu awa Anutu meni awa-uzesi seka wero erisia, awa me giti moka nasokare meni giro tonakare awa.
44002033	Anutu Mama nusora zumai meni zumi witiro Anutura wana mera arumi Mama meni Ozana potamu senua, awa numore poti puro tani ninitinoise gosinowa awa weti kei awetia.
44002034	Yesu utura witisa, ago ine awa Dawidi nu nutope utura kaka witamu. Ata nu ego senua awa, Anutu meni Tua nasore ego senua awa, “Ni muro wana me nasora arumuro itasa
44002035	na iwo dubu niso awa benau nisora potana isimamunosa.”
44002036	Dawidi meni ago senua awa. Are nikare Isreli ema dapikarago ami ego giwo zewai wae. Nikare Yesu ni pasinaira doisewa, nu awa Anutu meni potinu nu Tua ata Soyai Ema nasokai wero nowia awa.” Petoro meni ago senua awa.
44002037	Petoro meni ge ago senu niniro duba niwa awa. Duba nitinoise nu ata aposolo eni awa atata wero ego sewa awa, “Otao mamai, nakare nogo wamunonikare?”
44002038	Ago sewa giro Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Anutu meni pasina nisokare disaise nikare duba kapeteniro Yesu Kristo tuma diawa nakare nikare ge ou gutanekare. Ago wanakare Anutu meni Ozana nimorekare potamunoya awa.
44002039	Nikare ata mai awiso nisokare ata eni asike nowera, awa Tua Anutu nasokai meni asa-waura inowia te Ozana nimorekare potamu towia awa.”
44002040	Petoro meni ge ago sero tepo wero ge eni susumuro toise potai ge dai potitinoise ego senua awa, “Ema waya-kawaya ego nowera ami pasinara ina tamamunora. Nikare numorekare dai waya wanowa awa.”
44002041	Petoro ago senu erama eni ge awa niniwa me wenua, are nukare awa ge ou gutewa. Waiko be amire ema 3,000 Yesura dubure taiwa awa.
44002042	Aposolo meni Yesura ge tugata wasara nukare ninamu yaba inoisowa awa. Ago inoise duba meni tairo baitiro bonarata begomora eyaya aunitinoisowa awa.
44002043	Aposolo nukare tani-butani putoure dainiro inoise nuasara ema bama dapikarago ami wana di gapinoisowa awa.
44002044	Kristo tuma didinoise noisowa ami duba meni ina-sipuna wero wau nena nusokare dubura gege asero noisowa awa.
44002045	Eni meni noture wau nusokarere awa ema enire potiro ina moni pumuro otao mai eni bogamasa nuasara giro kano inoisowa awa.
44002046	Nukare waiko be sero duba da wero Anutura ibu bamura ena aunitinoisowa. Ota so nusokare sero auniro bona wero ninoisowa awa. Ago inoise ma meni awa kaka soyamu duba meni yawa sara inoise ninoisowa awa.
44002047	Ago inoise Anutu bowi inoise noisowa. Ago wewa ema dapikarago nukare giwa ziri wenua. Tua nu be giti ema eni soero pumasai nukare dubura nana susumuro noisowa awa.
44003001	Waiko zore Petoroto Yohanere tuwe isa saira be munu giro Anutura ibu bamu amira toiwato awa.
44003002	Toitinoiwato ema zo miera nana tinira ena zabura wai pumunua, awa dimuro puro muwa. Ema nu otao mai meni be giti dimuro puro baro ibu bamu amira so bera zorage potasara itima awinoisonua. So be awa So Be Neine asinoisowa. Ago itise ema toiro pusumuro awasara nena emo nukare begomo toisonua.
44003003	Are Petoroto Yohanere ibu mokara toyamu inoiwato giro nu nena emo nuto begomo senua awa.
44003004	Begomo senu nuto nu ua inoiseto Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Iri ni nato gase.”
44003005	Ago senu ema zabura wai meni nena zo potamu sewitota asero nuto pena-pana ua wenua.
44003006	Ago inoinu Petoro meni ego senua awa, “Nato wau moni tepo. Ata nena daimata itia, awa potana pumamunosa. Na Yesu Kristo Nasarete natara be nusora tona: eri, aita wase.”
44003007	Ago sero wana mera puro zinu erinua. Ago wenu te mere umure eya zewai wenua awa.
44003008	Zewai wenu nu eya eriro dopero aita wenua. Ago wero numoreto dai ibu bamu amira mokara toiwa. Toiro nu zokari-zokari wero aita inoise Anutu bowi wenua awa.
44003009	Ema dapikarago meni nu aita inoise Anutu bowi inoinu giwa awa.
44003010	Giro ego sewa awa, “Ibu bamura So Be Neine amira itise wau moni emo begomo towia, nu awa.” Ago sero nu kokopai wenua awa giro sopine awero kotumai kaka pamu wewa awa.
44003011	Ema nu Petoroto Yohanere sanitinoinu ema dapikarago ibu bamura osi zo zazo Solomonra amira sumuro nuto zimuro wana di gamuro dopewa awa.
44003012	Ema ago wewa Petoro meni giro ge ego senua awa, “O Isreli otao mamai naso, nikare nogoro ema ei awa giro wana di gapinowi? Nikare nogoro nato pena-pana ua inowi? Nato putou nasotora, o etutiro nuai nasotora ema ei awa kora wetenato aita inoya, asinowita? Tepo awa.
44003013	Abraham, Isaka, ata Yakobo amira Anutu, nu ewowo-kawowo nasokaira Anutu, nune ami bua mai nuso Yesu amira zazo de ike nisia. Nu awa ninekare puro poti iwora wanera newa Pilato nu besai bayaise sesi nikare azu sisewa awa.
44003014	Ago inoise duba saramaire, o etutiro nuaira mama nu awa azu toise goroba ema nisokare awa-diaise Pilato uzutisewa.
44003015	Ago inoise nuaira gita wai ema awa detewa betisia awa. Ata Anutu meni awa-uzesi betaira ena seka wero eri giti moka nasoto meni goisenato, awa tonato ewa.
44003016	Ema ei awa gosinowewa. Nato Yesu tuma didinoise nowenato, are Yesu meni tuma diai nasoto awa awa-uzesi eriro zewai weti Yesura zazo amira putou meni ema ei awa kora weti tama nuso kokopai weti gosinowa.
44003017	Otao mamai naso, na nimorekare ego gosinona. Nikare ata gita wai dubu nisokare ami tani wisewa amira susu kaka gamu inoise wisewa awa.
44003018	Gita me gita Anutu meni Soyai Ema nuso Kristo yaya tapinoma betaise amira ge porofete dapikarago amira bera potinu sero gaewa, ge awa ago ine me wisia.
44003019	Are Anutu meni pasina nisokare disaise sero nikare duba kapeteniro Anuture dai noiwo.
44003020	Tua meni nuso nana ena putou seka pumaira be potai maise, o Kristo nikare emo sia wenua, awa iyetai osaise nikare duba kapeteniro Anuture dai noiwo. Yuda emara Soyai Ema Kristo awa nu Yesu awa.
44003021	Nu ami zeme utura tise be zo dia itaise sai itia, are itia. Be amire Anutu meni sai nena dapikarago seka-sakama kei awamunoya. Anutu meni gita me gita ona ge nuso awa porofete dubu nuso gegenai amira bera potasai ago ine toisowa awa.
44003022	Mose nu ge ego senua awa, “Tua Anutu meni dubu nisokarera nana soe ena porofete zo na ego ine nimorekare tamamunoya. Nu ge tugata wamunoya awa te niniwo.
44003023	Zo nu porofete amira ge ninai azu wai giro nu Isreli dubura nana tairo nuai azu, Tua meni dai betamunoya.” Mose meni ago senua awa.
44003024	Ota porofete eni Samuel nuasai nuso nana atune kei awero tupisowa nukare dapikarago ami be zeme emira ge sero gaewa awa.
44003025	Anutu meni nena ewa-gaewa potamu sero ge porofetera bera potasai nukare kereniro toisowa, nena awa ninekare pumawise senua awa. Noko tairo nuai Anutu meni ewowo-kawowo nisokare tamunua, amira me nikare awa. Tairo nuai awa Abrahamre ego toise tamunua awa, ‘Na saisibuna niso gawa wana gawa ami zebu sero ema te wamunoya.’
44003026	Anutu meni Mai nuso tamuro nisokare nana gita maise sero iyetinu osenua, awa nikare dapikarago gawa inoise wayara ebatara ena pumamu sero ago wenua awa.” Petoro meni ago senua awa.
44004001	Petoroto Yohanere nuto ema ge ago tugata inoiwato prisre ibura polis amira gita waire Sadukayo emare nukare dai nusoto nana kei awewa.
44004002	Kei awero nuto ema ge tugata inoise Yesu nu betaira ena seka wero erinua are bebetenai eramunora, amira oziga kereniwato giwa waya wenua awa.
44004003	Giwa waya wenu giro nuto pumuwa, ata tua zinu giro benai sora potiwa awinoiwato pina atinua awa.
44004004	Are Petoro meni ge tugata wenu niniwa amira eni dubu bamu meni ge awa niniro Yesu tuma diro Yesura dubure susumuwa 5,000 ago wenua awa.
44004005	Pina atinu Yudara gita wai emare simaire lo ge gipai emare nukare Yerusalem nate ena auniwa awa.
44004006	Pris bamu zazo nuso Anasi ata Kayafa ata Yohane ata Alesanda ata pris bamura didikai dapikarago nukare ami numorekare dai auniwa awa.
44004007	Auniro sewa aposolo eto aunai nusokarera puro bamuwa nusokare nana giti mokara dopewato atata wero sewa awa, “Ai meni nito soremi ema zabura wai awa kora watawito? Ara bera sesewato ewanana watai?”
44004008	Ago atata wewa Petoro nu Ozana meni mokara be munu ge ego senua awa, “Gita waire simaire, sana niniu.
44004009	Nato ema zabura wai emo tani kokopai watanato, amira, ‘Ai meni nito soremi ema ei awa kora watawito?’ asero koto inoise nato atata inowa.
44004010	Are kerenana nikare ata Isreli ema dapikarago ami niniu. Yesu Kristo Nasarete natara ninekare ni pasinaira detewa betisia, ata Anutu meni betaira ena awa-uzesi eriro noya, putou nusora ema ei awa tama nuso kokopai weti nisokare nana giti mokara dopero itia ewa.
44004011	Ge gayai zo itia ami Yesure ego toya, So wai ema nikare omata zo giwa waya wenu dowa awa. Ata omata ami so urura zasiwi wero itewia.
44004012	Yesu imata nakai korawai te inoya. Anutu meni Yesura zazo eramare kereninua, are korawai ema nasokai zo zebura oko itia.” Ago senua awa.
44004013	Petoroto Yohanere nuto azu wai tepo be nusoto peu wenu ge sewato, ema koto inoiwa ami niniro nuto ninai ibura kaka nuamu, nuto ema osai gege, awa giro sopine awero di tainiwa. Nuto Yesure dai noisowato awa giwa.
44004014	Are ema kora wewato ami nusoto nana zorage dopero itinu nukare nu giro ge ina sai ine tepo wero dowa awa.
44004015	Ge kau wero nuto sewa ose kakame niwato nutopekare ego ina-sa wewa awa,
44004016	“Nakai ema eto nogo wamunonikai? Nuto tani putoure bamu weterato kei aweti Yerusalem nata meni oziga niniro tepo wetera, are nakai tani nusoto begi wai ine tepo.
44004017	Are ge awa nata sero bayai ninai azu, sanakai ema amira zazora noko oko ema ge tugata wareto.”
44004018	Ago sero nuto sewa witiwato ego sewa awa, “Nito Yesura zazora noko oko ge tugata-magata waweto.”
44004019	Ago sewa, ata Petoroto Yohanere meni ge ina ego sewato awa, “Nikare nitopekare kotumuro giu. Ge nisokare dipinoise Anutura ge azu sanato Anutu meni gai te wamunoita? Gai te oko wamunoya.
44004020	Ge ninisenato, o nena goisenato awa nato bezero puro nuai ine tepo.”
44004021	Ago sewato nukare azu saira ge noko tomite nuto dowa bamuwato awa. Natara ema bama dapikarago meni tani wewato awa giro Anutu bowi inoiwa, are nukare ema bama azu inoise numoreto tama yaya zo potaira ebata kau wewa awa.
44004022	Ema kora wewato awa zabura wero iteye donu zepa 40 wenua awa.
44004023	Nukare Petoroto Yohanere dowa nuto aunaira ena baro otao mamai tamuro pris babezinomare simaire ge numoreto sewa awa uge-mage wero pesuniwato.
44004024	Are nukare ge awa niniro duba nusokare da wero Anutura nana potiro ego sewa awa, “O Tua bamubake, ni uture zebure eware nena bamubamu amire dai tamusa.
44004025	Are nine sesa Ozana meni ewowo nasokare Dawidi nu soumai niso amira be pumunu peu wenu ge ego senua awa, Ema Yudako nukare nogoro Tuare tini kapai puro noweri? Ema dubu giti nogoro Tua waya wamu sero ebata kau wero zainitinori?
44004026	Zebu serora ema tua ami Tuato Soyai Ema nuso Kristore awa iwo wamu sero zimuro dopewa awa. Ema babezinoma ami numoreto iwo wamu auniwa awa.
44004027	Ge Dawidi meni gaenua, ge awa nata emira ena me wisia. Herodeto Pilatore nuto ema Yudakore dai ata Isreli emare dai nukare Mai niso Yesu, nu bua nisora gegenai, nu awa iwo wamu sero aunisera awa. Nu awa Soyai Ema nasokare waise sesa.
44004028	Sasa te wanoi, awa kaka samu wisera. Ata putou niso itia, are kei awaise towesa te kei awinowia. Are tani kei awaise sesa, amira te wisera awa.
44004029	O Tua, azu sai ge nusokare giro giro bua mai dubu nisore putou potasa ge niso azu wai tepo zewai wero sanekare.
44004030	Putou niso gipasa garise sero ema yayare awa kora weyo. Nakare bua mai niso gegenai Yesura bera tani putoure wanekare.”
44004031	Isa ago sewa so auniro itiwa awa zipe-zipe wenu Ozana meni nukare sero topetinu nukare azu wai tepo zewai wero Anutura ge ema bama tugata wamu zaawewa awa.
44004032	Yesu tuma didinoise noisowa ami duba da wero kotumai da wero noisowa. Ago inoise wau moni nusokare awa niso naso kaka samu, dubura gege asewa itisonua awa.
44004033	Aposolo meni Tua Yesu betaira ena seka wero erinua amira oziga ge putoure sasara ema bama ninasara Tuara soremai bamubake nusokare nana itisonua awa.
44004034	Nusokare nana zo meni bogamasa oko noisonua. Ema zebure ibu marare noisowa ami nena nusokare awa ema enire potiro ina moni pumuro
44004035	moni awa aposolora wanera potitinoisowa. Ago wasara aposolo meni ema wau kau inoisowa awa te moni kanowero potasara pupinoisowa awa.
44004036	Are ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Yosefe. Aposolo nukare zazo nuso zo Banaba asewa. Ge nasokaira Uzutai Ema. Nu Lewira saisibuna amira zo. Nu Saipras gutura ena kei awenua awa.
44004037	Ema ami notu nuso ema enire potinu moni potiwa awa dapikarago puro aposolo nana wanera potinua awa.
44005001	Ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Anania. Nu ara nuso Safairato ge uge weroto zebu nusoto emare potiwato ina moni potiwa pumuwato awa.
44005002	Nuto ge sero tiroto ema meni moni agewa bezero agewa gege aposolo nana wanera potinua awa.
44005003	Potinu Petoro meni atata wero senua awa, “Anania, Satan meni duba niso topetiro Ozana etete nitinoise zebu nisora zuma agewa bezasise sesi nogoro niniro da ago wamu wetesi?
44005004	Zebu niso itaise sero giro duasa itamia. Ota noko ema enire potiro moni pupitasa, moni awa nine gege mama inosa. Ni nogoro tani awa dube potisesi? Ni eramare kota, Anuture opi sesesa awa.”
44005005	Ago senu Anania meni ge awa niniro duro betenua awa. Ago wenu eni meni oziga awa niniro azu bamu wewa.
44005006	Betenu mai seka itiwa ami eriro woi nuso mo meni dowero puro baro gowewa awa.
44005007	Ago wewa 3 aua ago tepo wenu ara nuso meni tani kei awenua awa kaka gamu inoise kei awero sora toinua awa.
44005008	Sora toinu Petoro meni atata wero senua awa, “Gire, nito zebu potewato zuma potera pupisewato, awa kaka ewe ni?” Ago atata wenu bama meni ego senua awa, “Kaka awa gege awa.”
44005009	Ago senu giro Petoro meni ina ego senua awa, “Nito nogoro Tuara Ozana gaero gamu sero ge da sesewito? Iu niso gowetera mai dubu awa zeme-zemeke so be atune dopero itera. Are nukare ni da ago puro baro gowamunora.”
44005010	Ago senu bama ami nuso nana tera ena duro betenua awa. Betenu mai seka dubu ami toiro ara betenu giro puro baro iu gowewa da amira gowewa awa.
44005011	Are Yesura dubu ata ema eni dai oziga nusoto niniro azu bamubake wewa awa.
44005012	Aposolo meni tani putoure dainiro emara nana inoisowa. Nukare dapikarago Anutura ibu bamu amira osi zazo Solomonra amira duba da wero aunitinoisowa awa.
44005013	Aunasara ema eni meni numorekare tairo nuai azu wewa. Ata ema bama meni numorekare gasara wititinoisowa.
44005014	Are emare bamere dainiro-bake ami Yesu tuma diro nuso nana susumuro noisowa awa.
44005015	Aposolo meni tani putoure inoise noiwa giro eni meni otao mamai nusokare yayare awa ebete ena sawa diro amira potitinoise ego sewa awa, “Ego itara Petoro meni ebete izima-sauma inoise nukare giro korawaise. Nu wana meni kaka kora wamu wamunoya, awa duga nuso meni enira nana semai ewanana warise.” Ago sero wewa awa.
44005016	Nata pei-mamai Yerusalem zimuro itiwa amira ema bama dainiro meni aposolora nana kokouniwa awa. Nukare otao nusokare yayare bi mokara itai amire dai puro masara kora wasara kokopai wero susawisowa awa.
44005017	Nena ago ine kei awenu giro pris bamure ema numore dai itisowa, nukare Sadukayo dubura, nukare ami aposolo dubure kotumai waya puro nukare waya wamu sewa awa.
44005018	Ago inoise aposolo dubu puro benai sora potiwa.
44005019	Ago wewa awinoiwa pire Tuara angelo zo meni so be piero nukare uzumuro puro osero ego senua awa,
44005020	“Nikare ibu bamura toiro ema dapikarago nuai sekara oziga ge kereniro baititinoise noiwo.”
44005021	Ago senu nukare niniro pina gamu ibu bamura toiro ge tugata wewa awa. Pris bamu ata ema dubu nuso ami poti dara niro giti kopi dubu ata Isreli ema babezinoma dapikarago awa zawa sewa auniwa awa. Auniro polis bamuro benai sora ena aposolo pumara marise sewa.
44005022	Ago sewa polis meni baro benai sora ena kau wero giro ewesemuro ego sewa awa,
44005023	“Nakare baro so be lok dai gamai iti genakare. Noko dia nukare so be dia dopero itera. Ata nakare so be piakaniro toiro ema kau wetenakare.”
44005024	Ago sewa ibu bamura polis amira giti kopire pris babezinomare meni giwa te kaka wamu wenu, “Tani ei awa nogo wero pesunamunoi?” asewa awa.
44005025	Ago toiwa ema zo meni kei awero ego senua awa, “Benai sora potitawa awa nukare ibu bamura mokara ena ema ge tugata inora owa, giwo.”
44005026	Ago senu polisra giti kopi ami dubu nuso pumunu bamuro aposolo dubu wewetiro uzumuro puro muwa. Ema bama meni nukare aposolo dubu emo omata meni dai azu, nukare iwo pena-pana kaka wamu, saitiro puro muwa awa.
44005027	Nukare aposolo puro baro aunaira potiwa giti kopi dubura nana benaura dopewa pris bamu meni ge ego senua awa,
44005028	“Nikare ema amira zazora ema bama ge tugata wai azu sisenakare. Ata nikare ge awa noko Yerusalem ena tugata wetewa ema bama pu sunare dago ninitara. Ago inoise ema Yesu doisera amira pasina awa namorekare potamu sero inowa.”
44005029	Ago senu Petoro ata aposolo eni meni ina ego sewa awa, “Eramara ge dipinoise Anutura ge azu sai ine oko itia.
44005030	Nikare Yesu ni pasinaira detewa betisia, nu awa apipie nasokaira Anutu meni awa-uzesi seka wero erisia awa.
44005031	Eri Anutu meni soero nuso nana wana mera potiro Gita Wai Ema, o Soyai Ema nasokai potisia. Isreli ema nakai duba nasokai kapetenanakai pasina nasokai disamu sero ago wisia awa.
44005032	Amira oziga awa nakare ata Ozana ami towenakare. Ozana awa Anutu meni ge nuso dipinowera amire potitinowia.” Ago sewa awa.
44005033	Aposolo meni ago sewa niniro tini kapai waya puro aposolo damu sewa awa.
44005034	Damu sewa, ata aunai nusokarera Farisayo zo itinua, zazo nuso Gameliel. Nu lo ge gipai ema zo. Ema bama dapikarago meni zazo nuso de ike nitinoise noisowa. Nune eriro polis meni aposolo puro ose kakame nara be pei-kaka ago itarise senu osewa,
44005035	otao mamai nusore ego senua awa, “Isreli otao mamai naso, nikare ema awa waya wamu sero giro kotumuro baitiro amire wewo.
44005036	Gita ema zo zazo nuso Tiudas ami kei awero ego senua awa, ‘Na putou bamubake naso nana itia.’ Ago senu ema 400 meni nuso nana bamuwa awa. Ata nu iwora wanera betenu dubu nuso bozewa bua nusokare tepo wenua awa.
44005037	Ama be gavman meni ema bamera zazo gainoiwa be amire Galilaya zebura ema zo zazo nuso Yuda ami kei awero noisonua. Nune ema eni uzumunu nu ama ganinoisowa. Ago wenu nu dewa betenu dubu nuso bozewa awa.
44005038	Are ema emire ge ego sana niniu. Nikare ema dubu ei awa waya oko wawe. Dou nuare. Ge tugata inowera, o bua inowera, awa kotumai nusokarera wamunora, awa duawa osero tepo wamunoya.
44005039	Ota bua inowera awa Anutura kotumaira inuamunora, awa ninekare nukare kaputamunowa. Nikare bua nusokare sisinoise Anutu iwo wanowa awa.” Ago senua awa.
44005040	Ge ago senu niniwa te wenu aposolo zawa sewa witi aunaira niwa wamu meni dewa. Dero Yesura zazo bowire amira ge noko tugata wai azu, azu sero iyetiwa bamuwa awa.
44005041	Iyetiwa Tua numorekare ginu te wenu nukare zazo nuso emo wamu pumuwa amira yawa sara inoise aunaira ena osero bamuwa awa.
44005042	Are nukare waiko be giti ibu bamura enata ibu mare ena Yesu Kristora Oziga Ewanana kaka duamu tugata-magata inoise noisowa awa.
44006001	Be amire ema bama dainiro meni Yesu tuma diro dubu nusora susumuwa dubu bamu wenua. Nukare eni meni Grik ge toisowa, eni meni Yuda ge toisowa. Nukare waiko be sero nena naira moni kapero kano inoisowa awa. Ago inoiwa Grik ge sai ema ami Yuda ge sai ema amire dumu wero ego sewa awa, “Nikare tama sogawaira moni kano inoise bama kuma nasokare dotinowewa.”
44006002	Ago sewa aposolo 12 meni Yesura dubu dapikarago zawa sewa auniwa ego sewa awa, “Nakare tamara bua soga inoise Anutura ge tugata wai amira bua awa duanakare osai te oko wamunoya.
44006003	Are otao mamai, nikare ema 7 nisokare nana soe ena pumuwo. Ema Ozana meni nusokare nana topetiro nowia, o ema kotumai ewananare, o ema ema bama eni meni gawera ewanana inowera, ema 7 ago ine awa pumuwo. Ago wawa bua awa sanakare ware.
44006004	Ata nanekare meni awa isa buare ge tugata waira buare awa wai gege wanekare.”
44006005	Ge ago sewa dubu meni niniwa te wenu, ema ego awa pumuwa: Stiwen, nu tuma diai bamubakere. Ozana meni nuso nana be muro itisonua. Agoro Filip ata Prokoro, Nikano, Timon, Pamena, Nikola nu Antiok natara ema. Nu Yuda ema me kota, nu Yuda ema meni nuago wero noisonua.
44006006	Are ema dubu awa pumuwa nukare aposolo dubura nana zorage dopewa isa sero wana gitine potiro gawa wewa awa.
44006007	Are Anutura ge sisiniro bamunu erama witai meni niniwa. Yerusalem ena ema bama dainiro meni Yesura dubu amira nana susumuwa. Ota pris dubura nana eni dainiro meni Yesura ge niniro dipinoisowa awa.
44006008	Anutura gaware putoure Stiwenra nana itisonua, are nu emara nana giti mokara tani putou bamure eni wenua awa.
44006009	Ago wenu ema eni eriro Stiwenre dai ge ina-sa wewa. Ema dubu awa yere ibu nusokare amira zazo nuso Ema Souwai Buara Mui Amu amira Ibu asinoisowa. Nusokare nana ema eni ata Sairini ema eni ata Alesandria ema eni ata Silisia ema eni ata Asia ema eni ago ami dara tairo Stiwenre ge ina-sa wewa.
44006010	Ago wewa Ozana meni kotumai ewanana Stiwenre potinu ge me gege sero bamunu ge nukare opi wenua awa.
44006011	Nu nukare ago daininu giro nukare ema eni tamuroopi sarise sewa giro nukare Stiwenre ego sewa awa, “Stiwen nu Moseto Anuture isipitinoise ge waya numoreto sesi ninisenakare.”
44006012	Ago toise ema bama ata simaita lo ge gipai ema amira duba gaewa awa. Ago wewa nukare bamuro Stiwen saniro puro giti kopira aunai amira bamuwa awa.
44006013	Puro baro ge opi samu sero sia wero otao mamai nusokarere potiwa puro noiwa. Are nukare kotora ena opi ge toise Stiwenre ego sewa awa, “Ema ami ibu bamu nasokaire lo ge nasokaire awa isinoise nowia.
44006014	Ego sesi nakare ninisenakare, ‘Yesu Nasarete natara ami ibu bamu ei awa dero ziwamunoya. Ago inoise tani Mose meni wanisekai sero gaenua awa doro tani zo wanisekai potamunoya,’ asisia.” Ago sewa awa.
44006015	Ago sewa ema dubu aunaira itiwa ami Stiwen ua inoise benau nuso giwa angelora benau ine wenua awa.
44007001	Pris bamu meni Stiwen atata wero ego senua awa, “Ge tora awa ge me ni?”
44007002	Ago senu Stiwen meni ina ego senua awa, “O otao mamai naso, babezinoma naso, ge sana niniu. Ewowo nasokai Abraham nu Heran nate kaka bayamu Mesopotemia zebura dago noinu amire Anutu zasimaire meni kei awero numore ego senua awa,
44007003	‘Ni zebu susu niso ata dubu niso awa doro nane zebu zo gipamunona amira baro nuamunosa.’
44007004	Ago senu nu ge awa niniro zebu nuso Kalidia awa doro Heran nate baro noisonua awa. Ago noinu mama nuso betenu Anutu meni zebu amira ana uzumuro puro mu zebu nowenakai amira ninua.
44007005	Puro muro zebu oko dirieninu nuso wenua. Tepo awa. Agewa zo da di numore kaka potamu wenua. Nu ata saisibuna nusore meni ama topetarise seroninua. Awa nu mai tepo noinua be amire Anutu meni ago seroninua awa.
44007006	Anutu meni ge zo numore ego senua awa, ‘Saisibuna niso meni zebu seka zora baro esewa noise sou bua gege inoise zepa 400 ago yayara tame nuamunora awa.’
44007007	Ota nu ge zo susumuro ego senua awa, ‘Sou bua warise sero pumamunora, ema awa ina potana saisibuna niso duara zebu awa doro zebu emira muro na bowi inoise nuamunora.’ Ago senua awa.
44007008	Anutu meni ago sero nukare numore dai tayarise sero tairo nuai nuso Abrahamre potiro tayai awa damu-damuke itaise Abraham ata dubu nusore meni tani tama aiso kapai awa puro nuarise senua. Are mai nuso Isaka kei awero itinu waiko be 8 wenu Abraham meni maira tama aiso kapenua. Da ago ine Isaka meni Yakobo kei awenu tama aiso nuso kapenua, noko Yakobo meni ewowo-kawowo nasokai 12 kei awasara tama aiso nusokare kapinoisonua awa.
44007009	Are ewowo-kawowo nasokai meni kiaka nusokare Yosefere kotumai waya pumuro moni emo ema enira nana wanera potiwa puro bamu Izip zebura niwa sou bua inoisonua. Ago baro noinu Anutu meni numore dai noisonua.
44007010	Noise Yosefe duba naira ena soero puro kotumai ewanana potinu Izip ema tua Fero meni ginu kokopai wenu giro ibu mara nusore natare emare awa dia nuaise ema tua potinua awa.
44007011	Potinu noinu Izip zebura o Kenan zebura be dora botiyo bamubake kei awenu so dapikarago nena tepo wenua. Ago wenu ewowo-kawowo nasokai meri betero nena nai kau inoise noisowa.
44007012	Are Yakobo meni ‘Izip zebura ma itia,’ asewa niniro giro mai awiso nuso iyetinu ago bamuwa.
44007013	Ama nukare Izip zebura noko bamuwa Yosefe meni susu nuso awa namisini nusore kereninua. Ago wenu Fero nu da ago Yosefera dubu ginua.
44007014	Are Yosefe meni mama nuso Yakobo ata dubu nuso dapikarago ema bama 75 awa zawa senua awa.
44007015	Zawa senu Yakobo dubu nusore Izip zebura baro iteye betenu ewowo-kawowo nasokai da ago bebeteniro tepo wewa awa.
44007016	Betewa wetu nusokare puro kapeteniro bamu Sikem nate niwa awa. Gita Abraham meni Sikem nate Hemora saisibuna amira zebu zo bi ditira asero moni meni zuma gaenua amira gowewa awa.
44007017	Ge Anutu meni Abrahamre senua awa me waira be zora awinoinu nukare Izip zebura ena dainiro wisika asewa.
44007018	Ago inoise noiwa Izip ema tua seka zo kei awenua. Nu ami Yosefera susu kaka gamu wenua.
44007019	Are ema tua ami ewowo-kawowo nasokai etete niro gera-gaira wenua. Ago inoise senu nukare mai uno nusokare betaira gegeniro apitinoisowa.
44007020	Be amira ana Mose kei awenua. Nu mai giti boure. Kei awenu bezero mia mamera nana sora puro itiwa inua etorobara wenua awa.
44007021	Ago inoe ape betaira niwa Ferora mai bama diri meni tamuro mai nuso asero puro dia wenu bazinua.
44007022	Ago wenu Ferora ema dubu meni Izip emara ninai dapikarago gipewa niniro baitiro bua inoise ge senu kokopai gege wenua awa.
44007023	Are Mose nu noe ema wenu zepa nuso 40 wenu Isreli ema otao mamai namisini nuso gamu sero bamunua.
44007024	Baro Izip ema zo meni Isreli zo doinoinu giro otao nuso soero Izip ema ina denu betenua.
44007025	Ago inoise ego kotumunua awa, ‘Dubu naso Ferora wanera ena soero panise Anutu meni bua inoya, awa gamunora.’ Ago kotumunua, ata nukare oko giwa.
44007026	Ago wenu pina atinu Isreli ema eto ina-da inoiwato nu baro tamuro kapinoise ego senua awa, ‘Nito dubu da ami nogoro iwo ina-wa inowito?’
44007027	Ago senu ema zuzuna zaawero otao nuso denua ami Mose ziriniro ge ina ego senua awa, ‘Ni ema tua nasokare ni? Ni dia ai meni potinu?
44007028	Awenakai agore ni Izip ema zo doitasa, ago ine na damu tosita?’
44007029	Ge ago senu Mose meni ge awa niniro giro azu baro Midian zebura ema enira nana soe esewa noisonua. Ago noise bama atiro mai mata diri eto pumunua awa.
44007030	Ago noinu zepa 40 tepo wenu bamu ware niro dirumu Sinai amira susura baro noinu ni pei-mamai itiwa amira zora niao awinoinu niao mokara ena angelo zo meni kei awenua.
44007031	Are Mose nu niao awa nogoro kei awinoi, awa gane, asero zorage bamunu Tuara ge ego kei awenua awa,
44007032	‘Na ewowo-kawowo nisokarera Anutu. Na Abrahamto Isakare ata Yakobo amira Tua wero itewena.’ Ago senu Mose te-wana zipenu azu inoise iri ago nai ine tepo wenu dopenua.
44007033	Dopenu Tua meni ego senua awa, ‘Zebu patitinosa awa saramai awa, are te nisora sandol dute.
44007034	Ema mamai naso Izip zebura ena dero kaputitinuawera dire-buare inowera awa iri bage niro gena. Are na nukare soero pamu sero osisinona awa. Are ni eri. Izip zebura iyetana noko bayamunosa.’ Ago senua awa.
44007035	Are Isreli ema nukare Mose azu sero ego sewa awa, ‘Ni ai meni ema tuata dia nasokare potinu?’ Ema azu sewa da awa Anutu meni ema tua o soyai ema nusokare waise sero angelo nuso iyetinu niao mokara ena kei awero bua ge awa senua.
44007036	Angelo ami nu soremunu zewai wero buara bamunua. Buara noise Izip zebura baro Isreli ema bama uzumuro Izip zeburata Ewa Izaira ena tani putoure inoise puro munua awa. Nu nukare puro ware noise tani putoure inoise noinu zepa 40 wenua.
44007037	Mose meni Isreli emare ge ego tugata wenua awa, ‘Anutu meni nisokare nana soe ena porofete zo na ine nimorekare tamamunoya.’
44007038	Ago senua awa. Nu da ami zebu soe ena Isreli ema bama noisowa amire dai noisonua. Nu ewowo-kawowo nasokaire dai noise Sinai dirumura ena angelora bera zewai wai ge niniro ganisekai sero gaenua awa.
44007039	Ewowo-kawowo nasokai meni Mosera ge ninai azu sero Izip zebura kapetenamu sero duba nusokare bamu Izip zebura ninua.
44007040	Ago wenu nukare Aronre ego sewa awa, ‘Ni ititi eni kewasa tua nasokai asanakai ititi ami nakai gita wai bayanekai. Mose nakai Izip zebura ena uzumuro puro musia nu sisisita nogo wisi, awa nakai kaka gamu.’ Ago sewa awa.
44007041	Ago sero ititi zo bulimakao mai ine wero zame potitinoise tua opi wana meni wewa amira bona inoise yawa sara wewa.
44007042	Nena awa wewa Anutu meni nukare doro pasina nusokarera ina tamarise senu duba nusokare sisero inuare kunare bowi inoisowa. Are porofetera buku amira ge ego gayai itia awa, Isreli dubu, nikare zepa 40 ware noise wora zameta zame eni potitinoise na emo potitinoisouta? Tepo awa.
44007043	Nikare tua opi zazo Molak amira seli boa yere ibu awa dimuro izima-sauma inoise noisowa. Nikare tua opi zo zazo Refan amira kunara ititi puro noisowa. Nikare nena awa bowi wamu sero wana meni wewa awa. Are na nikare nata Babilon amira atune potana nuamunowa awa.
44007044	Ewowo-kawowo nasokai meni ware noise seli ibu puro noisowa. Seli ibu ami ‘Anutu ego itia’ awa kerenitinoisonua. Anutu meni Mosere seli ibura ititi gipinoise da ago ine warise senu te wewa awa.
44007045	Seli ibu awa ewowo-kawowo nasokai meni susumuro susumuro puro tupie dowa Yosua meni gita wenu ana Anutu meni ema dubu eni dero tunenu bamuwa. Are ewowo-kawowo nasokai meni dubu enira zebu awa puro mamana wero seli ibu nusokare puro ago potiwa itisonua itinu Dawidi kei awenua.
44007046	Dawidi kei awero noinu Anutu meni nuai nuso ginu ewanana wenua. Are Dawidi meni Anutu Yakobo meni bowi inoisonua amira itai-matai tamamu sero Anutu begomo senua.
44007047	Ata Solomon meni Tua emo ibu wenua.
44007048	Ata Anutu bamubake ami ibu emara wana meni wai amira itai-matai oko inowia. Porofetera bera ge ego gayai itia ewa,
44007049	Tua meni ego toya awa, ‘Utu awa arumai simaire naso awa. Ota zebu meni awa te guta wai naso. So naso nogo wai wawa te wamunoi? Ota itai-matai naso awa nogo nogo wai tamawa te wamunoi?
44007050	Na wana naso meni nena dapikarago kaka tamamu weni, tanita?
44007051	Nikare ge dai ema. Dubare danare nisokare kaka keyamu diga emara ine. Ewowo-kawowo nisokare inoisowa da ago ine nikare inoise Ozanara ge dimai azu towewa.
44007052	Ewowo-kawowo nisokare meni porofete dapikarago kaka awa-diamu yaya potiwa awa. Ema Saramaira Mama kei awaise ge gita sewa ema dubu awa dai dewa betewa. Ota nikare nu awa betaise sero kereniro doisewa awa.
44007053	Anutura lo ge angelora be meni sai awa ninekare pumuro kaka dimamu wisewa.”
44007054	Stiwen meni ge ago senu Yudara gita wai ema meni niniro tini gamai bamubake pumuwa.
44007055	Ata Stiwen nu Ozana meni moka nusora be munu iri utura nitinoise Anutura zasimai gosinoise Yesu Anutura wana mera dopero itinu giro ego senua awa,
44007056	“Na utu be zaumi Emara Mai Anutura wana mera dopero iti gosinona.”
44007057	Ago senu ge guninoise dana wana meni gogowero dapikarago eriro muro nu saniwa awa.
44007058	Saniro puro baro nata atura ena omata meni dewa. Ago inoise ema Stiwenre opi sewa ami tama woi nusokare dutero mai zo zazo nuso Saulo amira nana dubu dewa.
44007059	Ago wero Stiwen omata meni doinoiwa begomo toise ego senua awa, “O Tua Yesu, ni ititi naso pumuyo.”
44007060	Ago sero bawa diro zawa gatero ego senua awa, “Tua, pasina nusokare ei awa diseyo.” Ago sero betenua. Dewa betenu Saulo meni ginu kokopai wenua awa.
44008001	Are be da amire Yerusalem nate ena Yesura dubure gera iwo bamubake zaawewa. Ago wewa nukare bozero Yudaya zebura, o Samaria zebura bamuwa. Aposolo dubu meni gege kaka bozamu Yerusalem dago noisowa.
44008002	Ema eni Tuara gera ama inoise noisowa ami Stiwen gowero di bia bamu wewa awa.
44008003	Ata Saulo meni awa Yesura dubu gera-gaira inoise so sero witiro emare bamere dero zumuro puro benai sora potinua awa.
44008004	Yesura dubu bozewa ami nata sero noise Tuara ge tugata inoise noisowa.
44008005	Nusokare nana zo Filip meni Samaria emara nata giti kopi amira kei awero Kristora Oziga Ewanana awa tugata wenua.
44008006	Tugata wenu ema dubu bamubake meni ge nuso niniro tani putoure inoinua awa giro dana zaawero ge nuso niniro baitiwa.
44008007	Nu bi dainiro tunenu zawa gatero emara mokara ena kei awero bozero bamuwa. Ota nu zabura wewenaire te amaire awa kora wenu kokopai wewa.
44008008	Ago wenu nata amira yawa sara bamubake kei awenua awa.
44008009	Ata nata da amira ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Simon. Nu goe wai ema. Are nu nutope “Na ema bamubake” asero goe bua wasai Samaria ema dubu meni gasara nu witai inoisonua.
44008010	Are ema witaita osai dapikarago ami dana zaawero ge nuso ninitinoise ego toisowa awa, “Ema ei awa Anutura putou bamubake numore potai awa.”
44008011	Nu be iboi-tatana goe nuso inoise emara duba sisinoisonua, are nukare dana zaawero ge nuso niniro awinoisowa.
44008012	Ata Filip meni Anutu imata Tua wero nuamunoya amira Oziga Ewanana tugata inoise Yesu Kristora ge uge tugata wenu niniro Yesu tuma diwa nu emare bamere ge ou gutenua awa.
44008013	Ago wenu Simon nu da ago Anutura ge nininu me wenu ge ou gutenu nu Filipre tairo noisonua awa. Ago noinu Filip meni tani putoure wasai giro di tainitinoise noisonua awa.
44008014	Samaria ema dubu nukare Anutura ge niniro duba nusokarera potiwa amira oziga meni Yerusalem nate aposolo dubura nana bamunu niniwa awa. Niniro giro Petoroto Yohanere Samaria zebura iyetiwa bamuwato awa.
44008015	Baro kei aweroto Ozana meni nusokare nana toiro be maise Tua begomo sewato.
44008016	Nera kota, gita Ozana meni nusokare nana kaka osamu. Nukare Yesura zazora gege ge ou gutewa.
44008017	Are aposolo eto wana nusoto giti nusokarera potiwato Ozana meni nusokare nana osero be munua awa.
44008018	Aposolo nuto emara nana gitine wana potiwato amira Anutu meni Ozana potinu pumuwa awa Simon meni giro moni puro bamu nusoto nana niro moni pumariseto sero ego senua awa,
44008019	“Nito Ozana potaira putou awa namore dai potawato wana naso ema zora nana gitine potana amire Ozana pumae.”
44008020	Ago senu Petoro meni numore ina ego senua awa, “Ozana potaira putou awa Anutu meni nupe potitinowia, putou awa nine moni meni zuma gaero pumamu tosa, are nima ata moni nisore dai gera wawiseto tona.
44008021	Anutu meni duba niso gi te kaka wamu inoya. Are ni nakare tairo bua ewa wai sogo ine tepo.
44008022	Ni kotumai waya niso awa doro duba kapeteniro tani waya wamu kotupitinosa amira pasina Tua meni disaise isa seyo.
44008023	Ni duba-duba bamu wawesa pasinara mui meni ni beniro baitinu nowesa, awa gosinona.”
44008024	Ago senu Simon meni ina ego senua awa, “Nito na emo Tua begomo sawato nena towato awa naso nana oko kei awaise.” Ago senua awa.
44008025	Aposolo eto meni Yesura susu giwato amira ge kerenitinoise ema bama Tuara ge tugata wero amire Yerusalem nate ewesemuro bamuwato awa. Ewesemuro susawise Samaria zebura nata witai itiwa amira ana Oziga Ewanana tugata wero bamuwato awa.
44008026	Tuara angelo zo meni Filipre ego senua awa, “Ni sia wero ebata ike kena Yerusalem nate ena ose Gasa nate nitinowera ebata amira bamuyo.” (Ebata awa zebu erama tepo amira itia.)
44008027	Ago senu giro Filip meni eriro bamunua awa. Itiopia zebura bama tua bamu zo noisonua zazo nuso Kandasi amira soremai nuso zo nu bama tua bamu amira wau moni dia noisonua, nu ami Anutu bowi wamu sero bamu Yerusalem nate niro
44008028	Anutu bowi wero noko tera nate bayamu sero karisira ewesemuro susawise ge porofete Yesaya meni gaenua awa azipitinoise susaunua.
44008029	Susaunu Ozana meni Filipre ego senua awa, “Ni karisi omira zorage bamu, tairo bayase.”
44008030	Ago senu Filip meni sumuro baro tamuro ema nu porofete Yesayara ge gayai awa azipitinoinu giro atata wero senua awa, “Ge azipitinosa amira susu gosinosita?”
44008031	Ago senu ema ami ina ego senua awa, “Ema zo meni na kaka tugata wamu wai na natope nogo nogo wero gera susu ninamunoni?” Ago sero Filip wara witaise senu wara witiro arumunu eroma bamuwato awa.
44008032	Ge gayai azimunua awa ego ewa, Lama zo dero azamu sero puro susawewera ago ine nu awa. Ota lamara tu kapamu sero wawera ge amu inowera ago ine nu ge kaka samu wenua.
44008033	Nukare nu isimuwa. Nukare koto inoise ge me numore oko sewa. Zebura nuai nuso kapewa tepo wenua, are ai meni dubu nusora ge uge wai te inoi?
44008034	Are ema giti kopi meni Filip atata wero senua awa, “Nine se ninane. Porofete nu are ago senu? Numoreta ema zore senu?”
44008035	Ago senu Filip meni porofetera ge awa puro Yesura nana potiro Yesura Oziga Ewanana tugata wenua.
44008036	Ago sero susaumiteto ou butu zora kei aweroto ema iti kopi ami ego senua awa, “Gi. Ou itia ewa. Na ge ou gutasa te wamunoita?” [
44008037	Ago senu Filip meni ina ego senua awa, “Ge tugata wetena awa ziro tata-tata wasa giro na ni ge ou gutana te wamunoya.” Ago senu ina ego senua awa, “Yesu Kristo nu Anutura Mai me awa ziro tata-tata inona.”]
44008038	Ago sero wo dopariseto senu dopewato nuto Filipre ose oura niwato awa. Osero Filip meni ema awa ge ou gutenua.
44008039	Ago wero oura ena wititinoiwato Tuara Ozana meni Filip tutamu puro ewe bamunu ema giti kopi meni Filip kaka gamu wero nu yawa sara inoise ebata nusora bamunua awa.
44008040	Ota Filip nu Azoto nate kei awenua awa. Kei awero ana zaawero nata sero ge tugata wero susaumite Sisaria nate kei awenua awa.
44009001	Saulo nu Tuara dubu gera-gaira inoise dai betarise sero moka nusora goroba kei awenu giro bua waira peu wenua. Ago wero bamu pris bamura nana niro
44009002	pas potaise senu giro pas gaero potinua awa. Pas awa Yuda dubu Damaskas nate noisowa amira yere ibura potiro Saulora nuai nusore buare kereninua awa. Kereniro Tuara Ebata Sekara nuara tamuro beniro puro mu Yerusalem nate naise sero gaenua awa.
44009003	Are nu pas awa puro susaumite Damaskas nate zorage awinoinu zasimai zo meni utura ena tutamu osero nuso nana gaenua awa.
44009004	Gaenu Saulo zebura duro itise ge ego nininua awa, “Saulo, Saulo, ni nogoro na dero tuninoise nowesi?”
44009005	Ago senu Saulo meni atata wero senua awa, “Tua, ni aweni?” Ago senu Tua meni ina ego senua awa, “Dero tuninoise nowesa Yesu na awa.
44009006	Ata ni eri. Nate bayasa nena wasise sai itia, awa tugata wamunora awa.” Ago senua awa.
44009007	Ema numore dai tupiwa ami ge tepo wenu dopewa. Nukare ge gege niniwa awa. Ata emara giti moka meni awa kaka gamu wewa.
44009008	Are Saulo nu zebura ena eriro giti panero so ginu mume gege wenua. Ago wenu ema dubu nuso meni wana ziro puro bamu Damaskas nate niwa
44009009	waiko be etorobara giti guma wenu nenare oure kaka namu itinua awa.
44009010	Damaskas nate Yesura dubu amira zo noisonua zazo nuso Anania. Nu atua ine inoinu Tua meni nu zawa senua awa, “Anania.” Zawa senu Anania meni ego senua awa, “Tua, na ewa.”
44009011	Ago senu Tua meni numore ego senua awa, “Ni eri. Ebata zazo Sonai asinowera amira baro ema zo zazo Yuda amira nana sora witiro ema zo zazo nuso Saulo, nu Taso natara, nu awa tamamunosa. Nu isa toise itia.
44009012	Nu atua ine inoise nena ego ine gia: Ema zo zazo nuso Anania ami nuso nana kei awero giti panaise wana nuso gitine potia.”
44009013	Tua meni ge ago toise tugata wenu Anania meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, ema amira uge waya diawera gosinowena. Nu Yerusalem ena dubu nisora nana eni dainiro gera-gaira inowia. Agoro nakare nata emira da ago zazo niso bowi inowenakare awa dai beniro puro bayaise pris babezinoma meni ge gaitara awa.”
44009014	Anania meni ago senua, ata Tua meni ego senua awa, “Ni ago bayasise tona. Ema awa bua mai naso pupinona. Are nune zazo bowire naso puro ema Yudakora nanata ema tuara nanata Isreli dubura nana puro sero sero susawiaise.
44009015	Nu zazo bowire naso tugata wamu yayare duba naire nuamunoya, awa nane gipana gamunoya.” Ago senua awa.
44009016	Ago senu Anania meni baro so senua amira witiro wana nuso Saulora gitine potiro ego senua awa, “Saulo, otao naso, Tua ebete ena niso nana kei awisia, nu awa Yesu awa. Nu ami na iyeti niso nana tupena ewa. Ni giti panasa Ozana meni niso nana be mai nuase.”
44009017	Ago senu Saulora giti mokara ena wo tata ine osenu giti panenua awa. Ago wero eriro senu ge ou gutewa awa.
44009018	Ago wenu nena niro putou pumunua awa.
44009019	Saulo meni Yesura dubu Damaskas noisowa amire dai waiko be eni ago noisonua awa.
44009020	Ago noise awita sero Yuda emara yere ibu ago itisowa amira baro toiro Yesura oziga kereniro tugata inoise ego toisonua awa, “Yesu nu Anutura Mai.”
44009021	Ago tugata wenu niniwa te kaka wamu wenu nukare nutopekare ego ina-sa wewa awa, “Ema ami Yerusalem nate ena Yesura zazo amira isa towera dubu awa giro gera-gaira inowia. Ota ena da ago nu Yesura dubu awa beniro puro pris babezinoma nana bayamu musia, nu ami mia awa.” Ago ina-sa wewa awa.
44009022	Ata Saulo meni zewai-zawai wero Yesu nu Soyai Ema Kristo me amira ge susure sero baitiro Yuda ema Damaskas nate noisowa awa tugata wenu niniro ne seri wero dowa.
44009023	Ago inoe donu Yuda ema auniro Saulo damu sero ge diwa dagimunua awa.
44009024	Ge diwa dagimunua, ata Saulo meni ge awa nininua awa. Nukare Saulo damu sero natara toyai be sero pire waikore uma inoise noisowa awa.
44009025	Ago inoiwa giro Saulora dubu meni pire nu kanera peniro natara goma atune potiwa osero bamunua awa.
44009026	Saulo meni baro Yerusalem nate kei awero Yesura dubu amira nana susumamu senu giro azu wewa. Awa nera kota, nu Yesura mai wenua awa giwa me kaka wamu wenua.
44009027	Azu wewa giro Banaba meni Saulore otao wero aposolo dubura nana puro baro Tua meni ebete ena Saulora nana kei awero ge tugata wenu Damaskas nate ena azu tepo Yesura Oziga Ewanana kereninua amira uge dinua awa.
44009028	Ago wenu Saulo nu numorekare dai noise Yerusalem nate ena izima-sauma inoisonua.
44009029	Ago itise Tuara ge awa emare azu kaka wamu tugata inoisonua. Ago wasai Yuda ema Grik ge ninai ami numore dai Tuara ge awa toise ge ina-sa inoisowa awa. Ago inoise Saulo damu sero ebata tamamu sero wewa awa.
44009030	Ago inoiwa giro otao mamai nuso meni nu uzumuro puro baro Sisaria nate kei awero wara potiro iyetiwa bamuro Taso nate kei awenua awa.
44009031	Nukare Saulo iyetiwa bamunu amire Yesura dubu Yudaya zebura ata Galilaya zebura ata Samaria zebura noisowa nusokare nana gera bega kei awenua awa. Begare noise gera putou poti dara niro zewai wewa. Ago wero Tuara zazo de ike nitinoise noisowa. Ago inoiwa Ozana meni nukare soremunu ema bama witai Yesura dubure tairo noisowa awa.
44009032	Petoro nu buara izima-sauma inoise noe osero Yesura dubu Lida nate noisowa amira nana kei awenua.
44009033	Ago kei awero ema zo zazo nuso Ainia awa ginua. Nu zabura wero iteye donu zepa 8 wenua.
44009034	Are Petoro meni numore ego senua awa, “Ainia, Yesu Kristo meni ni kora inoya. Are eriro sawa niso boze.” Ago senu eya erinua awa.
44009035	Ago wenu Lida natara ata Seron garawira ema bama meni giro duba kapeteniro Tuara dubu wewa awa.
44009036	Yesura dubu amira nana bama zo Yopa nate noisonua, zazo nuso Tabita. Grik gera Dokas. Nu dumi pumai inoise kora wai bua dainiro inoisonua.
44009037	Are Petoro nu Lida nate noinu Tabita yaya puro betenua awa. Betenu woi nuso sewero so moka zora puro witiro potiwa.
44009038	Lida nata awa Yopa nata zorage itinua, are Yesura dubu meni Petorora bowi niniro ema eto iyetiwa nuso nana baro ego sewato awa, “Nato ni puro nata nasokarera eya bayanekai.”
44009039	Ago sewato Petoro meni ge awa niniro peu wero ema eto amire dai bamuwa awa. Baro kei awenu bama betai itinua amira nana sora puro witiwa awa. Witi sora niro bama kuma dapikarago Petoro zimuro di toise mo wapere tama woire Dokas meni seka noise gaenu pumuwa awa gipewa.
44009040	Ago wewa Petoro meni nukare eseninu ose dura niwa bawa diro isa senua. Isa sero tepo wero iri betaira nana niro ego senua awa, “Tabita, ni eri.” Ago senu giti panero Petoro giro eriro arumunua.
44009041	Arumuro itinu Petoro meni wana ziro senu eriro dopenua. Ago wenu nu Yesura dubure bama kuma enire zawa senu witiwa Tabita nu seka wenua awa nusokare nana wanera potinua awa.
44009042	Amira bowi meni baro Yopa natara te wenu dainiro meni Tua tuma diwa.
44009043	Petoro nu Yopa nate itise ema zo zazo Simon, nu wo aiso bua wai ema, amira sora be dainiro noisonua awa.
44010001	Sisaria nate ema zo noisonua zazo nuso Konilio. Nu Itali zebura soldia amira zo. Nu soldia 100 amira dia noisonua awa.
44010002	Nu ata awiso nuso nukare Anutu sou inoise etutiro noisowa awa. Ago inoise Yuda ema bama bogamasa amire dumi pumai bua dainiro inoise Anutura nana eyaya begomo sai gege toise noisonua awa.
44010003	Ago inoe waiko be zore tuwe 3 klok amire nu seka itise atua ine wero Anutura angelo zo meni nuso nana sora toinu ginua awa. Ago gosinoinu angelo meni zazo nuso zawa sero ego senua awa, “Konilio.”
44010004	Zawa senu ua inoise azu wero titibi awero ego senua awa, “Tua, nogoro tosi?” Ago senu angelo meni numore ego senua awa, “Isa nisore dumi pumai nisore Anutura nana bayawi giro yaba inowia.
44010005	Are ni soumai eni iyetasa bamu Yopa nate niro ema zo zazo nuso Simon Petoro awa tamuro puro mare.
44010006	Ema awa ema zo zazo nuso Simon, nu wo aiso bua inowia, amira nana sora itewia. So awa ewa bera itia.”
44010007	Angelo ge awa tugata wero doro bamunu nu soumai nuso etore soldia nu sou inoisowa amira nana zo Tuara gera nuai amire nukare etorobara zawa senu muwa
44010008	ge uge wero pesuniro Yopa nate iyetinu bamuwa awa.
44010009	Mai iyetinu susaumite ebete awinoiwa pina atinu noko susaumite nata tamamu sero inoiwa waiko soe dopenu Petoro meni begomo samu sero so tame witiro
44010010	begomo tomite meri betero senu nena sawinoiwa nu atua ine inoinu Tua meni numore nena ego gipenua awa:
44010011	Utu zaumunu nena zo mo ine bamubake oko nuso zoeto-zoeto amira diai gamai awa zebura potiwa nuso nana osero munua.
44010012	Mo amira mokara ena wo eure-taure ata zi eure-taure ata ni eure-taure ami itiwa.
44010013	Osenu ge zo ego kei awenua awa, “O Petoro, eriro dero azero ni.”
44010014	Ago senu Petoro meni ina ego senua awa, “Tua, ago oko sase. Na nena sienai waya awa oko ninowena.”
44010015	Ago senu ge noko ego kei awenua awa, “Anutu meni nena sewero kora inoya awa waya oko asase.” Ago senua awa.
44010016	Ge awa kei awenu be etorobara wenu amire eya noko zumuwa witiro bamu utura ninua awa.
44010017	Petoro nu nena awa atua wago wero ginua, are susu gamu sero kotumu-katumu inoise itinu Koniliora ema nukare nate kei awero Simonra so kau inoise atata wero susaumite so tamuro so bera dopewa awa.
44010018	Dopero zawa toise ego sewa awa, “Simon zazo nuso zo Petoro nu so emira itita?”
44010019	Petoro nu nena ginua awa kotumuro susu gamu inoise itinu Ozana meni numore ego senua awa, “Ema etorobara muro ni kau inora, awa gi.
44010020	Are ni eri. Osero numorekare dai bayamu sero inoise kotumu-katumu oko wase. Ema awa nane sesena mera awa.”
44010021	Ago senu giro Petoro meni nusokare nana osero ego senua awa, “Na kau inowa na ewa. Nera tupewi?”
44010022	Ago senu nukare ego tugata wewa awa, “Soldiara dia ema Konilio ami nakare iyeti tupenakare. Nu Anutu sou inoise etutiro nowia. Agoro Yuda ema numore gawera te inowia. Nu awa Anutura angelo zo meni nuso nana kei awero ni so nusora uzumuro be nisora ena ge eni ninaise sasaya.”
44010023	Ago sewa giro Petoro meni nukare kora-makora wenua awa. Kora wenu awinoiwa pina atinu nu ata Yopa natara ge ninai eni ata ema ona muwa amire dai bamuwa awa.
44010024	Nukare ebete ena pi daimata auro kei awe Sisaria nate niwa. Konilio nu sedikai nuso ata otao mamai nusore senu mu dara niwa nukare dia itiwa kei awewa.
44010025	Kei awero Petoro meni sora toyamu sero inoinu Konilio meni zorage muro nuso nana tera bawa diro yawa sara bamubake wenua.
44010026	Ago wenu Petoro meni eraise ego senua awa, “Ni eri. Na ema ni ago ine awa.”
44010027	Ago senua awa. Ago sero ge uge-mage weroto sora toiro ema auniro itiwa awa giro ego senua awa,
44010028	“Nikare susu nasokare Yuda emara gosinowewa. Nakare ema Yudako amire tairo nuaita esewa we nisokare nana nai awa azu sai ge itia awa. Ata Anutu meni susu awa namore gipitaya, are na ema zo da di amire bemitire asero azu oko samunona.
44010029	Are na manise uzumewa maira oko mou wetena. Are manise uzumewa tupena amira susu seu gane.”
44010030	Ago senu Konilio meni ego senua awa, “Awisenakai omire nena naso nana kei awisia amira uge wana giyo. Zeme waiko diti 3 klok inoya, da ago be amire waiko diti da ago inoisia. Waiko diti 3 klok inoi na isa toise itena ema zo tama woi nuso zasimaire ami naso nana tutamu kei awisia.
44010031	Kei awero namore ego sisia awa, ‘Konilio, Anutu meni isa niso ninitinoise dumi pumai niso giro nimore yaba inoya.
44010032	Are ni ema iyetasa Yopa baro Simon zazo nuso zo Petoro awa puro marise. Nu ema zazo Simon wo aiso bua inowia amira nana sora itewia. So nuso ewa bera itia.’
44010033	Ago sesi giro na ema eya iyetena niso nana bamisera. Amira ni ge naso niniro mesa nama duba naso kokopai inoya. Are Tua meni ge nimore tugata wisia awa te sasa ninamukare dapikarago Anutura giti mokara auniro itenakare ewa.” Ago senua awa.
44010034	Petoro nu be peu wenu ge ego tugata wenua awa, “Anutu meni eramara tama gege gosinoise oko awina-dawina inowia, awa zeme gena me inoya.
44010035	Ema dubu giti amira nana eni meni nu sou inoise etutiro nowera nukare awa Anutu meni gawi te inowia.
44010036	Oziga Anutu meni Isreli emare potinua amira bowi awa nikare ninitinowewa. Yesu Kristo, nu ema dapikaragora Tua, nu ami bega pumunua amira Oziga Ewanana Anutu meni kereniro poti damu ninua awa. Gita Yohane meni ema bama ge ou gutinoise ge tugata inoisonua be amira ana
44010037	oziga ami Galilaya zebura ena zaawero bamuro Yudaya zebura te wenua, awa gosinowa awa.
44010038	Ge ego emira tona. Anutu meni Yesu Nasarete natara buara potitinoise Ozana nuso nana iyetinu toinu Anutura putou pumunua awa. Putou pumuro izima-sauma inoise ema soremuro bua inoise eni Satan meni gera wenu waya wewa awa dapikarago kora inoisonua. Awa nera kota, Anutu meni nu soga wasai bua inoisonua awa.
44010039	Bua nu Yuda zebura ata Yerusalem nate ena inoisonua amira oziga sai ema nakare awa. Nukare nu puro nira dewa betenua awa.
44010040	Betero bi ditira itinu waiko be etorobara tepo wenu Anutu meni awa-uzenu seka wero eriro kei damu ninua.
44010041	Kei damu ninua, awa Yuda ema dapikarago amira nana kota, ema oziga sai ema nakare Anutu meni gita nuso sianiro pumunua nasokare nana gege kei awenua. Nakare numa betaira ena seka wero erinu numore dai nena ninakare awa.
44010042	Ota Anutu meni Yesu ema betaire seka nuaire amira zas bamu nasokai potinua, amira bowi ge awa ema dubu giti amira nana kereniro sanisekare senua awa.
44010043	Yesu tuma diamunora nukare awa Anutu meni Yesura zazo bowire emo inoise pasina nusokare disamunoya. Awa porofete dapikarago meni kereniro tepo wewa awa.” Ago senua awa.
44010044	Petoro nu ge ago toise dopero itinu nukare Oziga Ewanana ninitinoise itiwa Ozana meni osero nusokare nana toinua awa.
44010045	Ago wenu Yuda ema ge ninai Petorore dai bamuwa nukare Anutu meni ema Yudakore dai Ozana potinua awa giro di tainiwa awa.
