48004014	Agoro yaya naso meni bua bamu nimorekare potina. Ata nikare namore biawa oko wewa. Na azu oko wewa. Tepo awa. Nikare na giwa Anutura angelo ine wena, o Kristo Yesu ine wena giro na uzumuwa.
48004015	Nikare be amire yawa sara wewa, awa nogoro tepo inoi? Nikare giti moka nisokare gusero namore potai ine te sia, awa ago wamewa, awa me gosinoise tona.
48004016	Agoro gita ge me tugata wena, are zeme nama gewa iwo nisokare ine inonita?
48004017	Ema eni awa ge uge nusokare meni nikare uzumara zaumurokai nikare nusokare nana bayawise kotumuro inowera. Opi sara nikare na doro nusokare nana bayawise inowera awa.
48004018	Nena ewanana emo uge wai awa ewanana. Awa na nisokare nana muro nuana amire gege kota, be giti wawa kokopai wamunoya awa.
48004019	Mai awiso naso, na nikare emo bama meni mai pumamu inoise yaya tapinowera ago ine tamuna, noko da awa tapinona. Agoro Kristo meni duba nisokarera kei awero baitaise yaya tapinoise nuamunona.
48004020	Na nuai nisokare giro itazaita inona. Are na nisokare nana muro pas meni kota, be naso meni nikare tugata wamu yaba inona awa.
48004021	Atata wana seu. Nikare lo ge sou wamu inowewa ami lo ge gaya awa azipitinowewita?
48004022	Amira ana ge zo ego gayai itia awa. Abrahamra mai mata eto kei awewato, awa zo sou bama meni pumunua, zo ara nuso meni pumunua.
48004023	Sou bama meni pumunua nu awa emara kotumaira kei awenua. Bama nuso meni pumunua awa Anutura seronai ge amira kei awenua.
48004024	Are ge amira eniba ego itia awa. Bama eto ami Anuture tairo nuai ge eto awa etete wewato awa. Tairo nuai zo Sinai dirumura ena wewa, are dubu nuso meni sou bua wewa. Amira etete awa Abrahamra sou bama Haga meni wenua awa.
48004025	Sinai awa dirumu zo, Arabia zebura itia. Zazo nuso zo Haga. Yerusalem nata awa Sinai dirumure te inorato. Yerusalemra mai nukare Hagara mai ine soumai awa.
48004026	Ata Sara meni mui amu tairo nuai amira te. Ota Yerusalem nata zo utura itia ami nu soumai kota, nu lo gera mui amu. Nata ami mia me nasokai inoya.
48004027	Ge gayai zo ego itia awa, Bama eronai, ni mai kaka pamu nowesa ami yawa sara we. Mai pamu yaya tapinowera ago ine niso nana tepo, ni duba niso yawa sara waise. Bama emare amira mai etokaka kei awinuara bama eronaira mai awiso dainiro kei awamunora awa.
48004028	Otao mamai naso, Isaka nu Anutura seronaira kei awenua. Da ago ine nikare Anutura seronaira mai nuso kei awewa.
48004029	Ata gita mai emara kotumaira kei awai meni mai Ozanara kotumaira kei awai awa iwo wenua, da ago ine zeme itia.
48004030	Are ge gayai nogo iti? Ego itia ewa, Soubama awa nu mai nusore dai tune bayareto. Soubamera mai meni bama mera mai amire dai mamera wau oko topetaise.
48004031	Otao mamai naso, nakai sou bamera mai awiso tepo. Nakai bama mera mai awiso awa.
48005001	Nakai mui tepo nuanisekai Kristo meni mui besenua. Are eni meni nikare mui wero soumai nusokare wawise sara zewai wero azu sewo.
48005002	Na Paulo meni sana niniu. Nikare saramai wamu sero tama aiso nisokare kaparise samunowa, awa Kristo meni nikare soremai ine te oko wamunoya.
48005003	Noko sero baitane. Zo nu Yudara lo zo dipinoise tama aiso nuso kapamunoya ami Yudara lo ge dapikarago dimai te wamunoya.
48005004	Ata lo ge dipinoise saramai nuamu towewa ami Kristore dai tairo nuai awa kapinowa. Awa-diai nuso dotewa, are nisokare nana me amu inoya.
48005005	Ata nanekare meni awa Ozanara putou meni tuma diai emo nuai saramai tamamu sero kotupitinoise nowenakare.
48005006	Kristo Yesure dai noise tama aiso kapaire nuaita tama aiso kapai tepo nuai awa nena me tepo awa. Ata tuma diaire dumi yagaba pumai awa nena me awa.
48005007	Nikare gera ebata zaawero kokopai patiwa. Patitinoiwa ai meni ebata denu azenu ge me awa dotinowewi?
48005008	Anutu nikare uzupitinowia ami ge mera ebata oko gazinowia.
48005009	Wora muti pei-pai-mai-kaka ami ma sura baro te wero duamunoya, da ago ine ema waya daimata meni nikare dapikarago sisai waya wamunowa.
48005010	Nakai Tuare dai nowenakai, are nikare ge naso azu oko samunowa, awa gosinona. Are ema zota zo meni duba nisokare sisamunoya, amira ina nuso nana kei awamunoya.
48005011	Otao mamai, na nikare tama aiso kapawise tugata wamena sia, awa Yuda ema meni yaya bua naso nana tame oko potamera. Ata na nikare nuai seka tamamu tama aiso kapawise kaka samu inona. Nikare ni pasinaira gege nuai seka tamawise towena, are nukare yaya namore potitinowera.
48005012	Are duba nisokare sisinowera ami tama aiso nusokare azero kaparise tona awa.
48005013	Otao mamai, Anutu meni nikare mui amu nuawise uzumunua awa. Agoro mui amu nuai meni tamara nena amira ge dimawise kota, dubara dumi pupinoise sou ina-wa wawise nikare uzumunua awa.
48005014	Are Yudara lo ge dapikarago amira ge bamubake ego sai awa, “Ni nitope ara tapinowesa, da ago ine ema enire weyo.”
48005015	Nikare giro baitiu. Nikare ina-da wero ina-gaya wero awinoise nikare nitopekare dero tepo-tapo wanowa awa.
48005016	Agoro ego ine tona awa. Nikare Ozanara uzumai ge awa ninitinoise noiwo. Ago inoise duba matura duba-duba oko wamunowa.
48005017	Duba matura ara tamai meni Ozanare iwo inowia. Noko Ozana meni duba mature iwo inowia. Ago wero nuto iwo ina-wa wawerato nikare nena wamu towewa awa wai ine tepo.
48005018	Ota Ozana meni nikare uzumai ninamunowa, awa lo ge meni nimorekare ema tua oko wamunoya.
48005019	Duba matura bua awa bezero oko itewia. Awa ego kei awinowia: kuma wai, tani waya wai, ge dai,
48005020	tua opi sou wai, kayo wai, iwo ina-wa wai, ge bawai, otao zore kotumai waya puro nuai, dumu wai, nena ziro soyai, zaumuro ewe-pape nuai,
48005021	duba-duba wai, ou zewai niro dau wai, ou zewai niro tani waya wai. Agoro nena eni-kani. Nena ago ine amira ge gita tugata wena, awa noko tugata wane. Ema pasina awa inowera ami Anutu imata Tua wero nowia amira natara oko toyamunora.
48005022	Ozana meni me ego ine tamawi kei awinowia awa: dubara dumi pai, duba yawa sarare, bega puro nuai, awa-diaire, dumi yagaba, kora-makora wai, tani me gege inoise nuai,
48005023	saitiro nuai, duba meni sienitinoise nuai. Awa Ozana meni sawi me awa kei awinowia. Are lo ge meni nena me awa oko azu towia.
48005024	Kristo Yesura seronai nowenakai ami nuai matu nasokai duba-dubareta yaba waire awa ni pasinaira denakai tepo wenua awa.
48005025	Agoro Ozana meni nuai seka namorekai potinua, are Ozanara uzumai awa ninitinoise ebata nusora patanekai.
48005026	Nakai tama puro wititinoise oko ina-sa wanekai. Kotumai waya ina-wa oko wanekai.
48006001	Otao mamai naso, ema zo meni betata wero pasina tamai giro nikare Ozanare meni saitiro nu kora wero pumuwo. Ago inoise etete naira ena betata wai azu, ni nitope uma we.
48006002	Nikare nena mou-mau awa soga ina-wa inoise dimuwo. Ago inoise Kristora lo ge te dimamunowa.
48006003	Ema osai zo meni nutope ema bamu asamunoya, awa nu nutope etete namunoya.
48006004	Nikare dapikarago da da ami nuai nikakare nisokare giro baitiwo. Ago wawa ewanana wamunoya, awa yawa sara ge awa ema zo emo kota, nikare emo wero kei awamunoya.
48006005	Buara mou awa mamere mamere wero pumuwo.
48006006	Yesura ge nikare tugata-magata inowera ema nukare ami emo nena ewa-gaewa nisokare nana itai giro potiwo.
48006007	Anutu etete nawa duwamunoi sia sero nitopekare oko etete nawe. We zo urasa me zo oko kei awamunoya. Noma we uretesa amira me gege kei awai pamunosa.
48006008	Zo nu duba matura we uramunoya ami noma duba matu nusora me pamunoya. Me awa betero yaya zewai-zawai tamai gege tamai. Ota zo nu Ozanara we uramunoya ami noma Ozanara me nuai me ewanana awa pamunoya.
48006009	Bua kokopai inoise biawa oko wanekai. Betata kaka wamu wamunonakai, awa noma me paira be nuso amire zamai bamubake pamunonakai.
48006010	Are be nasokai itia egore bere-bere ema dapikarago kora wanekai. Ago inoise otao mamai nasokai Tuara gera nowera amire dumi yagaba panekai.
48006011	Nikare owe bamubake wana naka naso meni gainona ei awa giu.
48006012	Yuda ema ge ou gutai eni meni nisokare nana noise tama nusokare puro witamu sero nikare tama aiso kapawise awita towera. Ne emo ago toweri? Susu nusokare ego ewa. Nukare Kristora ni pasinai tuma didinowera, ata nukare tama aiso kapai amira lo ge duara Yuda eni meni numorekare iwo wai azu, nikare dai tama aiso kapawise towera awa.
48006013	Tama aiso kapewa nukare awa lo ge oko dipinowera. Nukare awa ninekare tama aiso kapero nusokare nana susumawa tama nusokare bowi wamu sero towera awa.
48006014	Ota nane meni awa nena zota zo emo kota, Tua nasokai Yesu Kristo ni pasinai nusora bowi ge awa gege de ike nitinoise nowena. Yesura ni pasinai meni zebura nena amira putou na emo denu tepo wenua awa. Are na da ago ni pasinai nusora betena zebura ara tamai naso nana ena tepo wenua.
48006015	Tama aiso kapaire nuaita tama aiso kapai tepo nuai awa nena me amu. Ota nuai seka meni awa nena me.
48006016	Kotumai awa puro nowenakare. Nikare dai kotumai awa puro nowewa, are begare awa-diaire nisokare nana witiro itaise. Agoro Anutura Isreli ema me wero nowera nusokare nana dai witiro itaise.
48006017	Zo meni noko yaya bua namore oko potaise. Na Tua Yesura bumizi owere tama nasora itawi puro nowena.
48006018	Otao mamai naso, Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora dumi yagaba meni duba nisokarera nana itaise. Iyo.
49001001	Na Paulo meni Anutura bera Yesu Kristora aposolo wero nowena ami Tuara dubu Efeso nate itise Yesu Kristo ziro tata-tata inowewa nimorekare pas ei awa potitinona awa.
49001002	Mama nasokai Anutu ata Tua nasokai Yesu Kristo nusoto nana ena dumi yagabare duba-ozaire meni semu nisokare nana niro itaise.
49001003	Anutu nu Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora Anutu ata Mama, nu awa zazo nuso de ike nanekai. Nu nakai Kristora nana susumuro ititira sogawai susu giti utura ena namorekai potinua awa.
49001004	Nune gita me gita zebura siwako kaka kei awamure nuso nana benaura bemiti tepo duba saramaire nuanisekai sero Kristo emo nakai siana-katana wenua awa.
49001005	Nu gita nininu itisonua, are nu Yesu Kristo emo inoise dumi pupinoise mai awiso nuso wero nuanisekai duba peure wero senu zewai wenua awa.
49001006	Nu Mai bou nuso emo wero sogawai nuso ewanana namorekai nupe potinua, are nu bowi wai gege wanekai.
49001007	Yesu nu orara nuso meni nakai zuma gaenu mui amu wero nowenakai. Awa pasina nasokai disenua awa. Anutura sogawai ou suru ine itewia amira te wenua awa.
49001008	Anutu meni sogawai nuso awa nasokai nana niginoise kotumai susu gitire ninaire namorekai potitinowia awa.
49001009	Nu nena Kristora buara wamu sero duba nusora imata gita nininu bezai itisonua, bui nuso awa namorekai kereninua awa.
49001010	Nena wamu toya awa ego ewa: Be kotumunua awa zora awai amire nu nena bamubamu uturata zebura awa poti dara nai amire Kristo meni mama wamunoya awa.
49001011	Anutu nu nena wamu wero giro duba nuso meni daba sawi kei awinowia ami gita nininu itisonua, are nakai dubu nuso wanisekai Kristora buara sianiro pumunua.
49001012	Awa nakare gita Kristo tuma diro noisonakare nowenakare ami nu bowi wai gege wanisekare ago wenua awa.
49001013	Are nikare da ago ine wewa awa. Nikare ge me niniwa, awa Oziga Ewanana nikare korawenua amire tona awa. Nikare ge awa niniro puro poti dube nitinoise Kristo tuma diwa Anutu meni Ozana namorekai seronai awa potinu pumuwa dubu nuso saore gosinowia awa.
49001014	Ozana awa nena Anutu meni dubu nuso namorekai potamu seroninua amira agewa gita potai awa. Agewa ami nakai numore gegenitinowia awa. Are nuanakai Anutu meni nakai soero pumai numore dai nuamunonakai, amira be awa dia wanisekai sero Ozana namorekai potinua awa. Susu amira bowi nuso meni bamubake kei awaise ago wenua awa.
49001015	Ami emo na nikare Tua Yesu tuma didinowewa, ota gera otao mamai nasokai amire dumi yagaba pupinowewa amira ge bowi niniro
49001016	nikare kotumuro isa toise be giti kokopai Anuture toise nowena awa.
49001017	Ago inoise nikare emo isa ego towena awa: Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora Anutu, nu simai zasimaire amira mama, ami kotumai nisokare ziai zazai ge ninawise o susu nuso kereninua awa gawa kei awaise isa towena awa.
49001018	Kotumai nisokare ziai zazai amire nena ego emira susu gawise: Tua meni nikare utura nena ewa-gaewa amira mamana wawise zawa senua, o nena ewa-gaewa simai zasimaire awa dubu nuso namorekai seroninua,
49001019	ota putou nuso bamubake dauta-beuta awai nu tuma didinowenakai ami nasokai nana itise nakai sorepitinowia — nena ago ine amira susu ninawise isa towena awa.
49001020	Nu putou nuso bamubake nasokai nana itewia da ami gita Kristo betaira ena awa-uzero puro poti utura ninu wana me nusora itewia awa.
49001021	Poti ago ninu Kristo meni utura angelo dapikarago dainitinowia — angelo diata angelo putoureta angelo giti kopi — amira witai nusokare potinua awa. Nu zazo bowire eni itera awa dapikarago dainitinoya, be zeme emire daba kota, ago daba itai gege itamunoya awa.
49001022	Anutu meni nena bamubamu dago Kristora nana duru potiro dubu nuso nakai emo nena bamubamu amira giti kopi awa numa potinua awa.
49001023	Kristora dubu nu siana-katana wenua awa te-wana tama ipu nuso awa. Dubu nuso meni nuso nana susumawenakai nu te-wana tama ipu te kei awero nowia awa. Noko nune nena bamubamu ziawi zewai inowia.
49002001	Nikare gita pasina tebe-tabe inoise noisowa ami emo ititi nisokare taragiro ema betai ine noisowa awa.
49002002	Awa zebura nuai waya amira ebete noise ititi wayara ema tua amira ge dipinoise noisowa awa. Ititi waya ami be zeme emire ge dai emara nana bua inowia.
49002003	Nakai gita numorekare te da ago noisekai duba matu nasokaira ara tamai awa ama ganero noisonakai awa. Ago inoise tama aiso nasokaire kotumai nasokaire amira ge dimuro noisonakai awa. Are nakai ema enire dai Anutura be dumura gegenai wenakai awa.
49002004	Ata Anutu nu awa-diai nuso witai itewia. Are nu namorekai dubara dumi bamubake puro noisonua,
49002005	are nakai ge dai nasokaira ema ititi betaire noisonakai be amire nakai Kristore dai betaira ena awa-uzenua awa. Ninitinowa: Bayao nusora nikare kora wenua awa.
49002006	Nu nakai Kristore dai awa-uzero numore dai utura arumai amira arumanisekai sero potinua awa. Awa Kristo Yesu emo inoise ago wenua awa.
49002007	Anutu meni nakai emo dumi yagaba pupinoise Kristo Yesu iyetinu munua. Ago inoise bayao nuso bamubake dauta-beuta awai amira susu kereninua. Kereniro damu-damuke itai gege itaise ago wenua awa.
49002008	Nu nikare emo dumi yagaba pupinoise tuma diai nisokare emo wero nikare korawenua. Awa wai nisokarera kota, Anutu nu nutope duba bayao nusora nimorekare ago wenua awa.
49002009	Wai nisokarera oko wenua. Ago wami sia, awa nikare te tama puro witamewa. Ata tepo awa.
49002010	Nune meni awa nakai tamunua. Nu nakai bua ewanana wanisekai sero Yesu Kristora buara nuai seka namorekai tamunua awa. Bua ewanana awa nakai werota wero awinoise nuanisekai Anutu meni gita sia wenua awa.
49002011	Nikare ema Yudako meni gita tama aisora owe tepo noisowa, amira kotupitinoise noiwo. Owe tepo nuasawa Yuda ema tama owe wai ami nimorekare “owe amu” asinoisonakare. Tama owe awa nena wana meni wai gege awa.
49002012	Are nikare ego emira kotupitinoise noiwo: Nikare be amire Kristo tepo noisowa; ata Isreli ema nakare nata susu wero nuasanakare ninekare meni awa asike noisowa awa; ota nanekare meni awa Anutu meni nena ama potamu seroniro amire tairo nuai nuso namorekare potinua awa puro nuasanakare ninekare meni awa tairo nuai tepo bogmasa noisowa; ata nikare soremai tepo Anutu tepo zebura noisowa awa.
49002013	Ata be zeme emire meni awa nikare gita asike noisowa ami Kristo Yesu nana susupitinoise Kristora orara emo wero Anutura nana zorage kei awero nowewa awa.
49002014	-
49002015	Nu nutope bega nasokaira susu wero itewia. Gita Yuda ema nakare zaumuro nikare ema Yudako doro iwo ina-wa inoise noisonakai awa. Iwo ami goma ine wero itisonua awa. Ata Kristo meni tama aiso nuso gera inoise goma awa denu zasenu nakai dubu eto ami dubu daimata wenakai awa. Nu betinoise Yudara lo ge dapikarago — sai zewai wai gere o potai gere — awa puro osenu putou amu wenua. Awa dubu eto zaumuro noisonakai ami nuso nana susumuro dubu daimata wero begare nuanisekai ago wenua awa.
49002016	Nu dubu eto awa poti dara nai dubu daimata wanisekai sero ni pasinaira ena betenua awa. Ago inoise dubu eto gita iwo ina-wa inoise noisonakai iwo amira putou ata Anutura iwo amira putou awa eto dago denu tepo-tapo wewato nu nakai Anuture dara potinu nowenakai awa.
49002017	Nu kei awero asike nuai nikare ata zorage nai nakare dapikarago begara ge tugata wenu nininakai awa.
49002018	Kristo meni Mamera so be awa pienua, are nakai Yuda ema ge ninaire ema Yudako ge ninaire dubu eto ami Ozana daimata awa pumurokai Mamera nana kei awinowenakai.
49002019	Are be zeme emire nikare ema Yudako ge ninai meni Anutura nana asike oko nowewa. Nikare ge ninai ema enire susumuro Anutura dubu wero nowewa awa. Nikare Anutura mai awiso wero nowewa awa.
49002020	Nikare so zo Anutu meni gapinoya ago ine awa. Aposolo ata porofete nukare so amira zasiwi ine awa. Nukare nikare dimawera dopinowewa awa. Ota Yesu Kristo meni urura zasiwi inoya awa.
49002021	Nune erama dapikarago sora utu ine zasero diawi Tuara ibu saramai kei awero susawewia.
49002022	Nikare da ago Anutu meni Kristora nana susumawi Ozanara itai-matai ibu wero nowewa.
49003001	Ami emo Paulo, nama nikare ema Yudako emo wero Kristo Yesura buara benai ema wero nowena ami nikare emo Anutu isa towena awa.
49003002	Nikare ge naso ninisewi, tanita. Anutu bayao nuso emo wero nisokare nana bua wanise senua, awa ninisewi, tanita.
49003003	Anutu meni bui nuso namore kereninua. Amira ge pei-kaka ike ena gaetena awa.
49003004	Nikare ge awa azipitinoise na Kristora bui nuso duba meni giro baititinowena ago ewanana gamunowa awa.
49003005	Bui nuso awa gita ema noisowa numorekare kaka kerenamu awa. Ama Ozana meni aposolo ata porofete nuso saramai namorekare kereninua awa.
49003006	Bui nuso awa ego ewa: Ema Yudako nikare Oziga Ewanana niniro Yuda ema namorekare dai te Anutura nena ewa-gaewa amira mamana wero nowewa. Ota nikare ata nakare dago nakai dubu da wero nowenakai. Ota nikare nena Anutu meni potamu seroninua awa Kristo Yesura nana susumuro namorekare dai topetitinoise nowenakai awa.
49003007	Na Oziga Ewanana amira bua wanise Anutu meni namore dumi yagaba pupinoise putou nuso namore potinu Oziga Ewananara bua mai wena awa.
49003008	Na Anutura dubu amira osai me osai nowena, ata saineba Anutu meni bua ewanana awa namore potinua. Awa Kristora nana zamai bamu itai gege itewia amira ge ou suru ine awa ema Yudakore sero kerenanise amira bua ewanana namore potinua awa.
49003009	Bui nuso awa sero kerenana ema dapikarago ami garise senua awa. Anutu nu nena bamubamu tamunua ami gita bui nuso awa duba meni daba be giti puro tupisonua awa.
49003010	Nogoro duba nusora gege puro noisonu? Amira susu ego ine ewa. Anutura kotumai bamubamu ou suru ine awa zeme emire dubu nuso nasokai nana kei awai utura angelo dia ata angelo putoure ami garise sero gita duba nusora gege puro noisonua.
49003011	Anutu nu gita me gita be tepora ana duba nuso meni ge senu zewai wenua amira me awa poti Tua nasokai Kristo Yesu amira nana ninu tamunua awa.
49003012	Ago inoise ebata nuso kora wenu nakai nu tuma didinoise azu tepo zewai wero Anutura nana zora susawewenakai awa.
49003013	Are ego sana niniu. Na nikare emo wero yaya-buyaya tapinowena amira duba nisokare meni oko osaise. Tepo awa. Yaya naso meni zazo nisokare de ike nitinoya.
49003014	-
49003015	Are na bui nuso ewanana kotupitinoise Mama nasokaira nana benaura bawa diro nikare emo isa tona. Mama awa nu utura zebura mamana asai amira susu awa. Are zazo nusokare “mama” awa nuso nana ena kei awinowia.
49003016	Are na nuso nana benaura bawa diro nikare emo wero isa toise ego towena awa: Anutu simai zasimaire nuso bamubake itia ago ine te Ozana nimorekare potai, Ozana meni nikare putou bamubake tamai, dubare ititire zewai-zawai wawise;
49003017	o Kristo tuma diawa nu duba nisokarera itai-matai waise; o nikare duba bayao nusora tatawi potiro zewai wero dopawise.
49003018	Duba bayao nusora dopinoise ge ema eni dapikarago numorekare dai duba bayao nusora susure gomire ipu soropure bona waganare awa te niniro baitawise isa towena.
49003019	Awa nikare Kristora bayao meni emara ninai dainiro tepo inoya awa saineba niniro baitawise isa towena. Ago inuawa amire nena Anutura nana ena zamuro itewia ami nisokare nana topetiro baitamunoya.
49003020	Bua nakai emo waise sero isa towenakai o kotupitinowenakai, bua awa dapikarago putou nuso meni nasokai nana itise bua inowia ami wai te wai awa. Awa daba kota, bua eni bamubamu nakai waise kaka kotumamu awa dai wai te wai awa.
49003021	Nu awa dubu nusora nanata Kristo Yesura nana bowi wai nuso meni susumuro itai gege itaise. Iyo.
49004001	Are na Tua emo benai ema wero nowena ami nikare awa-uzinoise sana niniu. Anutu meni nikare dorowetiro ebata me nikare gipenua, ebata amira te noiwo.
49004002	Ago inoise tama puro osero baitiro wama-ozaire noiwo. Ota awa-ina-dia inoise saitiro dubara dumire noiwo.
49004003	Ago wero Ozana nu bega tamuro nikare poti dara niro begara asi meni zasero dinu dubu daimata wewa, asi awa dawa kapai azu, zewai wero dia ina-wa inoise noiwo.
49004004	Nakai dubu nuso daimata gege awa; nakai Ozana daimata gege puro nowenakai; nakai utura wau daimata gege pumanisekai sero dorowetinua;
49004005	Tua nasokai daimata gege nowia; tuma diai nasokaira susu daimata gege itia; ge ou gutai nasokai daimata gege itia;
49004006	Anutu nasokai daimata gege nowia; nu duba nasokai sero amira mama wero noise, duba nasokai sero dia inoise, duba nasokai sero amira nana ena bua inoise, duba nasokai sero amira nana itai-matai inowia.
49004007	Kristo nu buara putou awa ara tamai nusora kanowero ge ninai ema sero namorekai potinu te puro nowenakai awa.
49004008	Amira ge gayai zo ego itia awa, Nu benai ema puro witi ike damu ninua. Ago wero eramare nena nupe potinua awa.
49004009	Ota “Nu witi ike damu ninua,” ge amira susu nogo iti? Susu nuso ego ewa: Nu gita osenua. Awa ose bage zebu duru ninua.
49004010	Nu osenua ami ewesemuro utu sero dainiro witinua. Awa uture zebure topetamu witinua awa.
49004011	Nu ami buara putou kano inoise ema eni aposolo potinua, eni porofete, eni Oziga Ewanana tugata wai ema zazo ewenselis, eni pasto ata gipai ema.
49004012	Awa nikare Tuara dubu awa sia-masia wanakare nikare Tuara dubu amira sou wai bua wawa nakai Kristora te-wana tama ipu ami baziro zewai wanisekai bua ema ago ine potinua awa.
49004013	Nakai ago i-susauma tuma diaira susu daimata ata Anutura Mai amira susu daimata awa tamamunonakai awa. Tamuro duba daimata wamunonakai. Ago wero amire ema me wamunonakai. Awa nakai baziro Kristo te wamunonakai.
49004014	Nakai ema me wero amire noko oko mai pei-kaka ine nuamunonakai. Erama eni awa kotumai nusokare mai pei-kakara ine awa. Are etetenai ema meni etetenawera ge opi nusokare awa bisi bamu ine wero ema amira duba puro kipete-kapete wawi wa ine gegewa-gagewa susawewera. Etetenai ema ami etetenai susu giti tamuro erama etetenitinowera.
49004015	Ata nanekai meni awa tani me gege inoise dubara dumi pupinoise tamare ititire dago bazizinomakai giti kopi nasokai Kristo amira nana susumuro nu ine wanekai.
49004016	Nu dubu nuso amira giti kopi nuawi agewa sero susumurota susumuro awawera wuwura nuso meni dara potawi te-wana tama ipu nuso ami kei awinowia. Are agewa sero meni bua namorekai sai awa te wamunonakai, awa te-wana tama ipu nuso dago bazizinoise dubara dumi ina-pa inoise nuamunonakai.
49004017	Na Tuara bera sero baitane. Diga kotumai nusokare nena putira itewia amira ninekare ago ine oko nuawe.
49004018	Opi sai meni kotumai nusokare be muro mume wenua, are nukare kotumai nusokare zazai ine tepo. Nukare dau, Tuara ge ninidanago inowera, are nuai Anutu meni potitinowia awa oko puro nowera.
49004019	Are nukare me nai tepo noise pasina susu giti wamu duba-duba inoise pasina neire-neire berea tepo inoise nowera awa.
49004020	Ninekare meni awa Kristora ge ago ine oko niniwa.
49004021	Nikare susu nuso gipai, noko ge me Yesura nana itewia awa gipewa niniwa awa.
49004022	Ego niniwa awa: Nikare tani gita wero noisowa amira duba matu nisokare meni pasinara duba-duba inoise nutope waya inowia awa dutuniro dowo.
49004023	Ago wero dubare kotumai nisokarere kapeteniwo seka-sakama waise.
49004024	Duba seka-sakama wosunawise. Duba seka-sakama awa Anutu meni tamawi benau nuso ago ine saramai me kei awinowia awa.
49004025	Are nikare ge opi doro ge me gege ina-sa wewo. Nera kota, nakai Kristora te-wana tama ipu daimata amira agewa.
49004026	Tini kapai pupinoise pasina oko wawe. Dumu inoise nuawa waiko oko sokumaise.
49004027	Dumu wai nisokare ami so be piai Satan toyanoya.
49004028	Bewana wai ema meni bewana doro wana nuso meni bua zewai wero waure nenare tamuro erama bogamasare dumi pumaiseyo.
49004029	Ge waya be nisokarera ena oko kei awaise. Ge ewanana meni erama soga inowia awa gege toise noiwo. Ago tuawa ge ewanana nisokare meni erama ge ninamunora nukare awa soremamunoya.
49004030	Anutura Ozana amire duba nai oko tamawe. Nune ami Anutu meni nakai be bamura ena saore gaise sero duba nasokaira owe wenua awa.
49004031	Wiza atata wai, o be dumu wai, o tini kapai, o sero gunai, o sero ziai, amire otaore kotumai waya puro nuai, awa dowo nisokare nana soe oko itaise.
49004032	Nikare dumi ina-pa inoise, zo ina-ama inoise, pasina ina-dua wewo. Anutu meni Kristora bua amira pasina nisokare donua, da ago ine wewo.
49005001	Anutu meni nikare ara tamawi nikare mai nuso wero nowewa. Are nikare te esa nuso patitinoise noiwo.
49005002	Ago wero dubara dumire dai noiwo. Kristo nu da ago nakai emo dubara dumi pupinoise tama aiso nuso potinu gera wewa ami Anuture zawi me ewanana zamare potinua.
49005003	Tani waya — emata bama bewana wairata, pasina wayata, giro duba-duba wai — pasina ago ine oko wawe. Noko pasina amira ge uge awa Tuara dubu nisokare nana soe ena oko kei awaise.
49005004	Noko, ge menaireta dau geta imeti atiwo sero ziai awa oko sawe. Ago sawa waya wamunoya. Anuture kokopai asinoise nu bowi wawa te wamunoya.
49005005	Nikare ego gosinowewa: Ema zo nu bama bewana inowia, o ema waya-kawaya, o ema zo nu Anutu poti ama niro zebura nena poti gita niro nena awa duba-duba inowia, ago ine meni Kristo ata Anutura nate oko bayamunoya.
49005006	Etetenitinoise opi ge sara ninawa me oko waise. Waya ago ine amira Anutura nana ena ina ge dai emara nana kei awamunoya awa.
49005007	Are nikare nukare oko soremamunowa.
49005008	Nikare gita me gita mumera noisowa. Ata zeme meni awa Tuara nana kei awero zasimaira nowewa awa. Are ema zasimaira nowera ago ine noiwo.
49005009	Nane ago tona, nera kota, zasimaira nowera ami me ego ine tapinowera: tani ewananare nuai, ata etutiro nuai, amire ge me sai.
49005010	Nikare nena zo wamu wero giro Tua meni ninai ewanana wamunoita awa gita giro baitiro amire wewo.
49005011	Eni meni mumera nena puti awa wara oko soremawe. Tepo awa. Nikare amira susu waya kerenitinoise azu seu.
49005012	Tani waya bezero inowera amira ge uge wamunonakai, awa me namunonakai.
49005013	Nena ago ine awa kerenanakai zasimai meni gayai susu nuso kei awamunoya. Nera kota, nena damu-damuke kei awamunoya ami zasimai tamamunoya.
49005014	Are amire ego sai itia awa, Gitawa inowesa ami eri. Ota betaira ena eriro dope. Ago wasa Kristora zasimai meni niso nana zasimamunoya awa.
49005015	Nikare nuai nisokare uma inoise noiwo. Ago wero dau me dau kota, dubare kotumaire dai noiu.
49005016	Be emira ena waya meni zamunua itia, are ewanana waira be eni oko duawe. Bua putoure dai zewai wero wewo.
49005017	Duba dau meni nuago oko wawe. Tua meni bua ge nimorekare towia awa giro baitiu.
49005018	Ou wain niro dau oko wawe. Nena ami duba sisinowia awa. Ou wain kota, Ozana meni nisokare nana bemuro topetiro itaise.
49005019	Nikare ge ina-sa inoise yereta Samta koka Ozana meni nimorekare potitinowia awa bere kotumaire gapinoise Tua bowi wewo.
49005020	Ago wero Anutu Mama meni nena neire-neire potitinowia ami emo be giti Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora zazo toise kokopai numore toise noiwo.
49005021	Nikare Kristo samo doinoise ge ina-dima wewo.
49005022	Asini, nikare Tuara ge dipinowewa da ago ine ibana nisokarera ge dimuwo.
49005023	Kristora dubu awa te-wana tama ipu nuso awa. Nu dubu nusora korawai ema nowia. Are nu dubu nusora giti kopi wero nowia da ago ine ibana meni asinira giti kopi wero nowera.
49005024	Are Tuara dubu meni Kristora ge dipinowera ago ine asini meni ibana nusokarera ge dapikarago dimarise.
49005025	Kristo nu dubu nuso emo dubara dumi pupinoise nuai nuso potinu gera wewa, da ago ine ibana nikare asini emo dubara dumi pupinoise noiwo.
49005026	Awa nu dubu nuso nakai awa waya nasokai ge ou meni sewai saramanakai nakai Anuture gegenamu sero ago wenua awa.
49005027	Nu dubu nuso nakai awa bemiti tepo, tama apai tepo, waya zo tepo, saramaire simaire nuso nana benaura potamu sero ago wenua awa. Are ibana, nikare Kristo meni dubu nuso emo dubara dumi pumunua da ago ine asini nisokare emo dubara dumi pumuwo.
49005028	Ibana nukare tama aiso nusokare ara tapinowera, te da ago ine asini nusokare ara tamarise. Zo nu bama nuso ara tapinowia ami tama aiso nuso dai ara tapinowia.
49005029	Ema ai meni tama aiso nuso iwo inowi? Tepo awa. Nakai tama aiso nasokai zizimo wise dia wise awinowenakai awa. Da ago ine Kristo meni dubu nuso namorekai inoise nowia.
49005030	Nera kota, nakai te-wana tama ipu nuso wero nowenakai.
49005031	Ge gayai zo ego itia awa, Are ema zo meni mia mama nuso doro bama nuso nana tayai nuto dubare tamare da weroto nuamunorato.
49005032	Awa ge me susure ou suru bamu ine awa. Ata nane gena Kristo ata dubu nuso awa pupinoya awa.
49005033	Ata ge ami nikare dapikarago da da awa pupinoya awa. Are ibana, nikare dapikarago tama aiso nisokare ara tapinowewa da ago ine asini nisokare ara tamuwo. Ota asini meni ibana nusokare samo darise.
49006001	Mai mamai, nikare Tuare dai noise mia mama nisokarera ge dimuwo. Nera kota, ago wawise sai itia.
49006002	-
49006003	Ge gayai ego itia awa, Ni mia mama niso sou we. Anutu meni potai ge dapikarago potitinoise potai ge ei awa sero amire ge susumuro ego senua awa, “Ni potai ge ei awa dimamunosa, awa na ina ewanana nimore potamunona.” Ina ewanana potamu senua awa ego ewa: “Ni nimoi-namoi zebura ena ewanana nuamunosa.”
49006004	Mamana, nikare mai awiso nisokare tini kapai tamai azu, nena numorekare tebe-tabe oko wawe. Nikare nukare utura gera kora-makora inoise ge potitinoise dia inuawa bazamunora awa.
49006005	Soumai, nikare zebura ema tua nisokare azu wero samo doinoise Kristore inowewa ago kotumuro duba daimatare ge nusokare dimuwo.
49006006	Nukare nikare ua inuara be amire gege bua oko wawe. Nukare uzutamu sero ago ine oko wawe. Nakare Kristora soumai asero Anutu eba senua awa duba peure patiro noiwo.
49006007	Emare kotupitinoise kota, Tuare kotupitinoise sou bua nisokare berea tepo inoise noiwo.
49006008	Nikare ego ninitinowewa awa: Zo nu soumai mui waireta ema mui agu noi, saineba tani ewanana inoise nuamunoya amira te Tua meni ina ago ine numore potamunoya awa.
49006009	Ema tua, nikare kotumai da awa puro noise soumai nisokare kora wero baitiwo. Nukare gona-magona oko wawe. Are ego awa giu: Soumaita ema tua, nikare Tua nisokare da utura itia. Erama nuso nana benaura witiro osero tepo, iririmuro nowenakai.
49006010	Ge sesena pesunitinoi giro susumuro ego tona. Tuara nana susumawa putou nuso bamu ami nisokare nana semai putoure dai nuawe.
49006011	Ago wero Anutura nana ena gire berire pumuro puro nuawa Satan meni bezero iwo wai amire nikare zewai wero tunamunowa awa.
49006012	Nakai iwo tama aisore numorekare oko bogi-zuzuna inowenakai. Tepo awa. Nakai iwo tama aiso tepo, iwo bezai, amire bogi-zuzuna inowenakai. Iwo awa angelo giti kopi waya, ata Satanra soumai putoure, ata zebura ema mumera nowera amira dia waya, ata bi dubu witai-bake ike utura itewera awa. Numorekare bogi-zuzuna inowenakai.
49006013	Ami emo Anutura nana ena gire berire puro noiwo. Ago wawa iwora be kei awai amire nikare iwore bogi-zuzuna inoma putou nusokare puro osawa nukare wara te kaka wamu wai giro doro bozara dago dopamunowa awa.
49006014	Nikare ego ine dopewo: Ge me meni ipu gei nisokare wai diwo; saramuro nuai meni tama woi nisokare kapa meni wai ago ine wai wosuniro tipare zazanare doweu gi dumu zizae;
49006015	begara Oziga Ewanana awa puro baro tugata wamu sero sia wero dopeu. Ami te nisokarera su waise.
49006016	Are nikare nena awa dapikarago puro noise ei dai pumuwo: Tuma diai meni beri nisokare wai be giti puro noiwo. Puro dopinuawa wayara mama meni wiba niao dumune dapai awa nisokare nana kirinai dapikarago zizawa sikimamunora awa.
49006017	Tuara korawai awa hat aen meni wai ine pumuro wosuniwo. Ota Ozanara bogi waira kasiwa awa pumuwo. Bogi waira kasiwa awa Anutura ge awa.
49006018	Nikare be sero Ozanara putoura isa serota sero awinoise Tua zawa sewo. Ago inoise timara tepo uma inoise noiwo. Ota Tuara dubu nata sero nukare emo isa toise noiwo.
49006019	Ago wero na emo dai isa tuawa na ge samu wana Tua meni na soremuro ge nuso duba nasora potai, na zewai wero Oziga Ewanana bezai itisonua awa kereniro poti damu namunona awa.
49006020	Na Oziga Ewanana emo Tuara bua mai nowena ami benai sora itewena. Nikare na isa meni soremawa na azu tepo zewai wero ge awa kereniro poti damu nane. Ago wanise sai itia.
49006021	Nikare nuai nasora susu ata bua inowena awa kau wai azu, Tikikas meni nisokare nana muro ge uge wero tepo wai gamunowa. Nu gera otao nasokai ewanana ata Tuara bua mai ge dimaire.
49006022	Nune ge uge nasokare inoise kotumai ewanana nimorekare potaise iyetena susawia awa.
49006023	Anutu Mama ata Tua Yesu Kristo nuneto dubara dumire tuma diaire ata duba-ozai awa gera otao mamai naso nimorekare potariseto.
49006024	Tua nasokai Yesu Kristo awa yaba wai gege inowera amira nana Tuara dumi yagaba itaise.
50001001	Nato Pauloto Timotire, Yesu Kristora bua mai, ami nikare Filipai natara Kristo Yesura gegenai ema bama ata simaire giti kopire nowewa nimorekare pas ei awa potitinonato ewa.
50001002	Mama nasokai Anutu ata Tua Yesu Kristo nusoto nana ena dumi yagabare duba-ozaire semu nisokare nana niro itaise.
50001003	Na eyaya nikare kotupitinoise Anutu nasore kokopai asinowena awa.
50001004	Nikare Oziga Ewanana ninitinoise namorekare dai tairo bua i-tupewewa,
50001005	ami emo begomo towena awa te nikare dapikarago ami emo duba kokopai wawi Tuare kokopai asinowena.
50001006	Ago inoise ego ine gosinowena. Bua kokopai duba nisokarera zaawenua ami bua inoma pesunitinuai amire Yesu Kristo maira be nuso kei awamunoya.
50001007	Na nikare dapikarago ago gawena te inowia, nera kota, na benai sora enata damu ena Oziga Ewanana emo ge bua wawena nikare dapikarago na sorepitinoise soga inowewa. Are na duba naso meni nikare sipunitinowena awa.
50001008	Yesu Kristora duba nasokai nana zewai itewia, da ago ine duba naso nisokare nana zewai itewia, awa Anutu meni gosinoya.
50001009	Dubara dumi nisokare meni dubare kotumaire ninai nisokarere pumai zewai waise be giti begomo toise nowena awa.
50001010	Are nikare nena awina-dawina wero Yesu Kristora kei awai be awa kotupitinoise duba saramaire pasina amu noiwo.
50001011	Ago wawa Yesu Kristo meni nikare sogawai saramuro nuaira me zamaire awa tamuro Anutu bowi inoise zazo nuso de ike nawe.
50001012	Otao mamai naso, nikare ego gawise tona. Naso nana ena tani kei awisia awa Oziga Ewanana tepo waise kota, kei awero baitaise kei awisia awa.
50001013	Nera kota, na Kristo emo benai ema wero itena amira ge Sisara soldia ata ema eni nusokare nana dane toiro tepo wisia awa.
50001014	Are benai sora itena giro otao mamai nasokai eni bamu ami Tua kotupitinoise azu tepo peu wero Anutura ge towera awa.
50001015	Ema eni kotumai waya namore pupinoise namore wiza atata ge toise Kristora ge tugata inowera. Ata eni meni awa duba kokore towera awa.
50001016	Nukare towera, awa na ego itise Oziga Ewanana soga wanise sai, are namore dubara dumi pupinoise towera.
50001017	Ata eni meni awa opi toise zazo nusokare bamu waise puro wititinoise Kristora ge toise ego towera awa, “Nakai Paulora benai awa noko susupitinoise yaya nuso nana tame potanekai,” asero ago inowera.
50001018	Ata saineba, nukare tani neire-neire opita me ni, awa inoise Kristora ge sawera susawewia, are duba naso meni yawa sara inoya awa.
50001019	Na yawa sara wai gege inoise nuamunona. Nikare na emo begomo bua wawa Yesu Kristora Ozana meni na soremai nena emi namore yawa sara tamamunoya awa.
50001020	Agoro menai oko tamamunona, awa gosinona. Na zewai wero tupewena ago ine i-susawiamunona. Na nuamunonita betamunoni, awa saineba, tama aiso nasora ena Kristo bowi wamunora, awa gosinona.
50001021	Kristo meni nuai naso inowia. Betai meni nena bamubake namore tamamunoya.
50001022	Ata na zebura itise nuamunona, awa na buara me noko tamamunona. Are na nena nera peu wamunoni, asinoise itazaita inoise duba zazaupitinona awa.
50001023	Na zota zo awa eto dago yaba inona. Zebu doro baro Kristo tamuro numore dai nuai amira ara tamai naso meni awa bamubake.
50001024	Ata nikare popoiwo wai azu, na zebura nuana te wamunoya.
50001025	Agoro ego ine gosinona awa. Na nikare soremana tuma diai nisokare be mai yawa sarare dai nuawise na seka itise nimorekare dai nuamunona.
50001026	Are na nisokare nana noko muro nuana na emo inoise Yesu Kristo bowi wamunowa.
50001027	Nikare nuai nisokare kora wero Kristora Oziga Ewanana amira te noiwo. Nikare otao inoise duba da wero tairo gamuro awinoise Oziga Ewananara nuai ami emo zuzuna inoise noiwo muro gane. Ota na asike noise bowi nisokare ninane.
50001028	Ago inuawa iwo dubu nisokare meni putou nisokare oko puro osamunora. Ago wawa Anutu meni nukare dotinoise nikare soyamunoya amira susu kei damu nai gamunora.
50001029	Anutu meni Kristora dubu wawise nininua, awa nu tuma diawise gege kota, nu emo yayara tame dai nuawise nininua awa.
50001030	Na gita zuzuna wena giwa, noko zeme da ago wawena oziga naso ninitinowewa, zuzuna da ami nikare tapinowia awa.
50002001	Nisokare nana Kristo emo inoise ato-buato sai itita? Itia awa. Dubara dumire sero soga waire itita? Itia awa. Ozanare dara sipuniro tairo otao wero nuai awa itita? Itia awa. Zo waire zo amaire itita? Itia awa.
50002002	Are duba kokopai wai naso witiro itaise kotumai nisokare poti dara niwo. Ago inoise dubara dumi ina-pa wero nena da ami emo duba awa-uzinoise noiwo.
50002003	Nikare tama nisokare oko puro witawe. Noko tama puro witaira tani zo oko wawe. Nikare nitopekare puro osisinoise otao mamai nisokare puro witiwo.
50002004	Agoro nikare nena nisokare gege wawa kokopai waise gege kota, otao mamaira dai kokopai waise kotumuwo.
50002005	Kotumai Kristo Yesu meni puro noisonua, da awa puro noiwo.
50002006	Nu Anutu noisonua ami “Na Anutu ine nowena, ata na Anutu ine nuai awa oko soyamunona,” ago toise oko soenua.
50002007	Tepo awa. Nu nuai nuso dutuniro doro ema ine kei awero soumaira nuai pumunua awa. Ago wenu benau nuso giwa emara benau te wenua awa.
50002008	Nu ema osai wero noise ge dimaira ebata patiro susaumite betai tamunua. Betai tamunua, awa ni pasinaira ena betai awa tamunua awa.
50002009	Ago wenua, are Anutu meni numa puro witiro ema Tua bamubake potinua awa. Potiro zazo bowire nuso meni erama dapikaragora zazo bowire dainaise senua awa.
50002010	Tani ego ine ama kei awaise sero ago wenua awa. Utura nowera, o zebura nowera, o zebu tura nowera, nukare dapikarago ami Yesu bowi inoise bawa diro kokoinarise.
50002011	Agoro erama dapikarago meni “Yesu Kristo nu imata Tua noya,” ago sarise. Ago sara Anutu Mamera zazo bowire ike damu itaise.
50002012	Otao mamai naso, nikare be giti ge dimaire nowewa, awa na nimorekare dai nowena amire gege kota, asike nuawena wero baititinowewa. Are Anutu meni nikare kora wenua amira me tamamu wero giro nu azu inoise bua nuso zewai-zawai wewo.
50002013	Nera kota, Anutu nu nutope nikare gai kokopai wawise kotumaire waire amira putou nimorekare potitinowia awa.
50002014	-
50002015	Nikare ema dubu waya-kawaya amira soe noise Anutura mai awiso wero etutiro pasina amu duba saramaire nuamu kotumuro giro gung-ga saire ina-sa waire awa doro bua inoise noiwo. Nikare nusokare nana zebura noise
50002016	nuai potaira ge poti damu niro kuna ine zasipitinoise noiwo. Ago wawa amire noma Kristo kei awaira bera ena na yaya bamubake tepo oko tamuna, ata bua naso me amu oko wenua, amira susu kei awai yawa sara wane.
50002017	Nikare tuma diai nisokare awa zame ine Anuture potitinowewa, are nukare na dero orara naso dai zame nisokarera tame zozamunora, awa saineba, yawa sara wamunona. Ago wara na nimorekare dai yawa sara wamunona.
50002018	Da ago ine nikare yawa sara wewo. Nikare namore dai yawa sara wewo.
50002019	Tua Yesu meni ninai te wamunoya, awa na Timoti eya nisokare nana iyetana mamunoya. Awa ego emira. Nu muro nisokare nana ena ge bowi zo niniro ewesemuro na sai niniro duba naso kokopai waise sero iyetamu tona.
50002020	Ema zo nu ago ine namore dai oko noya. Nune imata ara tamai nuso doro nikare emo kotumu-katumu inoise nikare soga wamunoya awa.
50002021	Ema eni dapikarago awa nena nusokare gege kotupitinoise Yesu Kristora bua oko kotupitinowera.
50002022	Ata Timoti, nikare nuai nusora susu gosinowewa. Mai meni mama nuso sorepitinowia, ago ine nu na Oziga Ewananara buara sorepitinowia.
50002023	Are naso nana nena nemi nemi kei awamunoi, awa giro baitiro amire nu eya iyetana nisokare nana mamunoya awa.
50002024	Ota Tua meni ninai na natope eya nisokare nana dai mamu kotupitinona awa.
50002025	Na nena kau inoise nona giro nikare Epafodito iyetewa muro na sorepitinowia awa. Nu otao naso, o soremai naso, o Kristora bogi wai ema wero nowia. Ata na nu iyetana nisokare nana ewesemaise sai itia, are iyetitinona awa.
50002026	Nu yaya pumi bowi ninisewa. Ge nuso ninewa giro nu nikare emo kotumu-katumu inoise nikare emo towia.
50002027	Nu yaya mou-mau puro kapo betamu weti Anutu meni nu emo zo amuro kora wisia awa. Agoro nu gege kota, naso nana duba nai ture-tamere kei awai azu, Anutu na emo dai zo apisia.
50002028	Are nikare benau nuso noko giro duba kokopai waise, o na da ago kotumu-katumu tepo nuamu sero awita sero nu potena susawia awa.
50002029	Are nu nisokare nana kei awai nikare yawa sara bamu inoise Tua emo wero numa otao wewo. Nikare ema ago ine awa de ike niwo.
50002030	Nera kota, nu Kristora bua emo inoise kapo betamu wisia awa. Nu nikare sorepitinoise na soga inoise nuai nuso gera inoisia awa.
50003001	Otao mamai naso, zo sane. Tua emo inoise yawa sarare noiwo. Ge sai matu da awa noko gayamu inoise gena waya oko inoya. Ge ami nikare sogawai kokopai itamunowa. Ge awa ego ewa:
50003002	Nikare ema abu suna ine nowera awa uma inoise noiwo. Ge sisai ema opi inoise tama aiso kapinowera, nukare awa uma wewo.
50003003	Nera kota, nakai owe me puro nowenakai. Nakai Ozanara putoura Anutu bowi inowenakai, ata Kristo Yesure tairo noise yawa sara inowenakai. Nakai tamara nena oko tuma didinowenakai.
50003004	Na natope tamara nena tuma diamu sero wamena, awa te wamia. Ata ema eni nukare tamara nena tuma didinoise kokopai itamu samunora, awa na da ago tamara nena tuma didinoise nukare dainamunona.
50003005	Mia na pumunu itina waiko be 8 wenu tama aiso naso kapewa awa. Na Isreli ema dubura nana ena kei awena. Na Benzaminra sibuna. Na Yuda ema. Na Yuda emara nana ena kei awena awa. Na lo gera mama wero Farisayo ema noisona.
50003006	Na Anutura lo ge emo zewai-zawai inoise Yesura dubure iwo wena. Lo gera te etutiro noisona awa.
50003007	Ata na gita nena puro noise gina me wenua, nena awa ama Kristo emo gina puti wenua.
50003008	Awa gege kota, Tua naso Kristo Yesura susu giro baitai ami nena wero muna awa dainitinoya, asero nena awa dapikarago gawena puti inowia. Na Kristo ziro baitamu sero nu emo nena dapikarago gina gau wenu giro dona awa.
50003009	Na nuso nana desenitinoise nuamu tona. Na lo ge dipinoise pasina amu nuai awa kota, Kristo tuma didinoise pasina amu nuai awa yaba inona. Tuma diaire nuana Anutu meni pasina naso gai tepo waise tona awa.
50003010	Na Kristo giro baitamu towena. Erai nusora putou dai giro baitamu towena. Yaya tamunua amira susumuro numore dai tamamu towena. Kotumai puro betenua, kotumai da awa puro nuamu tona.
50003011	Ago inoise susauma betaira ena seka wero erai awa tamamu sero yaba inona awa.
50003012	Na natope ego oko tona: Na eya sumuro tanira kei awero simai awa tamuro saramai nowena. Ata Yesu Kristo meni na pumunua, are simai pamu sero sumai awa supinowena.
50003013	-
50003014	Otao mamai naso, nane meni awa simai tamuna ago oko towena. Ego ine gege inowena: Nena gutipe itia, awa nuwenitinoise nena simai gita itia awa pumamu sero wana uzuzu inoise saibore supinowena. Simai awa ego ewa: Anutu meni senu Yesu Kristo nakai uzu utura nitinowia.
50003015	Kotumai naso ago ine itia, are nakai kotumai zewaire nowenakai ami da ago ine kotupitinoise nuanekai. Ota kotumai ewe zo puro nuamunowa, awa Anutu meni waya nisokare awa nimorekare kerenai giro baitamunowa.
50003016	Are ebata patiro munakai da awa patiro bayanekai.
50003017	Otao mamai naso, nikare dapikarago tani naso awa giro da ago ine inoise noiwo. Ema eni na ine nowera awa gosinoise noiwo.
50003018	Ema enira susu nikare tugata wero tupewena da awa noko di toise duba naire tugata wane. Ema witai ami Kristora ni pasinai amira iwo inoise nowera.
50003019	Ema awa nukare dega niaore amira gegenai itamunora awa. Tini-wama nusokare gawera tua nusokare inowia. Ota nena menaire nusokare awa binare-bowire inowera. Ota zebura nena meni dubare kotumaire nusokare topetiro tepo inowia.
50003020	Nakai awa utu natara gegenai. Are Soyai Ema nasokai Tua Yesu Kristo meni utura ena osero nakai paise dia nowenakai awa.
50003021	Nu emare nena bamubamure dago puro osero nuso nana tera dubu daira putou awa nuso nana itewia awa. Putou ami tama nasokai simai tepore awa puro kapetenai tama nuso ine simaire wamunonakai awa.
50004001	Otao mamai, na nikare emo zo bamu inowia. Duba naso nisokare nana bamubake itewia. Nikare awa giti simaira nena naso ata duba koko wai naso. Nikare Tuara nana deseniro zewai wero baitiwo.
50004002	Bama eto Yuodiato Sintikere kapero nowerato ami Tua emo inoise duba da wero nuariseto tona awa.
50004003	O soga wai naso me, ni bama eto awa kora wasise tona. Nera kota, nuto ata Kelemen ata otao mamai eni nukare Oziga Ewananara bua amira na soremuwa. Are zazo nusokare nuai me ewanana amira bukura gayai itera awa.
50004004	Nikare Tua emo inoise yawa sara inoise noiwo. Na noko sane. Yawa sara wewo.
50004005	Ema dapikarago ami awa-diai nisokare garise. Tuara kei awai be zora awinoya.
50004006	Are nena zota zo emo kotumu-katumu oko wawe. Duba nisokare meni nena ne kotupitinowi, awa Tuare kereniro isare begomore toise kokopai susumuro toise noiwo.
50004007	Ago wawa duba-ozai Anutu meni tapinowia, duba-ozai emara kotumai dainitinowia, ami dubare kotumaire nisokare poti dara niro uma inuai dubare kotumaire nisokare meni Kristo Yesura nana zewai wero itamunoya awa.
50004008	Otao mamai, ge zo susumuro sane. Nena mere, nena daimatare, nena sonaire, nena saramaire, nena gai ziri waire, nena ninai ewanana waire, nena koko-kakopaire, nena giro bowi waire, nena awa dapikarago be giti kotupitinoise noiwo.
50004009	Na nena sero tugata wero sero gipero awena giro baitiwa, da awa inoise noiwo. Ago inuawa Anutu duba-ozaira mama meni nimorekare dai nuamunoya awa. Filipai ema meni tamara nena Paulore potiwa nu yawa sara wenua.
50004010	Nikare na soremamu kotumuwa te kaka wamu wenu giro dowa. Ago wero nomite noko na kotumuro dumi pumai nisokarera na kora wisewa, amira gena Tuara nana bami yawa sara bamubake inona. Nikare na kotumai awa kotupitinoisowa, ata daimata, ebata gege kau inoisowa awa.
50004011	Na bogamasa nowena amira oko tona. Tani neire-neire naso nana kei awawi nena tepo noise oko duba ninowena.
50004012	Na osai bogamasa nuaita zamaire nuai amira susu awa eto dago gosinona. Na nogo nogo nuai — nai denaire nuaita, meri waire nuai, o zimena-zamenara tame nuaita, dora botiyora tame nuai — amira susu dai gosinona awa.
50004013	Are Kristo meni putou namore potawi zewai inowena amira putou meni na nena bamubamu wawena te inowia awa.
50004014	Nikare na duba naire nona giro namore tairo na kora wisewa, awa gena kokopai inoya.
50004015	Filipai natara ema bama, nikare ninitinowa. Na Oziga Ewanana emo bua zaawaira bera ena Masedonia zebu dona be amira ana Yesura dubu eni meni tepo noiwa nikare imata namore dai nena ina-pota wenakai awa.
50004016	Na Tesalonika nate noina be amire dai nikare tamara nena meni na soga inoise noisowa awa.
50004017	Na wau moni pumamu oko tona. Tepo awa. Moni pasbukura itia amira susumai moni kei awero moni bamubake inowia, da ago ine bua nisokarera me meni Anutura benaura bamubake waise tona awa.
50004018	Are nena na pupisena awa dainiro itia. Nena namore potisewa awa Epafodito meni nisokare nana ena puro muro poti pupisena, are zamaire wero nowena awa. Nikare namore nena potisewa awa gena zame kokopai zamare Anuture potitinowera ago ine wisia awa. Anutu meni zame ago ine awa gawi ziri inowia.
50004019	Anutu naso nu zamai tamai meni Kristo Yesu emo nikare soga wero nena kau inowewa awa te potamunoya.
50004020	Anutu Mama nasokaira bowi meni itai gege itaise. Iyo.
50004021	Na Kristo Yesura ema bama dapikarago arenitinona, awa seu gare. Ata otao mamai naso namore dai nowera ami da ago ine nikare arenitinora.
50004022	Yesura ema bama dapikarago ami nikare arenitinora. O Sisara ema dubu ami nikare arenitinora, awa gawise sero zewai-zawai inora.
50004023	Tua Yesu Kristora dumi yagaba meni nisokare nana itaise. Iyo.
51001001	Na Paulo. Anutu meni ara tamai nusora na Yesu Kristora aposolo potinu nowena. Nato otao nasokai Timoti
51001002	nato Kolosai nate ena Tuara dubu gera otao mamai nasoto Kristore dai susumuro nowewa nimorekare pas ei awa potitinonato. Anutu Mama nasokaira nana ena sogawaire duba ewananare meni semu nisokare nana niro itaise.
51001003	-
51001008	Oziga Ewanana awa ge me susure awa, are ge ami nisokare nana kei awenu nikare niniro Anutura sogawai amira susu giwa me wenua awa. Be amira ana zaawero Oziga Ewanana ami nisokare nana ena zamawi me kei awi-susawewia. Agoro nisokare nana ena daba kota, zebu sero ena ago inowia. Ge ami nena Anutu meni nimorekare potamu seroninu utura itewia amira susu kereninu giro nikare Kristo Yesu tuma didinoise gera otao mamai dapikarago emo dubara dumi pupinowewa. Oziga Ewanana awa otao soremai koko nasoto Epafara Kristora soumai ge dimaire nune ami gipenu giwa awa. Ago wero nu da ami Ozana meni nisokare nana dubara dumi tamunua amira ge uge namoreto wisia awa. Are nato ge nisokare ago ine niniro nikare emo isa toise Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora Mama Anutu amire kokopai towenato awa.
51001009	Are nato ge uge nisokare niniro amire zaawero nikare dubare kotumaire meni Anutura ara tamai ninawise, o kotumaire ninaire Ozana meni tapinowia awa nisokare nana be maise isa si-tupewenato awa.
51001010	Tua meni nimorekare ago wai amire Tuara ebata nuanisekai sai amira te nuamunowa. Ago nuawa Tua meni gai ewanana wamunoya awa. Ota gera bua koko neire-neire itia, awa inoise amira me tamamunowa. Ago inoise Anutura susu niniro susawise nuamunowa awa.
51001011	Nato nikare emo isa toise Anutura putou bamubake ami nikare ziai dopero putou bamu pumuro nuawa nisokare nana tame nena mou-mau witai nikare beyata tepo zewai wawise isa towenato. Nikare zewai wero wama nisokare duawa orenai dimuro dopinoise yawa sara wawise isa towenato awa.
51001012	Mama nasokai nu ike zasimaira ena nena namorekai potamu sero potinu itewia, awa dubu nuso meni topetanisekai sero kora wenu te wenakai, are nu bowi wawise sero isa towenato.
51001013	Anutu nu nakai mumera mama amira putoura ena soero pumuro Mai bou nusora putoura potinua.
51001014	Mai nuso ami nakai pasinara putoura ena besenua awa. Awa pasina nasokai disenua awa.
51001015	Kristo awa Anutu bezai amira ititi awa. Nu nena bamubamu kaka kei awamure gita wero noisonua. Are nu nena bamubamu amira giti kopi wero nowia.
51001016	Wai nusora nena bamubamu utura ata zebura kei awero tepo wenua — nena gaire kaka gamure, angelo witaire osaire — awa dago putou nusora ata gegenai nuso ago kei awai awa.
51001017	Nena bamubamu awa kaka kei awamure nu noisonua nowia. Nena bamubamu awa putou nusora itise tupewia awa.
51001018	Nu dubu nuso amira giti kopi wero nowia awa. Dubu nuso awa te-wana tama ipu nuso awa. Nu dubu nusora susu awa. Nu betaira ena gita wero erinua. Ago inoise nena bamubamu amira giti kopi wenua.
51001019	Anutu nu nuaire putoure nuso awa Mai nuso nana bemuro itaise nininu te wenua.
51001020	Ago wero nena bamubamu utura ata zebura awa Mai nusora buara numore dai otao-gamao warise sero senu Mai nuso ni pasinaira orara nuso meni bega tamunua, are Anuture otao wewa awa.
51001021	Nikare gita me gita Anutura nana asike noise tani waya-kawaya neire-neire inoise nu iwo wero noisowa awa.
51001022	Are Kristo tama aiso puro kei awero betai nuso meni nikare Anuture dai dara potinu otao wero nowewa. Nu nikare puro poti Anutura nana benaura nai duba saramai ata ge tepo o pasina tepo kei awawise ago wenua awa.
51001023	Are nikare Oziga Ewanana niniro tuma diwa, tuma diai awa besai azu, ziro tata-tata inoise zewai wero dopinoise beyata oko wawe. Oziga Ewanana awa ema sero ata zebu sero bamisia awa. Na Paulo, na amira bua mai nowena awa.
51001024	Na nikare emo yaya-buyaya tame noise yawa sara inona. Kristora dubu awa te-wana tama ipu nuso awa. Are nu dubu nuso emo wero yaya-buyaya tamunu, yaya amira agewa awa kaka tepo wamu dago itewia, are na tama aiso naso meni yaya agewa awa dimuro pesunitinona.
51001025	Anutu meni nikare emo na Yesura dubu amira bua mai potinu nowena. Na ge nuso sero gipero awinoise kereniro baitanise senua awa.
51001026	Ge sero gipero awinowena awa bui nuso awa. Gita ge amira susu awa bezai itasai kaka ninirota niniro awamu tepo noisowa awa. Are be zeme emire nu ema dubu nuso namorekai kereninua awa.
51001027	Bui nuso ami woi keero ema Yudakora nana zapinoise bamu kei awinoya, awa Anutu meni ge ema dubu nusore sero kerenitinoya. Buira susu ego ewa: Kristo duba nisokarera nowia, are nikare Anutura simai zasimaire topetamunowa.
51001028	Are nakare Kristora susu kereniro toise ema dapikarago tugata inowenakare. Ago inoise potai ge potitinoise ninai bamure inoise ema dapikarago sero gipero awinowenakare. Awa ema dapikarago Kristora nana susumuro ema me wawa amire nuso nana dubu damu sero ago inowenakare.
51001029	Putou nuso meni na soga wawi amire bua awa putou bamure zewai-zawai wero inowena awa.
51002001	Na sana niniu. Nikare ata Leodisia natara ata ema eni benau naso kaka gamu inowera na nikare emo bua bamubake inowena.
51002002	Nikare dubara dumi ina-puma inoise duba da wero zewai wero nuawise bua bamubake inowena. Anutura bui niniro baitai awa wau me awa. Are nikare wau awa puro nuawise bua bamubake inowena. Anutura bui awa Kristo awa.
51002003	Nuso nana niniro baitaire kotumai bamubake awa dapikarago be muro bezai itia.
51002004	Zo meni nikare uzutiro duba siso-siso wai azu, ge awa tona awa.
51002005	Na tama naso meni nisokare nana zora-zarako nowena, ota duba naso meni awa nimorekare noise nikare Kristo tuma didinoise toto gagatiro sima waira dopinowa giro duba naso ewanana inoya awa.
51002006	Nikare Kristo Yesu meni Tua nisokare waise pumuwa, are nuso nana tairo noiwo.
51002007	Ago inoise nuso nana tatawi potiro amire kei awero baitamunowa awa. Ota tuma diaira eba nikare sero gipero awenakare da awa patitinoise zewai wewo. Ago inoise Anutu bowi wai awa nisokare nana bemuro zapinuai nuawe.
51002008	Zo meni emara nana bera etetenai ge awa toise duba nisokare sisai azu, uma wero baitiu. Ge ago ine awa Kristora nana ena oko tupewia. Ge awa apipie ewowo-kawowora ge gege, o zebura biruta bi amira nana ena mawi towera awa.
51002009	Ge opi nusokare awa uma wero baitawise tona. Nikare Yesura ema me wero baitawise tona. Nera kota, Anutura susu bamubamu awa te Kristora nana bemuro itia.
51002010	Nune angelo giti kopire witaire bamubamu amira zawitimai awa. Are Anutu meni nikare nuso nana susumunu nikare nuai me topetiwa.
51002011	Nuso nana susumuro owe pumuwa, awa wana meni tamara owe wai awa kota, nuai nisokare matu awa Anutu meni dutuniro doro nuai seka wosuninu pumuro Kristora owere wewa awa.
51002012	Amire wawise ge ou gutewa betai nusore gowai nusore amira susumuwa.
51002013	Nikare ema Yudako meni gita tamara owe tepo noise pasina tebe-tabe inoisowa, ami nuai me tepo ema betai ine wero noisowa awa. Ago noe dowa Anutu nu pasina nasokai doro nikare Kristore dai awa-uzenu seka wewa awa.
51002014	Lo ge dai nasokai papiara gayai ami nakai gera potitinoise ge bua wanisekai toisonua awa Yesu ni pasinaira betinoinu Anutu meni papia awa keenu tepo wenua awa.
51002015	Ago inoise angelo wayare biruta bire amira putou nusokare awa ni pasinai meni puro osero baitiro susu nusokare poti damu ninua. Ago inoise iwora ge meni iwo eni mui wero isipitinowera ago ine nu nukare mui wero puro aita inoise ema bama benaura ena isimunua awa.
51002016	Susu ago ine itia, are ema zo meni wore mare sienaita ota zepara purata inuara purata Sandera pura amira sienai ge kaka dimamu wawa nikare senai oko ninawe.
51002017	Nena ago ine awa etete wai gege awa. Nena me ama kei awamu inoinua amira etete wai nuso daba ami gita munua awa. Ota me meni awa Kristo nana ena kei awenua itia ewa.
51002018	Ema eni meni duba nusokare puro osero angelo bowi waira yaba inowera ami nikare puro osamu sero ego sara oko ninawe: “Nakare atua wero nena me susure gosinowenakare, are nakare nikare dainiro ema bamu wero nowenakare.” Ema ago ine ami nuai matura kotumai puro noise tama nusokare tepo puro wititinowera.
51002019	Nukare ami giti kopi nasokai Kristo awa oko ziro baititinowera. Nu awa giti kopi nasokai, ota nanekai meni awa te-wana tama ipu nuso. Are giti kopi ami te-wana tama ipu awa dia wawi amire te-wana tama ipu zewai inowia awa. Umure wuwurare meni te-wana tama ipu awa susumuro poti dara nawi amire Anutu nininua te baziro zewai waire putoure kei awinowia awa.
51002020	Nikare Kristora betai amira susupitinoise numore dai betago wero zebura biruta bi amira mui kapewa tepo wenua. Awa nogoro amire zebura nata mera noise meni wago inowewi? Nikare nogoro potai ge ego ine dipinowewi?
51002021	“Oko ziase! Oko niro gase! Oko kimase!”
51002022	Potai ge ami zebura nena puro nuawenakai eya tepo inowia amire gege toya. Potai ge awa emara kotumai meni sero gipero awinowera awa.
51002023	Potai ge ago ine awa soga wai bamu asero ema bama meni gawera me ine inowia awa. Bowi waira awa-uzaita sienaira noise tama aiso puro osai amira ge soga inowia asinowera, ata tepo awa. Potai ge ago ine ami nuai matura duba-duba wai awa gazai ine tepo awa.
51003001	Nikare Anutu meni Kristore dai betaira ena awa-uzenu eriro nuai me pumuwa awa. Ami emo nuai mera nena utura itia awa pumamu zewai inoise noiwo. Utura ena Kristo meni Tua wero Anutura nana wana mera arumuro itewia.
51003002	Dubare kotumaire nisokare awa nena zebura itia amira kota, nena ike itia amira potiu itae.
51003003	Nikare betewa ago ine inoya. Ata nuai nisokare seka awa damu-damuke oko itia. Kristo nu nuai nuso seka awa Anutura nana ena pupinowia da ago ine nikare nuai nisokare seka awa Kristora nana ena pupinowewa awa.
51003004	Noma Kristo nu nuaira mama nasokai meni kei damu nai amire nikare da ago ine numore dai simai zasimaire nusora kei damu namunowa awa.
51003005	Are zebura nuai matu amira duba-duba wai eure-taure nisokare nana awa musuniu tepo-tapo ware. Pasina ego ine emire tona awa: Bama bewana wai, tani waya wai, tamara duba-duba waya wai, nena waya emo duba witai, wau emo duba-duba wai. Wau emo duba-duba wai awa pasina tua opi bowi wai ago ine awa.
51003006	Pasina bamubamu ami emo Anutura nana ena ge dai emara nana ina kei awamunoya.
51003007	Nikare da ago ine gita noise pasina inoise noisowa awa.
51003008	Ata zeme meni awa pasina ego ewa dapikarago doro baitiwo: Be dumu wai, tini kapai, ge busai, ema zora zazo puro osai, ge waya-kawaya sai. Pasina ago ine awa dago doro tepo wewo.
51003009	-
51003010	Nikare nuai matu nisokarere tani-butani mamatu awa tama woi aso ine dutuniro doro nuai seka nisokare tama woi seka ine wosuniro puro nowewa, are opi ina-sa wai awa oko wawe. Nuai seka awa Anutu meni tamunua awa. Ago wero nakai susu nuso giro baitiro nu ine wanisekai nuai seka awa kora inowia awa.
51003011	Nakai nuai seka puro nowenakai, are zaumuro nuai awa tepo wenua awa. Ema Yudako ata Yuda ema, o ema owere ata owe tepore, o ewa ema ata ware ema, o sou wai ema ata ema mui amu. Ema susu giti awa Kristo meni nakai bamu dago te wero giti kopi nasokai wero nasokai nana nowia awa.
51003012	Nikare awa Anutura gegenai dubu awa. Nu nutope nimorekare dubara dumi pupinoise dubu nuso wawise siana-katana wero pumunua awa. Are nikare tani ego ewa tama woi seka ine wosuniro noiwo: Awa-diaire, dumi yagaba pumaire, duba puro osaire, wama-ozaire, ina-da wai tepore.
51003013	Nimorekare waya wara ina ge oko sawe. Ota nisokare nana soe ena ge kei awai giro ge awa dowo tepo wae. Tua meni pasina nisokare donua da ago ine pasina ina-dua wewo.
51003014	Ago wero nena bamubamu amira tame dubara dumi puro nuawa ami tani ewa-gaewa awa poti dara nai ewanana wamunoya awa.
51003015	Nikare begare duba-ozaire Kristo meni puro munua awa puro nuawise Anutu meni nikare zawa sero poti dara ninu te-wana tama ipu da ine wero nowewa awa. Are begare duba-ozaire ami refri ine wero duba nisokare dia waise. Nikare kokopai Anuture toise noiwo.
51003016	Kristora ge meni nisokare nana soe ena zamaise. Nikare kotumai bamure noise ge ina-gipa wero ina-sorema wewo. Ago wero Anuture kokopai toise yere eure taure — Samta yereta koka Ozana meni nimorekare potitinowia — yere awa bere kotumaire meni gapinoise noiwo.
51003017	Nikare ge menita wana meni nena wamu wero giro awa Tua Yesura nana ereniro amire wewo. Ago inoise Anutu Mamere kokopai toise noiwo.
51003018	O bama mamai, nikare ibana nisokarera ge dipinoise noiwo. Tuara gegenai sai meni ago wawa te wamunoya.
51003019	O ema mamai, nikare asini nisokare emo dubara dumi pumuwo. Tini gamai numorekare oko wawe.
51003020	O mai bama dirire matere, nikare mia mama ge sara te dimuwo. Ago wawa Tua meni gai ewanana wamunoya.
51003021	O mamana, mai awiso nisokare iwoka wai azu, nikare wama nusokare oko ziawe.
51003022	O soumai, nikare zebura ema tua nisokarera ge dimuro baitiwo. Nukare nikare ua inuara be amire gege bua oko wawe. Uzutai ema inowera ago ine oko wawe. Nikare Tua nasokai azu inoise duba opi sai tepo meni nukare sou wewo.
51003023	Bua nisokare bamubamu awa erama emo kota, Tua emo wero duba peure ziwo.
51003024	Sou bua nusokare inoise ego kotumuwo: Nikare Tua Kristo sou inowewa, are nu nena dubu nusore potamu sero sianiro potinu itewia, awa bua nisokarera ina waise nimorekare dai potamunoya awa.
51003025	Zo nu bua nuso wai waya wamunoya, awa ina da ago ine waya pumamunoya. Nera kota, nakai Anutu uzutai ninai ine tepo.
51004001	Ema tua, nikare soumai nisokare te kora wero baitiro wewo. Nera kota, Tua nisokare utura noise nikare ua inowia, awa gosinowewa.
51004002	Nikare zewai wero isa toise noiwo. Duba sekare isa toise kokopai Anuture toise noiwo.
51004003	Ago wero nakare emo dai isa sawa Anutu meni ebata nasokare tamai Kristora Oziga Ewanana kerenanekare. Ge amira mui waira itewena ewa.
51004004	Isa meni na soremawa na ge awa kere damu niro sana te wae.
51004005	Digare dai ina-tama wero saitiro kotumaire noiwo. Ago inoise buara be oko dainawe.
51004006	Ge nisokare awa nena moka ine wai amire toise noiwo. Ago wero emara ge egota ago kapetenamu sero oko kau wamunowa.
51004007	Ge uge naso awa Tikikas meni nimorekare wamunoya. Nu mai bou gera otao soremai ge dimaire, ata Tuara bua mai awa.
51004008	Nu ami nuai nasokarera ge uge inoise nikare ziai dopawise nisokare nana potena susawia awa.
51004009	Onesimo meni numore dai susawia. Nu ge ninai otao nasokai ewanana ata nisokare nana natara zo. Nuto nena nasokare nana kei awisia amira ge uge sero tepo warato gamunowa awa.
51004010	-
51004011	Benai ema otao naso Aristako, ata Banabara iba mata Mak, ata Yesu zazo nuso zo Zastas, nukare nikare arenitinora. Mak awa nu amire ge gita ego sena giwa: “Baro nisokare nana kei awai giro otao wewo.” Yudara dubura ena kei awai amira nana nukare etorobara ami gege Anutura buara na sorepitinowera. Ago inoise duba ewanana namore potitinowera awa.
51004012	Nisokare nana natara ema zo Epafara, Kristora bua mai, ami nikare arenitinoya. Nu nikare emo isa toise nikare zewai wero Anutura bera ge te dipinoise ara tamai nuso giro baitiro wawise be giti isa meni nikare sorepitinowia awa.
51004013	Na susu nuso gosinona. Nu nikare ata Leodisia natara ata Hirapolis natara nikare dapikarago ami emo bua pei oko inowia.
51004014	Luka dokta nasokare ewanana ata Dimas nuto ami nikare arenitinorato.
51004015	Na gera otao naso Leodisia nate nowera ata bama Nimfa, ata Yesura dubu nuso nana ena aunitinowera nukare awa arenitinona, awa seu gare.
51004016	Pas ei awa azimawa ema bama niniro tepo wara amire potawa bamu Leodisia nate nai dubu omi azimamunora awa. Ota pas zo gaero numorekare potisena awa da ago nimorekare potarise azimawe.
51004017	Nikare Akipo nu ego tugata wewo ninae: “Tuara bua nimore potai awa kora-kara wero pesuniyo. Agewa zo oko duase.”
51004018	Na natope zazo nasora owe ei awa wana naso meni gainona ewa: Na Paulo. Benai ema namore kotumuwo. Tuara sogawai meni nisokare nana itaise.
52001001	Na Paulo ata Siluanoto Timotire ami nikare Tesalonika nata ge ninai dubu amire pas ei awa gainonakare awa. Nikare Anutu Mama ata Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora ema dubu wero nowewa. Dumi yagabare duba-ozaire nisokare nana itaise.
52001002	Nakare be giti nikare emo inoise Anuture kokopai asinowenakare awa. Ago inoise isa saira bera ena nikare dapikarago ami emo isa towenakare awa.
52001003	Tuma diai nisokare meni wawi bua me inowewa. Ota dubara dumi pai amira bua inowewa. Ota Tua nasokai Yesu Kristo be giti tuma didinoise zewai inowewa. Are duba nasokare meni Anutu Mama nasokaira benaura tani awa eyaya kotumuro numore towenakare awa.
52001004	Otao mamai, nikare Anutura wama. Nakare ego gosinonakare: Anutu meni nimorekare dubara dumi pupinoise nikare sianiro pumunua awa.
52001005	Ago gosinonakare, nera kota, nakare Oziga Ewanana puro muro ge meni daba kota, putoure Ozanare duba peure senakare awa. Be nakare nisokare nana noisonakare amire nakare nikare emo wero tani eni wasanakare gosinoisowa awa.
52001006	Giro nikare nakare ama ganinoisowa. Nakare ama ganinoise Tua dai ama ganinoise noisowa nowewa. Ago inoise utura ge awa puro poti dube nasawa eni meni nikare iwo wasara duba nitinoise Ozanara yawa sara wai amire noisowa awa.
52001007	Nikare ago inoise Masedonia ata Akaya zebura ge ninai dubu amira gita wai wero susu gipewa awa.
52001008	Nisokare nana ena Tuara ge meni te wero susawise Masedonia ata Akaya zebura kei awenua. Awa gege kota, nikare Anutu tuma diwa amira oziga awa nata sero bamunu niniro tepo wewa, are nanekare oziga awa noko sai ine tepo.
52001009	Nukare nutopekare nisokare nana bua wenakare me wenua amira ge towera awa. Ago wero nikare tua opi poti gutipe niro Tua me nuaire amira nana baro nu sou inowewa, ago towera awa.
52001010	Ago toise nikare Anutura Mai utura ena osai gamu sia wero itewewa, ago towera awa. Nu betenu Anutu meni betaira ena awa-uzenu erinua. Na Yesure tona. Nune ami be Anutu meni nakai awina-dawina wero ina potamunoya be amire nakai Anutura tini kapaira ena soyamunoya.
52002001	Otao mamai naso, nisokare nana kei awero bua wenakare me tepo oko wenua amira awa nikakare nitopekare gosinowa awa.
52002002	Gita nakare nisokare nana kaka kei awamure Filipai nate ena nakare dero isimuwa awa ninitinowewa. Ago wewa, ata saineba, oko betata wenakare. Tepo awa. Tua nasokai nana dowenakare namorekare kotumai tamunu peu wero nisokare nana muro yaya tapinoise Anutura Oziga Ewanana awa sero kereninakare awa.
52002003	Uzumaira ge senakare amira susu awa opi saira ena oko itia. Nikare pasina wawise oko senakare. Nikare etete namu oko wenakare.
52002004	Anutu meni nakare ginu te wenu giro Oziga Ewanana sero sero awanisekare senua te towenakare awa. Ema meni nakare gara ewanana wamu amira kota, Anutu nu duba gaira mama meni nakare gai ewanana wamu amira gege towenakare.
52002005	Nikare nakare gosinowewa. Nakare uzutai ge zo nimorekare oko senakare. Ota utura gera koiniro wau moni emo zo oko wenakare, awa Anutu ninitinoi amire tona.
52002006	Nikareta ema eni meni nakare bowi wawise oko senakare. Nakare Kristora aposolo nowenakare, are nakare nisokare nana ena ema babezinoma wero itise nikare pena-pana doinoise kora wanakare te wamia. Ata saineba, ago oko wenakare.
52002007	Tepo awa. Mia zo meni mai nuso zo kora inowia ago ine nakare nisokare nana saitiro noisonakare awa.
52002008	Dubara dumi nasokare meni nisokare nana itisonua, are Anutura Oziga Ewanana nimorekare tugata wai awa gege kota, nikare emo wero nuai nasokare sisai amira dai peu wenakare. Awa duba nasokare meni nikare emo wenua are ago wenakare awa.
52002009	Otao mamai, nakare be izanakare nikare biawa wai azu, pi waiko tamara bua dai niaore mena-mana inoise dopenakare awa. Ago inoisekare Anutura Oziga Ewanana nimorekare senakare, awa nikare kotupitinowewita?
52002010	Nakare damu-damuke saramai pasina amu noise ge ninai dubu nikare emo tani eni wenakare awa. Amira nikare ata Anutu ami susu nasokare ninitinowewa awa.
52002011	Ago wero ego ine gosinowewa awa. Mama zo meni mai awiso nusore inowia ago ine nanekare nikare emo da ago wenakare awa. Nakare nikare da da amire potai gere awita sai gere awa toisonakare. Ota ego toise nimorekare senakare awa:
52002012	Anutu meni nata nusore simai nusore amira mama wawise sero nikare zawa towia, are nuai nusora te noiwo.
52002013	Nakare Anutura ge senakare niniwa emara ge ine oko wenua. Ge awa Anutura ge me asero puro poti dube niwa. Ge awa Anutura ge me awa. Ge awa ge ninai dubu nisokare nana bua inowia. Are nakare ami emo be giti Anuture kokopai asero nu bowi inowenakare awa.
52002014	Otao mamai naso, Anutura dubu Kristo Yesura zazo ninitinoise Yudaya zebura nowera ago ine nikare awa. Numorekare wewa da ago ine nimorekare wewa. Nukare Yuda ema meni dewa tama yaya tamuwa, da ago ine otao mamai nisokare eni meni nikare dewa tama yaya tamuwa awa.
52002015	Yuda ema nukare Tua Yesu ata porofete dewa betewa awa. Ago wero nakare dai dero tunero awewa. Nukare ema dubu giti awa iwo inoise nowera awa. Ago wawera Anutu meni nukare gawi waya inowia awa.
52002016	Ago wero ema Yudakore ge sanakare ninara Anutu meni korawai azu, ebata nasokare gazamu inowera awa. Nukare ago werota wero awinoise waya witai me witai inoe dowa pasina nusokare meni daininu giro Anutura tini kapai nusokare nana kei awenua awa.
52002017	Otao mamai, nakare nikare donakare, ata duba meni oko donakare. Tama meni gege donakare awa. Be pei-kaka poiwo ine wero noe benau nisokare noko gamu yaba inoise noko tera nisokare nana bayamu inoisenakare.
52002018	Are muro nikare gamu sisenakare awa. Paulo na natope eyaya mamu wasana Satan meni na ebata gazinoisia.
52002019	Nikare gamu ara tapinowenakare awa ego emira. Tua nasokai Yesu kei awamunoya be amire nena nemi bua nasokarera me, o yawa sara nasokare, o simai nasokare wamunoi? Ninekare ami wamunowa.
52002020	Are nikare ami zazo bowire nasokare, noko yawa sara wai nasokare wamunowa.
52003001	Na nikare emo duba naso meni ara tapinoe giro saineba asero na imata Atens nate noise
52003002	Timoti potena nisokare nana bamisia. Nu otao nasokai. Nu Anutura bua mai noise Kristora Oziga Ewanana towia ami nisokare nana bamuro tuma diai nisokare emo nikare soremai zewai wawise iyetena bamisia.
52003003	Nikare dirina tame noise beyata wai azu, ago wisena. Nikare ninitinowa. Nakai awa dirina tame nuanisekai sai.
52003004	Are nakare gita nisokare nana soe noise ge ego senakare awa, “Nakai yaya tamanisekai sai itia.” Are ge awa me wenua, awa ninitinowa awa.
52003005	Are etetenaira mama meni nikare puro osesi bua nasora me tepo inoita asero duba naso meni kotumu-katumu bamu wero giro ema ami tuma diai nisokarera susu gaise sesena bamisia awa.
52003006	Are Timoti ewesemuro tuma diaire dubara dumi pumai nisokare amira oziga kokopai sisia awa. Ago wero nikare nakare kotupitinowewa amire nakare nikare gamu sawenakare nikare da ago ine nakare gamu towewa, ge awa dapikarago namorekare sero tepo wisia awa.
52003007	Otao mamai, dirinare moka yayare meni nakare puro osero baitinu noe donakare tuma diai nisokarera ge awa puro muro sesi ge ami duba nasokare kora weti ewanana wero baitisia awa.
52003008	Nikare Tuara nana ereniro zewai inowewa awa gosinoise duba nasokare peu inoya awa.
52003009	Nakare nikare emo wero Anutu nasokaira nana benaura yawa sara bamu inowenakare, are nakare Anuture kokopai nogo nogo sanakare te wamunoi?
52003010	Nakare nisokare nana muro ina-ga wero ge eni itera awa susumanakare tuma diai nisokare zewai waise sero pi waiko nu zawa sero begomo towenakare awa.
52003011	Mama nasokai Anutu ata Tua nasokai Yesu nu nutope ebata wai amire nisokare nana mamunonakare.
52003012	Nisokare nana awa Tua meni dubara dumi nisokare awa-uzai eriro dopai ema enire o nitopekare dubara dumi ina-puma wewo. Nanekare nimorekare inowenakare da ago ine wewo.
52003013	Ago wawa Anutu meni duba nisokare ziai zewai wai Tua nasokai Yesu saramai dubu nusore kei awai amire nikare Mama nasokai Anutu amira benaura pasina tepo saramai dopamunowa awa.
52004001	Otao mamai naso, na Tua Yesu emo wero nikare ge potitinoise ge osino zo ego ine sana niniu. Utura gera nuaire waire nisokare meni Anutu otao waise susu sero gipero awenakare, da amira gege kokopai nowewa. Ata nuai awa zewai-zawai wero nuawise tonakare awa.
52004002	Tua Yesura bera potai ge sero gatero awenakare awa oko kau inowewa.
52004003	Anutu nu ego ine towia awa, “Duba saramaire noiwo.” Saramaire nuai awa ego ewa: Kuma wai duawise.
52004004	Nisokare nana mai seka zo duba saramaire gai ewanana waire ami bama ataise.
52004005	Duba-duba inoise atai awa ema diga Anutu kaka gamu inowera ami ago inowera awa.
52004006	Zo meni gazai ge awa zausemuro otao nusora bama bewana oko waise. Tua nu nena amira ina potiro tepo wamunoya. Nakare ge awa gita emoko nimorekare sero gipero awenakare awa.
52004007	Nakai duba inagayaire nuanisekai kota, duba saramaire nuanisekai Anutu meni zawa senua.
52004008	Are zo nu ge awa azu samunoya, awa nu eramara ge kota, Anutu Ozana nuso nimorekare potawi pupinowewa amira ge azu samunoya.
52004009	Nikare ge ninai meni dubara dumi ina-puma wawise nogoro pena-pana samunonikare? Anutu nu nutope dubara dumi ina-puma wawise susu sero gipero awenua awa.
52004010	Ago wenu nikare Masedonia zebura nata sero ge ninai nora nukare ami emo dubara dumi pupinoise nowewa. Ata saineba. Amira tame noko susumuro kei awaise tonakare.
52004011	Ago wero ge zo ego ine sero gatero awenakare awa. Potiro itai awa yaba inoise nena nisokare gege dia wewo. Wana meni wise nise awinoise noiwo.
52004012	Ago ine nuawise senakare, awa nera kota, nikare ago inoise diga nana benaura dora botiyo tepo neine nuawa gara ewanana waise.
52004013	Otao mamai, nikare bebetenai nisokarera susu kaka gamu inoise diga ema tuma diai tepo ami duba gazawi di saire zo amaire nowera, ago ine ninekare wai azu, sanakare niniu.
52004014	Nakai Yesu betero erinua ge awa ziro tata-tata inowenakai. Are da ago ine ge ei awa ganakai me wae. Yesu tuma didinoma bebetenitinowera awa Anutu meni Yesure dai puro mamunoya.
52004015	Ota zo awa Tuara bera ge awa nimorekare sanekare. Nakai zebura seka nuanakai Tua meni kei awai amire nakai bebetenai nukare awa dainai ine tepo awa.
52004016	Nera kota, Tua nu nutope utura ena ge zawa sai nusore angelo giti kopira zawa gataire Anutura so awire osamunoya. Osai Kristo tuma diro noe bebeteniwa nunekare ami gita eramunora awa.
52004017	Erara seka nowenakai ami numorekare dara susumanakai bereze meni nakai eya tutamu puro witai soe ena Tua tamamunonakai. Ago wero Tuare dai itai gege itamunonakai awa.
52004018	Nikare ge awa otao mamaire sero niniro awero duba nisokare puro osewo.
52005001	Be nazi o tani ne kei awai amire ge awa me wamunoi? Awa sanakare gawise sai awa oko itia.
52005002	Nikare nitopekare ego giro baititinowewa awa. Bewana wai ema meni pire kei awinowera, da ago ine be nuso mamunoya.
52005003	Are ema meni, “Bega bamu itia, are kokopai itenakai,” asinoise nuara sisaira nena ami nusokare nana eya kei awamunoya. Awa bama wasou wai meni mai pumamu inoise yaya tapinowera, da ago ine eramara nana kei awamunoya. Nena ago ine nusokare nana eya kei awai nogo nogo wero dainamunori? Dainai ine oko itia.
52005004	Ata ninekare meni awa mumera oko nowewa, are Tuara be meni bewana wai ema ine wero eya kei awai di oko tainamunowa.
52005005	Nikare zasimaira o waikora dubu wero nowewa. Nakai pira o mumera dubu oko aewa. Nakai zasimaira dubu awa.
52005006	Are nakai erama eni meni gitawa inowera ago ine gitawa oko wanekai. Nakai uma inoise sienitinoise nuanekai.
52005007	Nakai gosinonakai. Gitawa wai nukare pire gitawa inowera, ota ou niro dau wai nukare awa pire ou niro dau inowera.
52005008	Zasimaira dubu nakai sienitinoise nuanekai. Ago inoise tuma diaire dubara dumire meni beri nasokai waise. Ota Anutu meni nakai wayara ena soyaise tuma didinowenakai ami gitira kana zewai nasokai waise.
52005009	Anutu nu be dumu nusora me pumanisekai kota, Tua nasokai Yesu Kristo meni nakai soyaise towia awa.
52005010	Nune ami nakai emo betenua. Awa nu mamunoya be amire nakai beterota seka noise numore dai eroma nuanisekai ago wenua awa.
52005011	Are nikare nitopekare kora wai ge ina-sa wero duba ina-zia wawewa zewai inowera, da ago ine inoise noiwo.
52005012	Otao mamai, nikare ego wawise tonakare. Nisokare nana bua inoise tama doinowera, ota Tua emo wero nikare gita inowera, ota sero gipero awinowera, nukare awa sou wewo.
52005013	Ago inoise bua nusokare emo wero nukare emo dubara dumi pumuwo. Ago wero numorekare giwo witai wae. Ago wero bega ina-puma inoise noiwo.
52005014	Otao mamai, na nikare danara gaero sana niniu. Ema tebe-tabe nowera nukare awa ge potiwo. Ema kotumu-katumure ago awa kora wewo. Ema tuma diai beyatare awa soremuwo. Ago wero ema dapikarago amire dai duba-ozaire noiwo.
52005015	Wayara ina-wai ina-wai azu amira dia weu. Nitopekareta ema enire dai kora ina-wa inoise noiwo.
52005016	Duba yawa sarare noiwo.
52005017	Isa zo oko duawe.
52005018	Nena neni neni amira kokopai asero Anutu bowi wewo. Kristo Yesu meni ago wawise Anutura bera towia awa.
52005019	Ozanara niao oko dawa sikimae.
52005020	Anutura bera ge porofete meni sago wero kerenitinowera awa oko azu sero isimawe.
52005021	Ata ge bamubamu ninitinowewa awa siana-katana wero ewanana wai giro puro noiwo.
52005022	Ota waya-kawaya awa dowo.
52005023	Anutu nu duba-ozaira mama nutope nikare zere dago sewero baitaise. Ititi nisokare ata duba nisokare ata tama nisokare awa zere dago pasina amu itara Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora kei awai bera ena saramai dopawise isa tona.
52005024	Nikare zawa towia ami nikare oko duamunoya. Nu bua dago wero pesunamunoya.
52005025	Ge kaka awa. Otao mamai, nikare nakare emo isa sewo.
52005026	Otao mamai, nikare na emo Yesura gegenai ema bama amira wana ina-zia wewo.
52005027	Na Tuara nana benaura sana zewai wae: Nikare pas ei awa ge ninai ema dapikarago amira benaura ena azimuwo gare.
52005028	Tua nasokai Yesu Kristora dumi yagaba meni nisokare nana itaise.
53001001	Paulo, Siluano, ata Timoti, nakare nikare Tesalonika natera ena Mama nasokai Anutu ata Tua Yesu Kristora ema dubu wero nowewa, nimorekare pas ei awa potitinonakare.
53001002	Anutu Mama ata Tua Yesu Kristo nusoto nana ena sogawaire duba-ozaire semu nisokare nana niro itaise.
53001003	Otao mamai, duba nasokare meni wawi nikare emo be giti Anuture kokopai asanisekare inowia. Noko nuture kokopai sawenakare te inowia. Nera kota, tuma diai nisokare meni awa zewai-zawai kei awinowia, ota dumi ina-pa wai meni awa nisokare nana zapinowia awa.
53001004	Ami emo nakare natopekare Anutura dubu sero amira nana noise zazo nisokare de ike nitinowenakare. Erama nimorekare iwo wawera yaya tamaire duba naire noise saineba asero zewai wero noise tuma diai nisokare oko besinowewa, amira ge uge nata sero Anutura dubura nana inowenakare.
53001005	Tani nisokare nana kei awinowia ami namorekai susu ego ine gipinowia: Anutu nu ina ewanana nimorekare potamu wero opi oko wamunoya. Nu ina ewanana potai me gege wamunoya.
